00120 // ranges are in world units, calculated by:
00121 // 100 + real-range-in-metres/10
00122 // then I scaled them down... I forget how much by!
00123 
00124 // Accuracy is based on probability of shot being within 10cm of bullseye target on chest at 25m
00125 // from Compendium of Modern Firearms (Edge of the Sword Vol 1)

00310 
00311 // the amount of momentum reduction for the head, torso, and legs
00312 // used to determine whether the bullet will go through someone
00313 UINT8 BodyImpactReduction[4] = { 0, 15, 30, 23 };

00317 
00318 enum
00319 {
00320       WEAPON_ELEMENT_NONE = 0,
00321       WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPONLIST,
00322       WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON,
00323       WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON_PROPERY,
00324 }
00325 typedef WEP_PARSE_STAGE;
00326 
00327 struct
00328 {
00329       WEP_PARSE_STAGE   curElement;
00330 
00331       INT8              szCharData[MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH+1];
00332       WEAPONTYPE        curWeapon;
00333       WEAPONTYPE *      curWeaponList;
00334       UINT32                  maxWeapons;
00335       
00336       UINT32                  currentDepth;
00337       UINT32                  maxReadDepth;
00338 }
00339 typedef weaponParseData;
00340 
00341 
00342 static void XMLCALL
00343 weaponStartElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name, const char **atts)
00344 {
00345       weaponParseData * pData = (weaponParseData *)userData;
00346 
00347       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //are we reading this element?
00348       {
00349             if(strcmp(name, "WEAPONLIST") == 0 && pData->curElement == WEAPON_ELEMENT_NONE)
00350             {
00351                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPONLIST;
00352 
00353                   memset(pData->curWeaponList,0,sizeof(WEAPONTYPE)*pData->maxWeapons);
00354 
00355                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00356             }
00357             else if(strcmp(name, "WEAPON") == 0 && pData->curElement == WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPONLIST)
00358             {
00359                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00360 
00361                   memset(&pData->curWeapon,0,sizeof(WEAPONTYPE));
00362 
00363                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00364             }
00365             else if(pData->curElement == WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON &&
00366                         (strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0 ||
00367                         strcmp(name, "szWeaponName") == 0 ||
00368                         strcmp(name, "ubWeaponClass") == 0 ||
00369                         strcmp(name, "ubWeaponType") == 0 ||
00370                         strcmp(name, "ubCalibre") == 0 ||
00371                         strcmp(name, "ubReadyTime") == 0 ||
00372                         strcmp(name, "ubShotsPer4Turns") == 0 ||
00373                         strcmp(name, "ubShotsPerBurst") == 0 ||
00374                         strcmp(name, "ubBurstPenalty") == 0 ||
00375                         strcmp(name, "ubBulletSpeed") == 0 ||
00376                         strcmp(name, "ubImpact") == 0 ||
00377                         strcmp(name, "ubDeadliness") == 0 ||
00378                         strcmp(name, "bAccuracy") == 0 ||
00379                         strcmp(name, "ubMagSize") == 0 ||
00380                         strcmp(name, "usRange")  == 0 ||
00381                         strcmp(name, "usReloadDelay") == 0 ||
00382                         strcmp(name, "ubAttackVolume") == 0 ||
00383                         strcmp(name, "ubHitVolume") == 0 ||
00384                         strcmp(name, "sSound") == 0 ||
00385                         strcmp(name, "sBurstSound") == 0 ||
00386                         strcmp(name, "sSilencedBurstSound") == 0 ||
00387                         strcmp(name, "sReloadSound") == 0 ||
00388                         strcmp(name, "sLocknLoadSound") == 0 ||
00389                         strcmp(name, "bBurstAP") == 0 ||
00390                         strcmp(name, "bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP") == 0 ||
00391                         strcmp(name, "APsToReload") == 0 ||
00392                         strcmp(name, "SwapClips") == 0 ||
00393                         strcmp(name, "AutoPenalty") == 0 ||
00394                         strcmp(name, "NoSemiAuto") == 0 ||
00395                         strcmp(name, "MaxDistForMessyDeath") == 0 ||
00396                         strcmp(name, "SilencedSound") == 0 || // Lesh: add new field (OR operand)
00397                 strcmp(name, "BurstAniDelay") == 0 || // Lesh: add new field (field itself)
00398                         strcmp(name, "APsToReloadManually") == 0 ||
00399                         strcmp(name, "ManualReloadSound") == 0)
00400                         )
00401             {
00402                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON_PROPERY;
00403 
00404                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00405             }
00406 
00407             pData->szCharData[0] = '\0';
00408       }
00409 
00410       pData->currentDepth++;
00411 
00412 }
00413 
00414 static void XMLCALL
00415 weaponCharacterDataHandle(void *userData, const char *str, int len)
00416 {
00417       weaponParseData * pData = (weaponParseData *)userData;
00418 
00419       if( (pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) && 
00420             (strlen(pData->szCharData) < MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH)
00421         ){
00422             strncat(pData->szCharData,str,__min((unsigned int)len,MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH-strlen(pData->szCharData)));
00423       }
00424 }
00425 
00426 
00427 static void XMLCALL
00428 weaponEndElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name)
00429 {
00430       weaponParseData * pData = (weaponParseData *)userData;
00431 
00432       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //we're at the end of an element that we've been reading
00433       {
00434             if(strcmp(name, "WEAPONLIST") == 0)
00435             {
00436                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_NONE;
00437             }
00438             else if(strcmp(name, "WEAPON") == 0)
00439             {
00440                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPONLIST;
00441 
00442                   if(pData->curWeapon.uiIndex < pData->maxWeapons)
00443                   {
00444                         pData->curWeaponList[pData->curWeapon.uiIndex] = pData->curWeapon; //write the weapon into the table
00445                   }
00446             }
00447             else if(strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0)
00448             {
00449                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00450                   pData->curWeapon.uiIndex = atol(pData->szCharData);
00451             }
00452             else if(strcmp(name, "szWeaponName") == 0)
00453             {
00454                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00455 
00456                   if(MAX_WEAPON_NAME_LENGTH >= strlen(pData->szCharData))
00457                         strcpy(pData->curWeapon.szWeaponName,pData->szCharData);
00458                   else
00459                   {
00460                         strncpy(pData->curWeapon.szWeaponName,pData->szCharData,MAX_WEAPON_NAME_LENGTH);
00461                         pData->curWeapon.szWeaponName[MAX_WEAPON_NAME_LENGTH] = '\0';
00462                   }
00463             }
00464             else if(strcmp(name, "ubWeaponClass") == 0)
00465             {
00466                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00467                   pData->curWeapon.ubWeaponClass = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00468             }
00469             else if(strcmp(name, "ubWeaponType") == 0)
00470             {
00471                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00472                   pData->curWeapon.ubWeaponType = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00473             }
00474             else if(strcmp(name, "ubCalibre") == 0)
00475             {
00476                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00477                   pData->curWeapon.ubCalibre = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00478             }
00479             else if(strcmp(name, "ubReadyTime") == 0)
00480             {
00481                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00482                   pData->curWeapon.ubReadyTime = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00483             }
00484             else if(strcmp(name, "ubShotsPer4Turns") == 0)
00485             {
00486                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00487                   pData->curWeapon.ubShotsPer4Turns = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00488             }
00489             else if(strcmp(name, "ubShotsPerBurst") == 0)
00490             {
00491                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00492                   pData->curWeapon.ubShotsPerBurst = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00493             }
00494             else if(strcmp(name, "ubBurstPenalty") == 0)
00495             {
00496                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00497                   pData->curWeapon.ubBurstPenalty = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00498             }
00499             else if(strcmp(name, "ubBulletSpeed") == 0)
00500             {
00501                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00502                   pData->curWeapon.ubBulletSpeed = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00503             }
00504             else if(strcmp(name, "ubImpact") == 0)
00505             {
00506                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00507                   pData->curWeapon.ubImpact = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00508             }
00509             else if(strcmp(name, "ubDeadliness") == 0)
00510             {
00511                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00512                   pData->curWeapon.ubDeadliness = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00513             }
00514             else if(strcmp(name, "bAccuracy") == 0)
00515             {
00516                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00517                   pData->curWeapon.bAccuracy = (INT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00518             }
00519             else if(strcmp(name, "ubMagSize") == 0)
00520             {
00521                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00522                   pData->curWeapon.ubMagSize = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00523             }
00524             else if(strcmp(name, "usRange")      == 0)
00525             {
00526                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00527                   pData->curWeapon.usRange = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00528             }
00529             else if(strcmp(name, "usReloadDelay") == 0)

00533             }

00535             {
00536                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;

00538             }
00539             else if(strcmp(name, "ubHitVolume") == 0)
00540             {
00541                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00542                   pData->curWeapon.ubHitVolume = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00543             }
00544             else if(strcmp(name, "sSound") == 0)
00545             {
00546                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;

00548             }

00550             {

00555             {

00558             }
00559             else if(strcmp(name, "sReloadSound") == 0)
00560             {
00561                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00562                   pData->curWeapon.sReloadSound = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00563             }
00564             else if(strcmp(name, "sLocknLoadSound") == 0)
00565             {

00568             }

00570             {
00571                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00572                   pData->curWeapon.bBurstAP = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00573             }

00575             {
00576                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00577                   pData->curWeapon.bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);

00582                   pData->curWeapon.APsToReload = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00583             }
00584             else if(strcmp(name, "SilencedSound") == 0)
00585             {
00586                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00587                   pData->curWeapon.silencedSound = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00588             }
00589             else if(strcmp(name, "SwapClips") == 0)
00590             {
00591                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00592                   pData->curWeapon.swapClips = (BOOLEAN) atol(pData->szCharData);
00593             }
00594             else if(strcmp(name, "MaxDistForMessyDeath") == 0)
00595             {
00596                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00597                   pData->curWeapon.maxdistformessydeath = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00598             }
00599             else if(strcmp(name, "AutoPenalty") == 0)
00600             {
00601                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00602                   pData->curWeapon.AutoPenalty = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00603             }
00604             else if(strcmp(name, "NoSemiAuto") == 0)
00605             {
00606                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00607                   pData->curWeapon.NoSemiAuto = (BOOLEAN) atol(pData->szCharData);
00608             }
00609         // Lesh: xmlreader must handle new field
00610             else if(strcmp(name, "BurstAniDelay") == 0)
00611             {
00612                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00613             pData->curWeapon.sAniDelay = (INT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00614             }
00615         // Lesh: end
00616             else if(strcmp(name, "APsToReloadManually") == 0)
00617             {
00618                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;

00620             }

00622             {
00623                   pData->curElement = WEAPON_ELEMENT_WEAPON;
00624             pData->curWeapon.ManualReloadSound = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00625             }
00626 
00627             pData->maxReadDepth--;
00628       }
00629 
00630       pData->currentDepth--;
00631 }

00634 
00635 
00636 BOOLEAN ReadInWeaponStats(STR fileName)
00637 {
00638       HWFILE            hFile;
00639       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00640       UINT32            uiFSize;
00641       CHAR8 *           lpcBuffer;
00642       XML_Parser  parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
00643       
00644       weaponParseData pData;
00645 
00646       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Loading weapons.xml" );
00647 
00648       // Open weapons file
00649       hFile = FileOpen( fileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00650       if ( !hFile )
00651             return( FALSE );
00652       
00653       uiFSize = FileGetSize(hFile);
00654       lpcBuffer = (CHAR8 *) MemAlloc(uiFSize+1);
00655 
00656       //Read in block
00657       if ( !FileRead( hFile, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, &uiBytesRead ) )
00658       {
00659             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00660             return( FALSE );
00661       }
00662 
00663       lpcBuffer[uiFSize] = 0; //add a null terminator
00664 
00665       FileClose( hFile );
00666 
00667       
00668       XML_SetElementHandler(parser, weaponStartElementHandle, weaponEndElementHandle);
00669       XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, weaponCharacterDataHandle);
00670 
00671       
00672       memset(&pData,0,sizeof(pData));
00673       pData.curWeaponList = Weapon;
00674       pData.maxWeapons = MAXITEMS; 
00675       
00676       XML_SetUserData(parser, &pData);
00677 
00678 
00679     if(!XML_Parse(parser, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, TRUE))
00680       {
00681             CHAR8 errorBuf[511];
00682 
00683             sprintf(errorBuf, "XML Parser Error in Weapons.xml: %s at line %d", XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)), XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser));
00684             LiveMessage(errorBuf);
00685 
00686             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00687             return FALSE;
00688       }
00689 
00690       MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00691 
00692 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00693       //Debug code; make sure that what we got from the file is the same as what's there
00694       // Open a new file
00695       hFile = FileOpen( "TABLEDATA\\~Weapons out.xml", FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00696       if ( !hFile )
00697             return( FALSE );
00698       
00699       {
00700             UINT32 cnt;
00701 
00702             FilePrintf(hFile,"<WEAPONLIST>\r\n");
00703             for(cnt = 0;cnt < MAXITEMS;cnt++)
00704             {
00705                   INT8 * szRemainder = Weapon[cnt].szWeaponName; //the remaining string to be output (for making valid XML)
00706 
00707                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<WEAPON>\r\n");
00708                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<uiIndex>%d</uiIndex>\r\n",                                                     Weapon[cnt].uiIndex);
00709 
00710                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<szWeaponName>");
00711                   while(szRemainder[0] != '\0')
00712                   {
00713                         UINT32 uiCharLoc = strcspn(szRemainder,"&<>\'\"\0");
00714                         INT8 invChar = szRemainder[uiCharLoc];
00715                         
00716                         if(uiCharLoc)
00717                         {
00718                               szRemainder[uiCharLoc] = '\0';
00719                               FilePrintf(hFile,"%s",szRemainder);
00720                               szRemainder[uiCharLoc] = invChar;
00721                         }
00722 
00723                         szRemainder += uiCharLoc;
00724 
00725                         switch(invChar)
00726                         {
00727                               case '&':
00728                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&amp;");
00729                                     szRemainder++;
00730                               break;
00731 
00732                               case '<':
00733                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&lt;");
00734                                     szRemainder++;
00735                               break;
00736 
00737                               case '>':
00738                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&gt;");
00739                                     szRemainder++;
00740                               break;
00741 
00742                               case '\'':
00743                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&apos;");
00744                                     szRemainder++;
00745                               break;
00746 
00747                               case '\"':
00748                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&quot;");
00749                                     szRemainder++;
00750                               break;
00751                         }
00752                   }
00753                   FilePrintf(hFile,"</szWeaponName>\r\n");
00754 
00755                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubWeaponClass>%d</ubWeaponClass>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].ubWeaponClass);
00756                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubWeaponType>%d</ubWeaponType>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].ubWeaponType);
00757                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubCalibre>%d</ubCalibre>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].ubCalibre);
00758                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubReadyTime>%d</ubReadyTime>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].ubReadyTime);
00759                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubShotsPer4Turns>%d</ubShotsPer4Turns>\r\n",                             Weapon[cnt].ubShotsPer4Turns);
00760                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubShotsPerBurst>%d</ubShotsPerBurst>\r\n",                         Weapon[cnt].ubShotsPerBurst);
00761                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubBurstPenalty>%d</ubBurstPenalty>\r\n",                                 Weapon[cnt].ubBurstPenalty);
00762                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubBulletSpeed>%d</ubBulletSpeed>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].ubBulletSpeed);
00763                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubImpact>%d</ubImpact>\r\n",                                                   Weapon[cnt].ubImpact);
00764                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubDeadliness>%d</ubDeadliness>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].ubDeadliness);
00765                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bAccuracy>%d</bAccuracy>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].bAccuracy);
00766                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubMagSize>%d</ubMagSize>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].ubMagSize);
00767                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<usRange>%d</usRange>\r\n",                                                     Weapon[cnt].usRange);
00768                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<usReloadDelay>%d</usReloadDelay>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].usReloadDelay);
00769                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubAttackVolume>%d</ubAttackVolume>\r\n",                                 Weapon[cnt].ubAttackVolume);
00770                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubHitVolume>%d</ubHitVolume>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].ubHitVolume);
00771                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sSound>%d</sSound>\r\n",                                                       Weapon[cnt].sSound);
00772                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sBurstSound>%d</sBurstSound>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].sBurstSound);
00773                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sSilencedBurstSound>%d</sSilencedBurstSound>\r\n",                 Weapon[cnt].sSilencedBurstSound);
00774                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sReloadSound>%d</sReloadSound>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].sReloadSound);
00775                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sLocknLoadSound>%d</sLocknLoadSound>\r\n",                         Weapon[cnt].sLocknLoadSound);
00776                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bBurstAP>%d</bBurstAP>\r\n",                                                   Weapon[cnt].bBurstAP);
00777                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP>%d</bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP>\r\n",   Weapon[cnt].bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP);
00778                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<APsToReloadManually>%d</APsToReloadManually>\r\n",                 Weapon[cnt].APsToReloadManually);
00779                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ManualReloadSound>%d</ManualReloadSound>\r\n",                     Weapon[cnt].ManualReloadSound);
00780                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</WEAPON>\r\n");
00781             }
00782             FilePrintf(hFile,"</WEAPONLIST>\r\n");
00783       }
00784       FileClose( hFile );
00785 #endif
00786 
00787       XML_ParserFree(parser);
00788 
00789       return( TRUE );
00790 }
00791 
00792 BOOLEAN WriteWeaponStats()
00793 {
00794       HWFILE            hFile;
00795       
00796       //Debug code; make sure that what we got from the file is the same as what's there
00797       // Open a new file
00798       hFile = FileOpen( "TABLEDATA\\Weapons out.xml", FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00799       if ( !hFile )
00800             return( FALSE );
00801       
00802       {
00803             UINT32 cnt;
00804 
00805             FilePrintf(hFile,"<WEAPONLIST>\r\n");
00806             for(cnt = 0;cnt < MAXITEMS;cnt++)
00807             {
00808                   INT8 * szRemainder = Weapon[cnt].szWeaponName; //the remaining string to be output (for making valid XML)
00809 
00810                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<WEAPON>\r\n");
00811                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<uiIndex>%d</uiIndex>\r\n",                                                     cnt);//Weapon[cnt].uiIndex);
00812 
00813                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<szWeaponName>");
00814                   while(szRemainder[0] != '\0')
00815                   {
00816                         UINT32 uiCharLoc = strcspn(szRemainder,"&<>\'\"\0");
00817                         INT8 invChar = szRemainder[uiCharLoc];
00818                         
00819                         if(uiCharLoc)
00820                         {
00821                               szRemainder[uiCharLoc] = '\0';
00822                               FilePrintf(hFile,"%s",szRemainder);
00823                               szRemainder[uiCharLoc] = invChar;
00824                         }
00825 
00826                         szRemainder += uiCharLoc;
00827 
00828                         switch(invChar)
00829                         {
00830                               case '&':
00831                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&amp;");
00832                                     szRemainder++;
00833                               break;
00834 
00835                               case '<':
00836                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&lt;");
00837                                     szRemainder++;
00838                               break;
00839 
00840                               case '>':
00841                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&gt;");
00842                                     szRemainder++;
00843                               break;
00844 
00845                               case '\'':
00846                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&apos;");
00847                                     szRemainder++;
00848                               break;
00849 
00850                               case '\"':
00851                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&quot;");
00852                                     szRemainder++;
00853                               break;
00854                         }
00855                   }
00856                   FilePrintf(hFile,"</szWeaponName>\r\n");
00857 
00858                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubWeaponClass>%d</ubWeaponClass>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].ubWeaponClass);
00859                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubWeaponType>%d</ubWeaponType>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].ubWeaponType);
00860                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubCalibre>%d</ubCalibre>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].ubCalibre);
00861                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubReadyTime>%d</ubReadyTime>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].ubReadyTime);
00862                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubShotsPer4Turns>%d</ubShotsPer4Turns>\r\n",                             Weapon[cnt].ubShotsPer4Turns);
00863                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubShotsPerBurst>%d</ubShotsPerBurst>\r\n",                         Weapon[cnt].ubShotsPerBurst);
00864                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubBurstPenalty>%d</ubBurstPenalty>\r\n",                                 Weapon[cnt].ubBurstPenalty);
00865                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubBulletSpeed>%d</ubBulletSpeed>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].ubBulletSpeed);
00866                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubImpact>%d</ubImpact>\r\n",                                                   Weapon[cnt].ubImpact);
00867                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubDeadliness>%d</ubDeadliness>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].ubDeadliness);
00868                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bAccuracy>%d</bAccuracy>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].bAccuracy);
00869                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubMagSize>%d</ubMagSize>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].ubMagSize);
00870                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<usRange>%d</usRange>\r\n",                                                     Weapon[cnt].usRange);
00871                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<usReloadDelay>%d</usReloadDelay>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].usReloadDelay);
00872                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<BurstAniDelay>%d</BurstAniDelay>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].sAniDelay);
00873                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubAttackVolume>%d</ubAttackVolume>\r\n",                                 Weapon[cnt].ubAttackVolume);
00874                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubHitVolume>%d</ubHitVolume>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].ubHitVolume);
00875                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sSound>%d</sSound>\r\n",                                                       Weapon[cnt].sSound);
00876                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sBurstSound>%d</sBurstSound>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].sBurstSound);
00877                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sSilencedBurstSound>%d</sSilencedBurstSound>\r\n",                                         Weapon[cnt].sSilencedBurstSound);
00878                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sReloadSound>%d</sReloadSound>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].sReloadSound);
00879                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sLocknLoadSound>%d</sLocknLoadSound>\r\n",                         Weapon[cnt].sLocknLoadSound);
00880                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<SilencedSound>%d</SilencedSound>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].silencedSound  );
00881                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bBurstAP>%d</bBurstAP>\r\n",                     Weapon[cnt].bBurstAP);
00882                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP>%d</bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP>\r\n",   Weapon[cnt].bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP);
00883                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<APsToReload>%d</APsToReload>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].APsToReload);
00884                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<SwapClips>%d</SwapClips>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].swapClips );
00885                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<MaxDistForMessyDeath>%d</MaxDistForMessyDeath>\r\n",               Weapon[cnt].maxdistformessydeath);
00886                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<AutoPenalty>%d</AutoPenalty>\r\n",               Weapon[cnt].AutoPenalty);
00887                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<NoSemiAuto>%d</NoSemiAuto>\r\n",                 Weapon[cnt].NoSemiAuto);
00888 
00889 
00890 
00891                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</WEAPON>\r\n");
00892             }
00893             FilePrintf(hFile,"</WEAPONLIST>\r\n");
00894       }
00895       FileClose( hFile );
00896 
00897       return( TRUE );
00898 }

00900 UINT16 GunRange( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
00901 {
00902       //INT8 bAttachPos;
00903       UINT16 rng;
00904 
00905       if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
00906       {
00907 
00908 
00909             //bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pObj, GUN_BARREL_EXTENDER );
00910 
00911             //if ( bAttachPos == ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
00912             //{
00913             //    rng = ( Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].usRange );
00914             //    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("GunRange: base rng=%d",rng));
00915             //}
00916             //else
00917             //{
00918             //    rng = ( Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].usRange + (GUN_BARREL_RANGE_BONUS * WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ]) / 100 ) );
00919             //    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("GunRange: Found extender rng=%d",rng));
00920             //}
00921 
00922             //if ( Weapon [ pObj->usItem ].ubWeaponType == GUN_SHOTGUN && pObj->ubGunAmmoType != AMMO_BUCKSHOT )
00923             //{
00924             //    rng += SOLID_SLUG_RANGE_BONUS;
00925             //    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("GunRange: Found solid slug rng=%d",rng));
00926             //}
00927             //else
00928             //{
00929             //    bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pObj, DUCKBILL );
00930             //    if ( bAttachPos != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
00931             //    {
00932             //          rng += DUCKBILL_RANGE_BONUS * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ]) / 100 );
00933             //          DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("GunRange: Found duckbill rng=%d",rng));
00934             //    }
00935             //}
00936 
00937 
00938             // Snap: attachment status is factored into the range bonus calculation
00939             rng = Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].usRange + GetRangeBonus(pObj);
00940 
00941             return rng;
00942       }
00943       else
00944       {
00945             // return a minimal value of 1 tile
00946             return( CELL_X_SIZE );
00947       }
00948 }
00949 
00950 INT32 EffectiveArmour( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
00951 {
00952       INT32       iValue;
00953       INT8        bPlate;
00954 
00955       if (pObj == NULL || Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass != IC_ARMOUR)
00956       {
00957             return( 0 );
00958       }
00959       iValue = Armour[ Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
00960       iValue = iValue * pObj->bStatus[0] / 100;
00961 
00962 //    bPlate = FindAttachment( pObj, CERAMIC_PLATES );
00963       bPlate = FindFirstArmourAttachment( pObj );
00964       if ( bPlate != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
00965       {
00966             INT32 iValue2;
00967 
00968             iValue2 = Armour[ Item[ pObj->usAttachItem[bPlate] ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
00969             iValue2 = iValue2 * pObj->bAttachStatus[ bPlate ] / 100;
00970 
00971             iValue += iValue2;
00972       }
00973       return( max(iValue,1) );
00974 }
00975 
00976 INT32 ArmourPercent( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00977 {
00978       INT32 iVest, iHelmet, iLeg;
00979 
00980       if (pSoldier->inv[VESTPOS].usItem)
00981       {
00982             iVest = EffectiveArmour( &(pSoldier->inv[VESTPOS]) );
00983             // convert to % of best; ignoring bug-treated stuff
00984             iVest = 65 * iVest / ( Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_VEST_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection + Armour[ Item[ CERAMIC_PLATES ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection );
00985       }
00986       else
00987       {
00988             iVest = 0;
00989       }
00990 
00991       if (pSoldier->inv[HELMETPOS].usItem)
00992       {
00993             iHelmet = EffectiveArmour( &(pSoldier->inv[HELMETPOS]) );
00994             // convert to % of best; ignoring bug-treated stuff
00995             iHelmet = 15 * iHelmet / Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_HELMET_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
00996       }
00997       else
00998       {
00999             iHelmet = 0;
01000       }
01001 
01002       if (pSoldier->inv[LEGPOS].usItem)
01003       {
01004             iLeg = EffectiveArmour( &(pSoldier->inv[LEGPOS]) );
01005             // convert to % of best; ignoring bug-treated stuff
01006             iLeg = 25 * iLeg / Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_LEGGINGS_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
01007       }
01008       else
01009       {
01010             iLeg = 0;
01011       }
01012       return( (iHelmet + iVest + iLeg) );
01013 }
01014 
01015 INT32 ExplosiveEffectiveArmour( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
01016 {
01017       INT32       iValue;
01018       INT8        bPlate;
01019 
01020       if (pObj == NULL || Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass != IC_ARMOUR)
01021       {
01022             return( 0 );
01023       }
01024       iValue = Armour[ Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
01025       iValue = iValue * pObj->bStatus[0] / 100;
01026       if ( Item[pObj->usItem].flakjacket )
01027       {
01028             // increase value for flak jackets!
01029             iValue *= 3;
01030       }
01031 
01032       bPlate = FindFirstArmourAttachment( pObj );
01033       if ( bPlate != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01034       {
01035             INT32 iValue2;
01036 
01037             iValue2 = Armour[ Item[ pObj->usAttachItem[bPlate] ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
01038             iValue2 = iValue2 * pObj->bAttachStatus[ bPlate ] / 100;
01039 
01040             iValue += iValue2;
01041       }
01042       return( max(iValue,1) );
01043 }
01044 
01045 INT8 ArmourVersusExplosivesPercent( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01046 {
01047       // returns the % damage reduction from grenades
01048       INT32 iVest, iHelmet, iLeg;
01049 
01050       if (pSoldier->inv[VESTPOS].usItem)
01051       {
01052             iVest = ExplosiveEffectiveArmour( &(pSoldier->inv[VESTPOS]) );
01053             // convert to % of best; ignoring bug-treated stuff
01054             iVest = __min( 65, 65 * iVest / ( Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_VEST_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection + Armour[ Item[ CERAMIC_PLATES ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection) );
01055       }
01056       else
01057       {
01058             iVest = 0;
01059       }
01060 
01061       if (pSoldier->inv[HELMETPOS].usItem)
01062       {
01063             iHelmet = ExplosiveEffectiveArmour( &(pSoldier->inv[HELMETPOS]) );
01064             // convert to % of best; ignoring bug-treated stuff
01065             iHelmet = __min( 15, 15 * iHelmet / Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_HELMET_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection );
01066       }
01067       else
01068       {
01069             iHelmet = 0;
01070       }
01071 
01072       if (pSoldier->inv[LEGPOS].usItem)
01073       {
01074             iLeg = ExplosiveEffectiveArmour( &(pSoldier->inv[LEGPOS]) );
01075             // convert to % of best; ignoring bug-treated stuff
01076             iLeg = __min( 25, 25 * iLeg / Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_LEGGINGS_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection );
01077       }
01078       else
01079       {
01080             iLeg = 0;
01081       }
01082       return( (INT8) (iHelmet + iVest + iLeg) );
01083 }
01084 
01085 void AdjustImpactByHitLocation( INT32 iImpact, UINT8 ubHitLocation, INT32 * piNewImpact, INT32 * piImpactForCrits )
01086 {
01087       switch( ubHitLocation )
01088       {
01089             case AIM_SHOT_HEAD:
01090                   // 1.5x damage from successful hits to the head!
01091                   *piImpactForCrits = HEAD_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT( iImpact );
01092                   *piNewImpact = *piImpactForCrits;               
01093                   break;
01094             case AIM_SHOT_LEGS:
01095                   // half damage for determining critical hits
01096                   // quarter actual damage 
01097                   *piImpactForCrits = LEGS_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT( iImpact );
01098                   *piNewImpact = LEGS_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT( *piImpactForCrits );
01099                   break;
01100             default:                
01101                   *piImpactForCrits = iImpact;
01102                   *piNewImpact = iImpact;
01103                   break;
01104       }
01105 }
01106 
01107 
01108 // #define  TESTGUNJAM
01109 
01110 //rain
01111 extern INT8 gbCurrentRainIntensity;
01112 //end rain
01113 BOOLEAN CheckForGunJam( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01114 {
01115   OBJECTTYPE *    pObj;
01116   INT32           iChance, iResult;
01117   
01118   // should jams apply to enemies?
01119       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
01120       {
01121             if ( Item[pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon].usItemClass == IC_GUN && !EXPLOSIVE_GUN( pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon ) )
01122             {
01123                   pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand]);
01124                   if (pObj->bGunAmmoStatus > 0)
01125                   {
01126                         // gun might jam, figure out the chance
01127                         //iChance = (80 - pObj->bGunStatus);
01128                         
01129                         //rain
01130                         iChance = (80 - pObj->bGunStatus) + gGameExternalOptions.ubWeaponReliabilityReductionPerRainIntensity * gbCurrentRainIntensity;
01131                         //end rain
01132 
01133 
01134                         // CJC: removed reliability from formula...
01135                         
01136                         // jams can happen to unreliable guns "earlier" than normal or reliable ones.
01137                         //iChance = iChance - Item[pObj->usItem].bReliability * 2;
01138 
01139                         // decrease the chance of a jam by 20% per point of reliability; 
01140                         // increased by 20% per negative point...
01141                         //iChance = iChance * (10 - Item[pObj->usItem].bReliability * 2) / 10;
01142                         
01143                         //rain
01144 //                      iChance = iChance * (10 - Item[pObj->usItem].bReliability * 2) / 10; // Madd: took it back out
01145                         //end rain
01146 
01147                         if (pSoldier->bDoBurst > 1)
01148                         {
01149                               // if at bullet in a burst after the first, higher chance
01150                               iChance -= PreRandom( 80 );
01151                         }
01152                         else
01153                         {
01154                               iChance -= PreRandom( 100 );
01155                         }
01156 
01157 #ifdef TESTGUNJAM
01158                         if ( 1 )
01159 #else
01160                         if ((INT32) PreRandom( 100 ) < iChance || gfNextFireJam )
01161 #endif
01162                         {
01163                               gfNextFireJam = FALSE;
01164 
01165                               // jam! negate the gun ammo status.
01166                               pObj->bGunAmmoStatus *= -1;
01167 
01168                               // Deduct AMMO!
01169                               DeductAmmo( pSoldier, pSoldier->ubAttackingHand );
01170 
01171                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_JAMMED_GUN );
01172                               return( TRUE );
01173                         }
01174                   }
01175                   else if (pObj->bGunAmmoStatus < 0)
01176                   {
01177                         // try to unjam gun
01178                         iResult = SkillCheck( pSoldier, UNJAM_GUN_CHECK, (INT8) ((Item[pObj->usItem].bReliability + Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].bReliability)* 4) );
01179                         if (iResult > 0)
01180                         {
01181                               // yay! unjammed the gun
01182                               pObj->bGunAmmoStatus *= -1;
01183 
01184                               // MECHANICAL/DEXTERITY GAIN: Unjammed a gun
01185                               StatChange( pSoldier, MECHANAMT, 5, FALSE );
01186                               StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, 5, FALSE );
01187 
01188                               DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01189 
01190                               // We unjammed gun, return appropriate value!
01191                               return( 255 );
01192                         }
01193                         else
01194                         {
01195                               return( TRUE );
01196                         }
01197                   }
01198             }
01199       }
01200       return( FALSE );
01201 }
01202 
01203 
01204 BOOLEAN     OKFireWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01205 {
01206       BOOLEAN bGunJamVal;
01207 
01208       // 1) Are we attacking with our second hand?
01209       if ( pSoldier->ubAttackingHand == SECONDHANDPOS )
01210       {
01211             if ( Weapon[pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand].usItem].NoSemiAuto ) // Madd: no autofire w/second hand (yet)
01212             {
01213                   return( FALSE );
01214             }
01215 
01216             if ( !EnoughAmmo( pSoldier, FALSE, pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ) )
01217             {
01218                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum  )
01219                   {
01220                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[ STR_2ND_CLIP_DEPLETED ] );                   
01221                         return( FALSE );
01222                   }
01223 
01224             }
01225       }
01226 
01227       bGunJamVal = CheckForGunJam( pSoldier );
01228 
01229       if ( bGunJamVal == 255 )
01230       {
01231             return( 255 );
01232       }
01233 
01234       if ( bGunJamVal )
01235       {
01236             return( FALSE );
01237       }
01238 
01239       return( TRUE );
01240 }
01241 
01242 
01243 BOOLEAN FireWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier , INT16 sTargetGridNo )
01244 {
01245       // ignore passed in target gridno for now
01246       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FireWeapon"));
01247       // If realtime and we are reloading - do not fire until counter is done!
01248       if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) && !pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01249       {
01250             if ( pSoldier->fReloading )
01251             {
01252                   return( FALSE );
01253             }
01254       }
01255 
01256       // if target gridno is the same as ours, do not fire!
01257       if (sTargetGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo)
01258       {
01259             // FREE UP NPC!
01260             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - attack on own gridno!") );
01261             FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) pSoldier->ubID );
01262             return( FALSE );
01263       }
01264 
01265       // SET ATTACKER TO NOBODY, WILL GET SET EVENTUALLY
01266       pSoldier->ubOppNum = NOBODY ;
01267 
01268       UINT16 usItemClass = Item[ pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon ].usItemClass;
01269       if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
01270             usItemClass = IC_LAUNCHER;
01271 
01272       switch( usItemClass )
01273       {
01274             case IC_THROWING_KNIFE:
01275             case IC_GUN:
01276 
01277                   if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL )
01278                         UseLauncher ( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo );
01279                   else
01280                   {
01281                         // ATE: PAtch up - bookkeeping for spreading done out of whak
01282                         if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread && !pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01283                         {
01284                               pSoldier->fDoSpread = FALSE;
01285                         }
01286 
01287                         if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread >= MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS )
01288                         {
01289                               //If we have more than MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS bullets, loop over and start again from the first target location
01290                               pSoldier->fDoSpread = 1;
01291                         }
01292 
01293 
01294                         if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread )
01295                         {
01296                               if ( pSoldier->sSpreadLocations[ pSoldier->fDoSpread - 1 ] != 0 )
01297                               {
01298                                     UseGun( pSoldier, pSoldier->sSpreadLocations[ pSoldier->fDoSpread - 1 ] );
01299                               }
01300                               else
01301                               {
01302                                     UseGun( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo );
01303                               }
01304                               pSoldier->fDoSpread++;
01305                         }
01306                         else
01307                         {
01308                               UseGun( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo );
01309                         }
01310                   }
01311                   break;
01312             case IC_BLADE:
01313 
01314                   UseBlade( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo );
01315                   break;
01316             case IC_PUNCH:
01317                   UseHandToHand( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, FALSE );
01318                   break;
01319 
01320             case IC_LAUNCHER:
01321                   if ( Item[pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon].rocketlauncher )
01322                         UseGun( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo );
01323                   else
01324                         // ATE: PAtch up - bookkeeping for spreading done out of whak
01325                         if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread && !pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01326                         {
01327                               pSoldier->fDoSpread = FALSE;
01328                         }
01329 
01330                         if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread >= MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS )
01331                         {
01332                               //If we have more than MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS bullets, loop over and start again from the first target location
01333                               pSoldier->fDoSpread = 1;
01334                         }
01335 
01336 
01337                         if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread )
01338                         {
01339                               if ( pSoldier->sSpreadLocations[ pSoldier->fDoSpread - 1 ] != 0 )
01340                               {
01341                                     UseLauncher( pSoldier, pSoldier->sSpreadLocations[ pSoldier->fDoSpread - 1 ] );
01342                               }
01343                               else
01344                               {
01345                                     UseLauncher( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo );
01346                               }
01347                               pSoldier->fDoSpread++;
01348                         }
01349                         else
01350                         {
01351                               UseLauncher( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo );
01352                         }
01353                   
01354                   break;
01355 
01356             default:
01357                   // attempt to throw
01358                   UseThrown( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo );
01359                   break;
01360       }
01361       return( TRUE );
01362 }
01363 
01364 
01365 void GetTargetWorldPositions( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo, FLOAT *pdXPos, FLOAT *pdYPos, FLOAT *pdZPos )
01366 {
01367       FLOAT                                           dTargetX;
01368       FLOAT                                           dTargetY;
01369       FLOAT                                           dTargetZ;
01370       SOLDIERTYPE                         *pTargetSoldier;
01371       INT8                                            bStructHeight;
01372       INT16                                           sXMapPos, sYMapPos;     
01373       UINT32                                          uiRoll;
01374 
01375       pTargetSoldier = SimpleFindSoldier( sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
01376       if ( pTargetSoldier )
01377       {     
01378             // SAVE OPP ID
01379             pSoldier->ubOppNum = pTargetSoldier->ubID;
01380             dTargetX = (FLOAT) CenterX( pTargetSoldier->sGridNo );
01381             dTargetY = (FLOAT) CenterY( pTargetSoldier->sGridNo );
01382             if (pSoldier->bAimShotLocation == AIM_SHOT_RANDOM)
01383             {
01384                   uiRoll = PreRandom( 100 );
01385                   if (uiRoll < 15)
01386                   {
01387                         pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_LEGS;
01388                   }
01389                   else if (uiRoll > 94)
01390                   {
01391                         pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_HEAD;
01392                   }
01393                   else
01394                   {
01395                         pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
01396                   }
01397                   if ( pSoldier->bAimShotLocation != AIM_SHOT_HEAD )
01398                   {
01399                         UINT32 uiChanceToGetThrough = SoldierToSoldierBodyPartChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, pSoldier->bAimShotLocation );
01400 
01401                         if ( uiChanceToGetThrough < 25 )
01402                         {
01403                               if ( SoldierToSoldierBodyPartChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, AIM_SHOT_HEAD ) > uiChanceToGetThrough * 2 )
01404                               {
01405                                     // try for a head shot then
01406                                     pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_HEAD;
01407                               }
01408                         }
01409                   }
01410 
01411             }
01412 
01413             switch( pSoldier->bAimShotLocation )
01414             {           
01415                   case AIM_SHOT_HEAD:
01416                         CalculateSoldierZPos( pTargetSoldier, HEAD_TARGET_POS, &dTargetZ );
01417                         break;
01418                   case AIM_SHOT_TORSO:
01419                         CalculateSoldierZPos( pTargetSoldier, TORSO_TARGET_POS, &dTargetZ );
01420                         break;
01421                   case AIM_SHOT_LEGS:
01422                         CalculateSoldierZPos( pTargetSoldier, LEGS_TARGET_POS, &dTargetZ );
01423                         break;
01424                   default:
01425                         // %)@#&(%?
01426                         CalculateSoldierZPos( pTargetSoldier, TARGET_POS, &dTargetZ );
01427                         break;
01428             }
01429       }
01430       else
01431       {
01432 
01433             // GET TARGET XY VALUES
01434             ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sTargetGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
01435 
01436             // fire at centre of tile
01437             dTargetX = (FLOAT) sXMapPos;
01438             dTargetY = (FLOAT) sYMapPos;
01439             if (pSoldier->bTargetCubeLevel)
01440             {
01441                   // fire at the centre of the cube specified
01442                   dTargetZ = ( (FLOAT) (pSoldier->bTargetCubeLevel + pSoldier->bTargetLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) - 0.5f) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX;
01443             }
01444             else
01445             {
01446                   bStructHeight = GetStructureTargetHeight( sTargetGridNo, (BOOLEAN) (pSoldier->bTargetLevel == 1) );
01447                   if (bStructHeight > 0)
01448                   {                             
01449                         // fire at the centre of the cube *one below* the tallest of the tallest structure
01450                         if (bStructHeight > 1)
01451                         {
01452                               // reduce target level by 1
01453                               bStructHeight--;
01454                         }
01455                         dTargetZ = ((FLOAT) (bStructHeight + pSoldier->bTargetLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) - 0.5f) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX;
01456                   }
01457                   else
01458                   {
01459                         // fire at 1 unit above the level of the ground
01460                         dTargetZ = (FLOAT) (pSoldier->bTargetLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX + 1;
01461                   }
01462             }
01463             // adjust for terrain height
01464             dTargetZ += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[sTargetGridNo].sHeight );
01465       }
01466 
01467       *pdXPos = dTargetX;
01468       *pdYPos = dTargetY;
01469       *pdZPos = dTargetZ;
01470 }
01471 
01472 
01473 BOOLEAN UseGun( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier , INT16 sTargetGridNo )
01474 {
01475       UINT32                                          uiHitChance, uiDiceRoll;
01476       INT16                                           sXMapPos, sYMapPos;     
01477       INT16                                           sAPCost;
01478       FLOAT                                           dTargetX;
01479       FLOAT                                           dTargetY;
01480       FLOAT                                           dTargetZ;
01481       UINT16                                          usItemNum;
01482       BOOLEAN                                         fBuckshot;
01483       UINT8                                           ubVolume;
01484       INT8                                            zBurstString[50];
01485       UINT8                                           ubDirection;
01486       INT16                                           sNewGridNo;
01487       UINT8                                           ubMerc;
01488       BOOLEAN                                         fGonnaHit = FALSE;
01489       UINT16                                          usExpGain = 0;
01490       UINT32                                          uiDepreciateTest;
01491 
01492       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("UseGun") );
01493       // Deduct points!
01494       sAPCost = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, FALSE, pSoldier->bAimTime );
01495 
01496       usItemNum = pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon;
01497 
01498       if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01499       {
01500             // ONly deduct points once
01501             if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst == 1 )
01502             {
01503                   if ( Weapon[ usItemNum ].sBurstSound != NO_WEAPON_SOUND )
01504                   {
01505                         // IF we are silenced?
01506                         UINT16 noisefactor = GetPercentNoiseVolume( &pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ] );
01507                         if( noisefactor < MAX_PERCENT_NOISE_VOLUME_FOR_SILENCED_SOUND || Weapon[ usItemNum ].ubAttackVolume <= 10 )
01508                         {
01509                               // Pick sound file baed on how many bullets we are going to fire...
01510                               sprintf( (char *)zBurstString, (const char*)gzBurstSndStrings[ Weapon[ usItemNum ].sSilencedBurstSound ], pSoldier->bBulletsLeft );
01511 
01512                               // Try playing sound...
01513                               pSoldier->iBurstSoundID = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( (STR8) zBurstString, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );                 
01514                         }
01515                         else
01516                         {
01517                               // Pick sound file baed on how many bullets we are going to fire...
01518                     // Lesh: changed next line
01519                               sprintf( (char *)zBurstString, (const char*)gzBurstSndStrings[ Weapon[ usItemNum ].sBurstSound ], pSoldier->bBulletsLeft );
01520 
01521                               INT8 volume = HIGHVOLUME;
01522                               if ( noisefactor < 100 ) volume = (volume * noisefactor) / 100;
01523                               // Try playing sound...
01524                               pSoldier->iBurstSoundID = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( (STR8) zBurstString, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( (INT8) volume, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );              
01525                         }
01526 
01527                         /*
01528                         //DIGICRAB: We don't need this anymore, because of the burst sound modification
01529                         //    If we don't have the burst sound, a normal shot will be played for each shot  
01530                         if ( pSoldier->iBurstSoundID == NO_SAMPLE )
01531                         {
01532                               // If failed, play normal default....
01533                               pSoldier->iBurstSoundID = PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ usItemNum ].sBurstSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );             
01534                         }
01535                         */
01536                   }
01537 
01538                   DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
01539             }
01540 
01541       }
01542       else
01543       {
01544             // ONLY DEDUCT FOR THE FIRST HAND when doing two-pistol attacks
01545             if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bGunStatus >= USABLE && pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bGunAmmoStatus > 0 )
01546             {
01547                   // only deduct APs when the main gun fires
01548                   if ( pSoldier->ubAttackingHand == HANDPOS )
01549                   {
01550                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
01551                   }                       
01552             }
01553             else
01554             {
01555                   DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
01556             }
01557 
01558             //PLAY SOUND
01559             // ( For throwing knife.. it's earlier in the animation
01560             if ( Weapon[ usItemNum ].sSound != NO_WEAPON_SOUND && Item[ usItemNum ].usItemClass != IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01561             {
01562                   // Switch on silencer...
01563                   UINT16 noisefactor = GetPercentNoiseVolume( &pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ] );
01564                   if( noisefactor < MAX_PERCENT_NOISE_VOLUME_FOR_SILENCED_SOUND || Weapon[ usItemNum ].ubAttackVolume <= 10 )
01565                   {
01566                         INT32 uiSound;
01567 
01568                         uiSound = Weapon [ usItemNum ].silencedSound ;
01569                         //if ( Weapon[ usItemNum ].ubCalibre == AMMO9 || Weapon[ usItemNum ].ubCalibre == AMMO38 || Weapon[ usItemNum ].ubCalibre == AMMO57 )
01570                         //{
01571                         //    uiSound = S_SILENCER_1;
01572                         //}
01573                         //else
01574                         //{
01575                         //    uiSound = S_SILENCER_2;
01576                         //}
01577 
01578                         PlayJA2Sample( uiSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );               
01579                         
01580                   }
01581                   else
01582                   {
01583                         INT8 volume = HIGHVOLUME;
01584                         if ( noisefactor < 100 ) volume = (volume * noisefactor) / 100;
01585                         PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ usItemNum ].sSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( volume, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );                  
01586                   }
01587             }
01588       }
01589 
01590 
01591       // CALC CHANCE TO HIT
01592       if ( Item[ usItemNum ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01593       {
01594         uiHitChance = CalcThrownChanceToHit( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bAimTime, pSoldier->bAimShotLocation );
01595       }
01596       else
01597       {
01598         uiHitChance = CalcChanceToHitGun( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bAimTime, pSoldier->bAimShotLocation );
01599       }
01600 
01601       //DIGICRAB: Barrel extender wear code
01602       // Relocated from CalcChanceToHitGun
01603       if ( Item[ usItemNum ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
01604       {
01605             INT8 bAttachPos;
01606             OBJECTTYPE * pInHand;
01607             pInHand = &(pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand]);
01608             UINT32 item;
01609             //item = FindRangeBonusAttachment(pInHand);
01610             //bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pInHand, item );
01611 
01612             // lalien: search for barrel extender not for any item with range bonus. (else barrel extender will fall off even when none is attached)
01613             bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pInHand, GUN_BARREL_EXTENDER );
01614 
01615             if ( bAttachPos != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01616             {
01617                   item = Item[pInHand->usAttachItem[bAttachPos]].uiIndex;
01618 
01619                   // reduce status and see if it falls off
01620                   pInHand->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ] -= (INT8) Random( 2 );
01621 
01622                   if ( pInHand->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ] - Random( 35 ) - Random( 35 ) < USABLE )
01623                   {
01624                         // barrel extender falls off!
01625                         OBJECTTYPE Temp;
01626 
01627                         // since barrel extenders are not removable we cannot call RemoveAttachment here
01628                         // and must create the item by hand
01629                         CreateItem( item, pInHand->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ], &Temp );
01630                         pInHand->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] = NOTHING;
01631                         pInHand->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ] = 0;
01632 
01633                         // drop it to ground
01634                         AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &Temp, 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0, -1 );
01635 
01636                         // big penalty to hit
01637                         if(uiHitChance < 30)
01638                               uiHitChance = MINCHANCETOHIT;
01639                         else
01640                               uiHitChance -= 30;
01641 
01642                         // curse!
01643                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM )
01644                         {
01645                               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
01646 
01647                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 46 ], pSoldier->name );
01648                         }
01649                   }
01650             }
01651       }
01652 
01653 
01654       //ATE: Added if we are in meanwhile, we always hit...
01655       if ( AreInMeanwhile( ) )
01656       {
01657             uiHitChance = 100;
01658       }
01659 
01660       // ROLL DICE
01661       uiDiceRoll = PreRandom( 100 );
01662 
01663       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01664       if ( gfReportHitChances )
01665       {
01666             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Hit chance was %ld, roll %ld (range %d)", uiHitChance, uiDiceRoll, PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sTargetGridNo ) );
01667       }
01668       #endif
01669 
01670       fGonnaHit = uiDiceRoll <= uiHitChance;
01671 
01672       // GET TARGET XY VALUES
01673   ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sTargetGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
01674 
01675       // ATE; Moved a whole blotch if logic code for finding target positions to a function
01676       // so other places can use it
01677       GetTargetWorldPositions( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, &dTargetX, &dTargetY, &dTargetZ );
01678 
01679       // Some things we don't do for knives...
01680       if ( Item[ usItemNum ].usItemClass != IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01681       {
01682             // If realtime - set counter to freeup from attacking once done
01683             if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
01684             {
01685 
01686                   // Set delay based on stats, weapon type, etc
01687                   pSoldier->sReloadDelay  = (INT16)( Weapon[ usItemNum ].usReloadDelay + MANDATORY_WEAPON_DELAY );
01688 
01689                   // If a bad guy, double the delay!
01690                   if ( (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ENEMY ) )
01691                   {
01692                         pSoldier->sReloadDelay  = ( pSoldier->sReloadDelay * 2 );
01693                   }
01694 
01695                   
01696                   // slow down demo mode!
01697                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & DEMOMODE )
01698                   {
01699                         pSoldier->sReloadDelay *= 2;
01700                   }
01701 
01702                   //pSoldier->fReloading        = TRUE;
01703                   //RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->ReloadCounter, pSoldier->sReloadDelay );
01704             }
01705 
01706             // Deduct AMMO!
01707             DeductAmmo( pSoldier, pSoldier->ubAttackingHand );
01708 
01709             // ATE: Check if we should say quote...
01710             if ( pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft == 0 && !Item[pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon].rocketlauncher ) 
01711             {
01712                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01713                   {
01714                         pSoldier->fSayAmmoQuotePending = TRUE;
01715                   }
01716             }
01717 
01718             // NB bDoBurst will be 2 at this point for the first shot since it was incremented
01719             // above
01720             if ( PTR_OURTEAM && pSoldier->ubTargetID != NOBODY && (!pSoldier->bDoBurst || pSoldier->bDoBurst == 2 ) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( SoldierToSoldierBodyPartChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ], pSoldier->bAimShotLocation ) > 0 ) )
01721             {
01722                   if ( fGonnaHit )
01723                   {
01724                         // grant extra exp for hitting a difficult target
01725                         usExpGain += (UINT8) (100 - uiHitChance) / 25;
01726 
01727                         if ( pSoldier->bAimTime && !pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01728                         {
01729                               // gain extra exp for aiming, up to the amount from 
01730                               // the difficulty of the shot
01731                               usExpGain += __min( pSoldier->bAimTime, usExpGain );
01732                         }
01733 
01734                         // base pts extra for hitting
01735                         usExpGain   += 3;
01736                   }
01737 
01738                   // add base pts for taking a shot, whether it hits or misses
01739                   usExpGain += 3;
01740 
01741                   if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bGunStatus >= USABLE && pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bGunAmmoStatus > 0 )
01742                   {
01743                         // reduce exp gain for two pistol shooting since both shots give xp
01744                         usExpGain = (usExpGain * 2) / 3;
01745                   }
01746 
01747                   if ( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->ubBodyType == COW || MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->ubBodyType == CROW )
01748                   {
01749                         usExpGain /= 2;
01750                   }
01751                   else if ( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE || AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ] ) || TANK( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ] ) )
01752                   {
01753                         // no exp from shooting a vehicle that you can't damage and can't move! 
01754                         usExpGain = 0;
01755                   }
01756 
01757                   // MARKSMANSHIP GAIN: gun attack
01758                   StatChange( pSoldier, MARKAMT, usExpGain, ( UINT8 )( fGonnaHit ? FALSE : FROM_FAILURE ) );                        
01759             }
01760 
01761             // set buckshot and muzzle flash
01762             fBuckshot = FALSE;
01763             if (!CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
01764             {
01765                   if ( IsFlashSuppressor(&pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ], pSoldier ) )
01766                         pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
01767                   else
01768                         pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = TRUE;
01769 
01770                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("UseGun: Muzzle flash = %d",pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash));
01771 
01772                   if ( AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].numberOfBullets > 1 )
01773                         fBuckshot = TRUE;
01774 
01775                   //switch ( pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType )
01776                   //{
01777                   //    case AMMO_BUCKSHOT:
01778                   //          fBuckshot = TRUE;
01779                   //          break;
01780                   //    case AMMO_SLEEP_DART:
01781                   //          pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
01782                   //          break;
01783                   //    default:
01784                   //          break;
01785                   //}
01786             }
01787       }
01788       else  //  throwing knife
01789       {
01790             fBuckshot = FALSE;
01791             pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
01792 
01793             // Deduct knife from inv! (not here, later?)
01794 
01795             // Improve for using a throwing knife....
01796             if (PTR_OURTEAM && pSoldier->ubTargetID != NOBODY)
01797             {
01798                   if ( fGonnaHit )
01799                   {
01800                         // grant extra exp for hitting a difficult target
01801                         usExpGain += (UINT8) (100 - uiHitChance) / 10;
01802 
01803                         if (pSoldier->bAimTime)
01804                         {
01805                               // gain extra exp for aiming, up to the amount from 
01806                               // the difficulty of the throw
01807                               usExpGain += ( 2 * __min( pSoldier->bAimTime, usExpGain ) );
01808                         }
01809 
01810                         // base pts extra for hitting
01811                         usExpGain   += 10;
01812                   }
01813 
01814                   // add base pts for taking a shot, whether it hits or misses
01815                   usExpGain += 10;
01816 
01817                   if ( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->ubBodyType == COW || MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->ubBodyType == CROW )
01818                   {
01819                         usExpGain /= 2;
01820                   }
01821                   else if ( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE || AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ] ) || TANK( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ] ) )
01822                   {
01823                         // no exp from shooting a vehicle that you can't damage and can't move! 
01824                         usExpGain = 0;
01825                   }
01826 
01827                   // MARKSMANSHIP/DEXTERITY GAIN: throwing knife attack
01828                   StatChange( pSoldier, MARKAMT, ( UINT16 )( usExpGain / 2 ), ( UINT8 )( fGonnaHit ? FALSE : FROM_FAILURE ) );                        
01829                   StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, ( UINT16 )( usExpGain / 2 ), ( UINT8 )( fGonnaHit ? FALSE : FROM_FAILURE ) );                        
01830             }
01831       }
01832 
01833       if ( Item[usItemNum].rocketlauncher  )
01834       {
01835     if ( WillExplosiveWeaponFail( pSoldier, &( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) ) )
01836     {
01837             if ( Item[usItemNum].singleshotrocketlauncher  )
01838             {
01839                   CreateItem( Item[usItemNum].discardedlauncheritem , pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bStatus[ 0 ],&(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) );
01840                   DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01841                   IgniteExplosion( pSoldier->ubID, (INT16)CenterX( pSoldier->sGridNo ), (INT16)CenterY( pSoldier->sGridNo ), 0, pSoldier->sGridNo, C1, pSoldier->bLevel );
01842             }
01843             else
01844             {
01845                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("StructureHit: RPG7 item: %d, Ammo: %d",pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem , pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usGunAmmoItem ) );
01846                   
01847                   IgniteExplosion( pSoldier->ubID, (INT16)CenterX( pSoldier->sGridNo ), (INT16)CenterY( pSoldier->sGridNo ), 0, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].usGunAmmoItem, pSoldier->bLevel );
01848                   pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
01849             }
01850       // Reduce again for attack end 'cause it has been incremented for a normal attack
01851       // 
01852               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - ATTACK ANIMATION %s ENDED BY BAD EXPLOSIVE CHECK, Now %d", gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].zAnimStr, gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount ) );
01853               ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
01854 
01855       return( FALSE );
01856     }
01857   }
01858 
01859 
01860       FireBulletGivenTarget( pSoldier, dTargetX, dTargetY, dTargetZ, pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon, (UINT16) (uiHitChance - uiDiceRoll), fBuckshot, FALSE );
01861 
01862       ubVolume = Weapon[ pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon ].ubAttackVolume;
01863 
01864       if ( Item[ usItemNum ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01865       {
01866             // Here, remove the knife...  or (for now) rocket launcher  
01867             RemoveObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), 1 );
01868             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01869       }
01870       else if ( Item[usItemNum].rocketlauncher ) 
01871       {
01872             if ( Item[usItemNum].singleshotrocketlauncher )
01873             {
01874                   CreateItem( Item[usItemNum].discardedlauncheritem, pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bStatus[ 0 ], &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) );
01875                   DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01876             }
01877 
01878             // Direction to center of explosion
01879             ubDirection = gOppositeDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ];
01880             sNewGridNo  = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT16)(1 * DirectionInc( ubDirection ) ) );
01881 
01882             // Check if a person exists here and is not prone....
01883             ubMerc = WhoIsThere2( sNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
01884 
01885             if ( ubMerc != NOBODY )
01886             {
01887                   if ( gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[ ubMerc ]->usAnimState ].ubHeight != ANIM_PRONE )
01888                   {
01889                         // Increment attack counter...
01890                         gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
01891                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Incrementing Attack: Exaust from LAW", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount ) );
01892 
01893                         EVENT_SoldierGotHit( MercPtrs[ ubMerc ], MINI_GRENADE, 10, 200, pSoldier->bDirection, 0, pSoldier->ubID, 0, ANIM_CROUCH, 0, sNewGridNo );
01894                   }
01895             }
01896       }
01897       else
01898       {
01899             // Snap: get cumulative noise reduction from the weapon and its attachments
01900             UINT16 noisefactor = GetPercentNoiseVolume( &pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ] );
01901             if ( ubVolume * noisefactor > 25000 )
01902             { // Snap: hack this to prevent overflow (damn miserly programmers!)
01903                   ubVolume = 250;
01904             }
01905             else
01906             {
01907                   ubVolume = __max( 1, ( ubVolume * GetPercentNoiseVolume( &pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ] ) ) / 100 );
01908             }
01909       }
01910 
01911       MakeNoise( pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->bOverTerrainType, ubVolume, NOISE_GUNFIRE );
01912 
01913       if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01914       {
01915             // done, if bursting, increment
01916             pSoldier->bDoBurst++;
01917       }
01918 
01919       // CJC: since jamming is no longer affected by reliability, increase chance of status going down for really unreliabile guns
01920       INT16 ammoReliability = 0; // Madd: ammo reliability affects gun
01921 
01922       if ( Item[usItemNum].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
01923       {
01924             OBJECTTYPE *pGun = &(pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand]);
01925             ammoReliability = Item[pGun->usGunAmmoItem].bReliability;         
01926       }
01927 
01928       uiDepreciateTest = BASIC_DEPRECIATE_CHANCE + 3 * (Item[ usItemNum ].bReliability + ammoReliability);
01929 
01930       if ( !PreRandom( uiDepreciateTest ) && ( pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].bStatus[0] > 1) )
01931       {
01932             pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].bStatus[ 0 ]--;        
01933       }
01934 
01935       // reduce monster smell (gunpowder smell)
01936       if ( pSoldier->bMonsterSmell > 0 && Random( 2 ) == 0 )
