01937       {
01938             pSoldier->bMonsterSmell--;
01939       }
01940 
01941 //<SB> manual recharge
01942       if (Weapon[Item[usItemNum].ubClassIndex].APsToReloadManually > 0)
01943             pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunState &= ~GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER;
01944 //<SB>
01945       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("UseGun: done"));
01946       return( TRUE );
01947 }
01948 
01949 BOOLEAN UseBlade( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier , INT16 sTargetGridNo )
01950 {
01951       SOLDIERTYPE *                       pTargetSoldier;
01952       INT32                                           iHitChance, iDiceRoll;
01953       INT16                                           sXMapPos, sYMapPos;     
01954       INT16                                           sAPCost;
01955       EV_S_WEAPONHIT                SWeaponHit;
01956       INT32                                           iImpact, iImpactForCrits;
01957       BOOLEAN                                         fGonnaHit = FALSE;
01958       UINT16                                          usExpGain = 0;
01959       INT8                                            bMaxDrop;
01960       BOOLEAN                                         fSurpriseAttack;
01961       
01962       // Deduct points!
01963       sAPCost = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, FALSE, pSoldier->bAimTime );
01964 
01965       DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
01966       
01967       // GET TARGET XY VALUES
01968       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sTargetGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
01969 
01970       // See if a guy is here!
01971       pTargetSoldier = SimpleFindSoldier( sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
01972       if ( pTargetSoldier )
01973       {     
01974             // set target as noticed attack
01975             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_ATTACK_NOTICED;
01976             pTargetSoldier->fIntendedTarget = TRUE;
01977 
01978             // SAVE OPP ID
01979             pSoldier->ubOppNum = pTargetSoldier->ubID;
01980 
01981             // CHECK IF BUDDY KNOWS ABOUT US
01982             if ( pTargetSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN || pTargetSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || pTargetSoldier->bCollapsed )
01983             {
01984                   iHitChance = 100;
01985                   fSurpriseAttack = TRUE;
01986             }
01987             else
01988             {
01989                   iHitChance = CalcChanceToStab( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, pSoldier->bAimTime );
01990                   fSurpriseAttack = FALSE;
01991             }
01992 
01993             // ROLL DICE
01994             iDiceRoll = (INT32) PreRandom( 100 );
01995             //sprintf( gDebugStr, "Hit Chance: %d %d", (int)uiHitChance, uiDiceRoll );
01996 
01997 
01998             if ( iDiceRoll <= iHitChance )
01999             {
02000                   fGonnaHit = TRUE;
02001 
02002                   // CALCULATE DAMAGE!
02003                   // attack HITS, calculate damage (base damage is 1-maximum knife sImpact)
02004                   iImpact = HTHImpact( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, (iHitChance - iDiceRoll), TRUE );
02005 
02006                   // modify this by the knife's condition (if it's dull, not much good)
02007                   iImpact = ( iImpact * WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand].bStatus[0]) ) / 100;
02008 
02009                   // modify by hit location
02010                   AdjustImpactByHitLocation( iImpact, pSoldier->bAimShotLocation, &iImpact, &iImpactForCrits );
02011 
02012                   // bonus for surprise
02013                   if ( fSurpriseAttack ) 
02014                   {
02015                         iImpact = (iImpact * 3) / 2;
02016                   }
02017 
02018                   // any successful hit does at LEAST 1 pt minimum damage
02019                   if (iImpact < 1)
02020                   {
02021                         iImpact = 1;
02022                   }
02023 
02024                   if ( pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].bStatus[ 0 ] > USABLE )
02025                   {
02026                         bMaxDrop = (iImpact / 20);
02027 
02028                         // the duller they get, the slower they get any worse...
02029                         bMaxDrop = __min( bMaxDrop, pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].bStatus[ 0 ] / 10 );
02030 
02031                         // as long as its still > USABLE, it drops another point 1/2 the time
02032                         bMaxDrop = __max( bMaxDrop, 2 );
02033 
02034                         pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].bStatus[ 0 ] -= (INT8) Random( bMaxDrop );     // 0 to (maxDrop - 1)
02035                   }
02036 
02037                   // Send event for getting hit
02038                   memset( &(SWeaponHit), 0, sizeof( SWeaponHit ) );
02039                   SWeaponHit.usSoldierID              = pTargetSoldier->ubID;
02040                   SWeaponHit.uiUniqueId       = pTargetSoldier->uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
02041                   SWeaponHit.usWeaponIndex            = pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon;
02042                   SWeaponHit.sDamage                              = (INT16) iImpact;
02043                   SWeaponHit.usDirection              = GetDirectionFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, pTargetSoldier );
02044                   SWeaponHit.sXPos                                = (INT16)pTargetSoldier->dXPos;
02045                   SWeaponHit.sYPos                                = (INT16)pTargetSoldier->dYPos;
02046                   SWeaponHit.sZPos                                = 20;
02047                   SWeaponHit.sRange                               = 1;
02048                   SWeaponHit.ubAttackerID             = pSoldier->ubID;
02049                   SWeaponHit.fHit                                       = TRUE;
02050                   SWeaponHit.ubSpecial                      = FIRE_WEAPON_NO_SPECIAL;
02051                   AddGameEvent( S_WEAPONHIT, (UINT16) 20, &SWeaponHit );                        
02052             }
02053             else
02054             {
02055                   // if it was another team shooting at someone under our control
02056                   if ( (pSoldier->bTeam != Menptr[ pTargetSoldier->ubID ].bTeam ) )
02057                   {
02058                         if (pTargetSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
02059                         {
02060                          // AGILITY GAIN (10):  Target avoids a knife attack
02061                          // Snap: stat gains should match stat requirements
02062                          StatChange( MercPtrs[ pTargetSoldier->ubID ], DEXTAMT, 15, FALSE);
02063                          StatChange( MercPtrs[ pTargetSoldier->ubID ], AGILAMT, 5, FALSE);
02064                          StatChange( MercPtrs[ pTargetSoldier->ubID ], STRAMT, 5, FALSE);
02065                         }
02066                   }
02067                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - missed in knife attack") );
02068                   FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) pSoldier->ubID );
02069             }
02070       
02071             if ( PTR_OURTEAM && pSoldier->ubTargetID != NOBODY)
02072             {
02073                   if ( fGonnaHit )
02074                   {
02075                         // grant extra exp for hitting a difficult target
02076                         usExpGain += (UINT8) (100 - iHitChance) / 10;
02077 
02078                         if (pSoldier->bAimTime)
02079                         {
02080                               // gain extra exp for aiming, up to the amount from 
02081                               // the difficulty of the attack
02082                               usExpGain += ( 2 * __min( pSoldier->bAimTime, usExpGain ) );
02083                         }
02084 
02085                         // base pts extra for hitting
02086                         usExpGain   += 10;
02087                   }
02088 
02089                   // add base pts for taking a shot, whether it hits or misses
02090                   usExpGain += 10;
02091                   
02092                   if ( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->ubBodyType == COW || MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->ubBodyType == CROW )
02093                   {
02094                         usExpGain /= 2;
02095                   }
02096                   else if ( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE || AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ] ) || TANK( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubTargetID ] ) )
02097                   {
02098                         // no exp from shooting a vehicle that you can't damage and can't move! 
02099                         usExpGain = 0;
02100                   }
02101 
02102                   // DEXTERITY GAIN:  Made a knife attack, successful or not
02103                   StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, usExpGain, ( UINT8 )( fGonnaHit ? FALSE : FROM_FAILURE ) );                        
02104                   StatChange( pSoldier, AGILAMT, usExpGain/3, ( UINT8 )( fGonnaHit ? FALSE : FROM_FAILURE ) );                      
02105                   StatChange( pSoldier, STRAMT, usExpGain/3, ( UINT8 )( fGonnaHit ? FALSE : FROM_FAILURE ) );                       
02106             }
02107       }
02108       else
02109       {
02110             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - missed in knife attack") );
02111             FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) pSoldier->ubID );
02112       }
02113 
02114       // possibly reduce monster smell
02115       if ( pSoldier->bMonsterSmell > 0 && Random( 5 ) == 0 )
02116       {
02117             pSoldier->bMonsterSmell--;
02118       }
02119 
02120 
02121       return( TRUE );
02122 }
02123 
02124 
02125 BOOLEAN UseHandToHand( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo, BOOLEAN fStealing )
02126 {
02127       SOLDIERTYPE                   *     pTargetSoldier;
02128       INT32                                           iHitChance, iDiceRoll;
02129       INT16                                           sXMapPos, sYMapPos;     
02130       INT16                                           sAPCost;
02131       EV_S_WEAPONHIT                SWeaponHit;
02132       INT32                                           iImpact;
02133       UINT16                                          usOldItem;
02134       UINT8                                           ubExpGain;
02135       UINT8                         ubIndexRet;
02136       BOOLEAN                             fFailure;
02137       // Deduct points!
02138       // August 13 2002: unless stealing - APs already deducted elsewhere
02139 
02140 //    if (!fStealing)
02141       {
02142             sAPCost = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, FALSE, pSoldier->bAimTime );
02143 
02144             DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
02145       }
02146       
02147       // See if a guy is here!
02148       pTargetSoldier = SimpleFindSoldier( sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
02149       if ( pTargetSoldier )
02150       {     
02151             // set target as noticed attack
02152             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_ATTACK_NOTICED;
02153             pTargetSoldier->fIntendedTarget = TRUE;
02154 
02155             // SAVE OPP ID
02156             pSoldier->ubOppNum = pTargetSoldier->ubID;
02157 
02158             if (fStealing)
02159             {
02160                   if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pTargetSoldier ) || TANK( pTargetSoldier ) || CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pTargetSoldier ) || TANK( pTargetSoldier ) )
02161                   {
02162                         iHitChance = 0;
02163                   }
02164                   else if ( pTargetSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN )
02165                   {
02166                         // give bonus for surprise, but not so much as struggle would still occur
02167                         iHitChance = CalcChanceToSteal( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, pSoldier->bAimTime ) + 20;
02168                   }
02169                   else if ( pTargetSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || pTargetSoldier->bCollapsed )
02170                   {
02171                         iHitChance = 100;
02172                   }
02173                   else
02174                   {
02175                         iHitChance = CalcChanceToSteal( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, pSoldier->bAimTime );
02176                   }
02177             }
02178             else
02179             {
02180                   if ( pTargetSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN || pTargetSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || pTargetSoldier->bCollapsed )
02181                   {
02182                         iHitChance = 100;
02183                   }
02184                   else
02185                   {
02186                         iHitChance = CalcChanceToPunch( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, pSoldier->bAimTime );
02187                   }
02188             }
02189 
02190             // ROLL DICE
02191             iDiceRoll = (INT32) PreRandom( 100 );
02192             //sprintf( gDebugStr, "Hit Chance: %d %d", (int)uiHitChance, uiDiceRoll );
02193 
02194             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02195             if ( gfReportHitChances )
02196             {
02197                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Hit chance was %ld, roll %ld", iHitChance, iDiceRoll );
02198             }
02199             #endif
02200 
02201             // GET TARGET XY VALUES
02202             ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sTargetGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
02203 
02204 if (fStealing )
02205             {
02206                   fFailure=FALSE;
02207                   if ( iDiceRoll <= iHitChance )
02208                   {
02209                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTargetSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && !(pTargetSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pTargetSoldier ) && !TANK( pTargetSoldier ) )
02210                         {
02211                               // made a steal; give experience
02212                               StatChange( pSoldier, STRAMT, 8, FALSE );
02213                               StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, 3, FALSE );
02214                               StatChange( pSoldier, AGILAMT, 3, FALSE );
02215                         }
02216                         if (( iDiceRoll <= iHitChance * 2 / 3) || (pTargetSoldier->bCollapsed))
02217                         {
02218                               if (StealItems(pSoldier, pTargetSoldier,&ubIndexRet) == 1)
02219                               {
02220                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[ STR_STOLE_SOMETHING ], pSoldier->name, ShortItemNames[ pTargetSoldier->inv[ubIndexRet].usItem ] );
02221                                     if (!AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &(pTargetSoldier->inv[ubIndexRet]), TRUE ))
02222                                           AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &(pTargetSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0, -1 );
02223                                     DeleteObj( &(pTargetSoldier->inv[ubIndexRet]) );
02224                               }
02225                         }
02226                         else if ( pTargetSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem != NOTHING )
02227                         {
02228                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[ STR_STOLE_SOMETHING ], pSoldier->name, ShortItemNames[ pTargetSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ] );
02229                               usOldItem = pTargetSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
02230                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02231                               {
02232                                     DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
02233                               }
02234 
02235                               // Item dropped somewhere... roll based on the same chance to determine where!
02236                               iDiceRoll = (INT32) PreRandom( 100 );
02237                               if (iDiceRoll < iHitChance)
02238                               {
02239                                     // Drop item in the our tile
02240                                     AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &(pTargetSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0, -1 );
02241                               }
02242                               else
02243                               {
02244                                     // Drop item in the target's tile
02245                                     AddItemToPool( pTargetSoldier->sGridNo, &(pTargetSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0, -1 );
02246                               }
02247                               DeleteObj( &(pTargetSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) );
02248                               // Reload buddy's animation...
02249                               ReLoadSoldierAnimationDueToHandItemChange( pTargetSoldier, usOldItem, NOTHING );
02250                         }
02251                         else
02252                         {
02253                               fFailure=TRUE;
02254                         }
02255                         // Reload buddy's animation...
02256                         //ReLoadSoldierAnimationDueToHandItemChange( pTargetSoldier, usOldItem, NOTHING );
02257                   }
02258                   else
02259                   {
02260                         fFailure=TRUE;
02261                   }
02262                   if (fFailure)
02263                   {
02264                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, 
02265                               Message[ STR_FAILED_TO_STEAL_SOMETHING ], 
02266                               pSoldier->name, ShortItemNames[ pTargetSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ] );
02267                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02268                         {
02269                               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
02270                         }
02271 
02272                         if ( iHitChance > 0 && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTargetSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && !(pTargetSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pTargetSoldier ) && !TANK( pTargetSoldier ) )
02273                         {     
02274                               // failed a steal; give some experience
02275                               StatChange( pSoldier, STRAMT, 4, FROM_FAILURE );
02276                               StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, 1, FROM_FAILURE );
02277                               StatChange( pSoldier, AGILAMT, 1, FROM_FAILURE );
02278                         }
02279 
02280                   }
02281 
02282                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02283                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - steal") );
02284                   #endif
02285                   FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) pSoldier->ubID );
02286 
02287             }
02288             else
02289             {
02290 
02291                   // ATE/CC: if doing ninja spin kick (only), automatically make it a hit
02292                   if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == NINJA_SPINKICK)
02293                   {
02294                         // Let him to succeed by a random amount
02295                         iDiceRoll = PreRandom( iHitChance );
02296                   }
02297 
02298                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTargetSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
02299                   {     
02300                         // made an HTH attack; give experience
02301                         if ( iDiceRoll <= iHitChance )
02302                         {
02303                               ubExpGain = 8;
02304 
02305                               if ( pTargetSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE || AM_A_ROBOT( pTargetSoldier ) || TANK( pTargetSoldier ) )
02306                               {
02307                                     ubExpGain = 0;
02308                               }
02309                               else if ( pTargetSoldier->ubBodyType == COW || pTargetSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
02310                               {
02311                                     ubExpGain /= 2;
02312                               }
02313                               
02314 
02315                               StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, ubExpGain, FALSE );
02316                               StatChange( pSoldier, STRAMT,  (ubExpGain+1)/3, FALSE );
02317                               StatChange( pSoldier, AGILAMT, (ubExpGain+1)/3, FALSE );
02318                         }
02319                         else
02320                         {
02321                               ubExpGain = 4;
02322 
02323                               if ( pTargetSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE || AM_A_ROBOT( pTargetSoldier ) || TANK( pTargetSoldier ) )
02324                               {
02325                                     ubExpGain = 0;
02326                               }
02327                               else if ( pTargetSoldier->ubBodyType == COW || pTargetSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
02328                               {
02329                                     ubExpGain /= 2;
02330                               }
02331 
02332 
02333                               StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, ubExpGain, FALSE );
02334                               StatChange( pSoldier, STRAMT,  (ubExpGain+1)/3, FALSE );
02335                               StatChange( pSoldier, AGILAMT, (ubExpGain+1)/3, FALSE );
02336                         }
02337                   }
02338                   else if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && pTargetSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02339                   {
02340                         // being attacked... if successfully dodged, give experience
02341                         if ( iDiceRoll > iHitChance )
02342                         {
02343                               StatChange( pTargetSoldier, DEXTAMT, 8, FALSE );
02344                               StatChange( pTargetSoldier, STRAMT, 3, FALSE );
02345                               StatChange( pTargetSoldier, AGILAMT, 3, FALSE );
02346                         }
02347                   }
02348 
02349                   if ( iDiceRoll <= iHitChance || AreInMeanwhile( ) )
02350                   {
02351                         // CALCULATE DAMAGE!
02352                         iImpact = HTHImpact( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, (iHitChance - iDiceRoll), FALSE );
02353 
02354                         // Send event for getting hit
02355                         memset( &(SWeaponHit), 0, sizeof( SWeaponHit ) );
02356                         SWeaponHit.usSoldierID              = pTargetSoldier->ubID;
02357                         SWeaponHit.usWeaponIndex            = pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon;
02358                         SWeaponHit.sDamage                              = (INT16) iImpact;
02359                         SWeaponHit.usDirection              = GetDirectionFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, pTargetSoldier );
02360                         SWeaponHit.sXPos                                = (INT16)pTargetSoldier->dXPos;
02361                         SWeaponHit.sYPos                                = (INT16)pTargetSoldier->dYPos;
02362                         SWeaponHit.sZPos                                = 20;
02363                         SWeaponHit.sRange                               = 1;
02364                         SWeaponHit.ubAttackerID             = pSoldier->ubID;
02365                         SWeaponHit.fHit                                       = TRUE;
02366                         SWeaponHit.ubSpecial                      = FIRE_WEAPON_NO_SPECIAL;
02367                         AddGameEvent( S_WEAPONHIT, (UINT16) 20, &SWeaponHit );                        
02368                   }
02369                   else
02370                   {
02371                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - missed in HTH attack") );
02372                         FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) pSoldier->ubID );
02373                   }
02374             }
02375       }
02376 
02377       // possibly reduce monster smell (gunpowder smell)
02378       if ( pSoldier->bMonsterSmell > 0 && Random( 5 ) == 0 )
02379       {
02380             pSoldier->bMonsterSmell--;
02381       }
02382 
02383 
02384       return( TRUE );
02385 }
02386 
02387 BOOLEAN UseThrown( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo )
02388 {
02389       UINT32                  uiHitChance, uiDiceRoll;
02390       INT8              bLoop;
02391       UINT8             ubTargetID;
02392       SOLDIERTYPE *     pTargetSoldier;
02393       INT16             sAPCost = 0;
02394 
02395       uiHitChance = CalcThrownChanceToHit( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bAimTime, AIM_SHOT_TORSO );
02396 
02397       uiDiceRoll = PreRandom( 100 );
02398 
02399       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02400       if ( gfReportHitChances )
02401       {
02402             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Hit chance was %ld, roll %ld (range %d)", uiHitChance, uiDiceRoll, PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sTargetGridNo ) );
02403       }
02404       #endif
02405 
02406       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
02407       {
02408             // check target gridno
02409             ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( pSoldier->sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
02410             if ( ubTargetID == NOBODY )
02411             {
02412                   pTargetSoldier = NULL;
02413             }
02414             else
02415             {
02416                   pTargetSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ];
02417             }
02418             
02419             if ( pTargetSoldier && pTargetSoldier->bTeam == pSoldier->bTeam )
02420             {
02421                   // ignore!
02422                   pTargetSoldier = NULL;
02423             }
02424 
02425             // Snap: Find the number of real targets for grenade attack
02426             UINT16 usNumTargets = 0;
02427             if ( pTargetSoldier != NULL )
02428             {
02429                   usNumTargets++;
02430             }
02431                   // search for an opponent near the target gridno
02432                   for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; bLoop++ )
02433                   {
02434                         ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( NewGridNo( pSoldier->sTargetGridNo, DirectionInc( bLoop ) ), pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
02435                         pTargetSoldier = NULL;
02436                         if ( ubTargetID != NOBODY )
02437                         {
02438                               pTargetSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ];
02439                               if ( pTargetSoldier->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam )
02440                               {
02441                                     usNumTargets++;
02442                         }
02443                   }
02444             }
02445 
02446             if ( usNumTargets )
02447             {
02448                   // ok this is a real attack on someone, grant experience
02449                   // Snap: calculate experience points for strength: weight x distance
02450                   UINT16 usHandItem = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
02451                   // calculate actual range (in world units)
02452                   INT32 iRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sTargetGridNo );
02453                   // 10 points for a regular grenade thrown at 100 units (1 cell = 10 units)
02454                   UINT16 usExpGain = ( Item[usHandItem].ubWeight * iRange + 30) / 60;
02455                   StatChange( pSoldier, STRAMT, usExpGain, FALSE );
02456 
02457                   // Snap: calculate experience points for dexterity and marksmanship
02458                   usExpGain = 5     // For at least one target
02459                         + 2*(usNumTargets-1);   // For every additional target
02460                   BOOLEAN fGonnaHit = uiDiceRoll < uiHitChance;
02461                   if ( fGonnaHit ) usExpGain *= 2;   // For actually hitting the target :)
02462                   usExpGain += (UINT16) (100 - uiHitChance) / 10; // Extra exp for a difficult target
02463                   StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, usExpGain / 2, ( fGonnaHit ? FALSE : FROM_FAILURE ) );
02464                   StatChange( pSoldier, MARKAMT, usExpGain / 2, ( fGonnaHit ? FALSE : FROM_FAILURE ) );
02465 
02466                   /*if ( uiDiceRoll < uiHitChance )
02467                   {
02468                         usExpGain *= 2;
02469                         usExpGain += (UINT16) ( 100 - uiHitChance ) / 10;
02470                         StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, usExpGain / 2, FALSE );
02471                         StatChange( pSoldier, MARKAMT, usExpGain / 2, FALSE );
02472                   }
02473                   else
02474                   {
02475                         StatChange( pSoldier, DEXTAMT, usExpGain / 2, FROM_FAILURE );
02476                         StatChange( pSoldier, MARKAMT, usExpGain / 2, FROM_FAILURE );
02477                   }*/
02478             }
02479       }
02480 
02481       
02482       CalculateLaunchItemParamsForThrow( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel, (INT16)(pSoldier->bTargetLevel * 256 ), &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), (INT8)(uiDiceRoll - uiHitChance), THROW_ARM_ITEM, 0 );
02483 
02484       // Madd: Next 2 lines added: Deduct points!
02485 
02486       sAPCost = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, FALSE, pSoldier->bAimTime );
02487     // Kaiden: Deducting points too early, moving the line down
02488       //DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
02489 
02490       // OK, goto throw animation
02491       HandleSoldierThrowItem( pSoldier, pSoldier->sTargetGridNo );
02492     // Kaiden: Deducting points too early, moving the line down
02493       DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
02494       RemoveObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), 1 );
02495 
02496       return( TRUE );
02497 }
02498 
02499 
02500 BOOLEAN UseLauncher( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo )
02501 {
02502       UINT32                  uiHitChance, uiDiceRoll;
02503       INT16                   sAPCost = 0;
02504       INT8                    bAttachPos;
02505       OBJECTTYPE  Launchable;
02506       OBJECTTYPE * pObj;
02507       UINT16                  usItemNum;
02508   INT32       iID;
02509   REAL_OBJECT *pObject;
02510 
02511       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("UseLauncher, target = %d", sTargetGridNo) );
02512       usItemNum = pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon;
02513 
02514       if ( !EnoughAmmo( pSoldier, TRUE, pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ) )
02515       {
02516             return( FALSE );
02517       }
02518 
02519       pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]); 
02520       for (bAttachPos = 0; bAttachPos < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bAttachPos++)
02521       {
02522             if (pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] != NOTHING)
02523             {
02524                   if ( Item[ pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] ].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV )
02525                   {
02526                         break;
02527                   }
02528             }
02529       }
02530       if (bAttachPos == MAX_ATTACHMENTS)
02531       {
02532             // this should not happen!!
02533             return( FALSE );
02534       }
02535 
02536       if ( Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(pObj)].ubMagSize > 1 || ( Item[pObj->usItem].grenadelauncher && GetMagSize(pObj) > 1 ))
02537             CreateItem( pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ], 100, &Launchable );
02538       else
02539             CreateItem( pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ], pObj->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ], &Launchable );
02540       //if ( pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon == pObj->usItem )
02541       //{
02542             DeductAmmo( pSoldier, HANDPOS );
02543       //}
02544       //else
02545       //{
02546       //    // Firing an attached grenade launcher... the attachment we found above
02547       //    // is the one to remove!
02548       //    RemoveAttachment( pObj, bAttachPos, NULL );
02549       //}
02550 
02551   // ATE: Check here if the launcher should fail 'cause of bad status.....
02552   if ( WillExplosiveWeaponFail( pSoldier, pObj ) )
02553   {
02554     // Explode dude!
02555 
02556     // So we still should have ABC > 0
02557     // Begin explosion due to failure...
02558             IgniteExplosion( pSoldier->ubID, (INT16)CenterX( pSoldier->sGridNo ), (INT16)CenterY( pSoldier->sGridNo ), 0, pSoldier->sGridNo, Launchable.usItem, pSoldier->bLevel );
02559 
02560     // Reduce again for attack end 'cause it has been incremented for a normal attack
02561     // 
02562             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - ATTACK ANIMATION %s ENDED BY BAD EXPLOSIVE CHECK, Now %d", gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].zAnimStr, gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount ) );
02563             ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
02564 
02565     // So all's well, should be good from here....
02566     return( FALSE );
02567   }
02568 
02569       if ( Weapon[ usItemNum ].sSound != NO_WEAPON_SOUND  )
02570       {
02571             if (Item[ usItemNum ].usItemClass == IC_GUN  )
02572                   PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ UNDER_GLAUNCHER ].sSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );              
02573             else
02574                   PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ usItemNum ].sSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );              
02575       }
02576 
02577       uiHitChance = CalcThrownChanceToHit( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bAimTime, AIM_SHOT_TORSO );
02578 
02579       uiDiceRoll = PreRandom( 100 );
02580 
02581       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02582       if ( gfReportHitChances )
02583       {
02584             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Hit chance was %ld, roll %ld (range %d)", uiHitChance, uiDiceRoll, PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sTargetGridNo ) );
02585       }
02586       #endif
02587 
02588 
02589       if ( Item[ usItemNum ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER )
02590       {
02591             // Preserve gridno!
02592             //pSoldier->sLastTarget = sTargetGridNo;
02593 
02594             //sAPCost = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, TRUE );
02595 
02596             sAPCost = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, FALSE, 0 );
02597 
02598       }
02599       else
02600       {
02601             // Throw....
02602             sAPCost = MinAPsToThrow( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, FALSE );
02603       }
02604 
02605       if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
02606       {
02607             // ONly deduct points once
02608             if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst == 1 )
02609             {
02610                   DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
02611             }
02612       }
02613       else
02614       {
02615             DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
02616       }
02617 
02618       CalculateLaunchItemParamsForThrow( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel, 0, &Launchable, (INT8)(uiDiceRoll - uiHitChance), THROW_ARM_ITEM, 0 );
02619 
02620       iID = CreatePhysicalObject( pSoldier->pTempObject, pSoldier->pThrowParams->dLifeSpan,  pSoldier->pThrowParams->dX, pSoldier->pThrowParams->dY, pSoldier->pThrowParams->dZ, pSoldier->pThrowParams->dForceX, pSoldier->pThrowParams->dForceY, pSoldier->pThrowParams->dForceZ, pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->pThrowParams->ubActionCode, pSoldier->pThrowParams->uiActionData );
02621 
02622       pObject = &( ObjectSlots[ iID ] );
02623   //pObject->fPotentialForDebug = TRUE;
02624 
02625 
02626       MemFree( pSoldier->pTempObject );
02627       pSoldier->pTempObject = NULL;
02628 
02629       MemFree( pSoldier->pThrowParams );
02630       pSoldier->pThrowParams = NULL;
02631 
02632       if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
02633       {
02634             // done, if bursting, increment
02635             pSoldier->bDoBurst++;
02636       }
02637 
02638       return( TRUE );
02639 }
02640 
02641 BOOLEAN DoSpecialEffectAmmoMiss( UINT8 ubAttackerID, INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, INT16 sZPos, BOOLEAN fSoundOnly, BOOLEAN fFreeupAttacker, INT32 iBullet )
02642 {
02643       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
02644       UINT8                               ubAmmoType;
02645   UINT16          usItem;
02646 
02647       ubAmmoType = MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->inv[ MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType;
02648       usItem     = MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->inv[ MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->ubAttackingHand ].usItem;
02649 
02650       memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
02651 
02652       if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].explosionSize == 1 )
02653       {
02654             if ( !fSoundOnly )
02655             {
02656                   AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
02657                   AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_TOPMOST_LEVEL;
02658                   AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 100 );
02659                   AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
02660                   AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_ALWAYS_TRANSLUCENT;
02661                   AniParams.sX                                                      = sXPos;
02662                   AniParams.sY                                                      = sYPos;
02663                   AniParams.sZ                                                      = sZPos;
02664 
02665                   strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\MINIBOOM.STI" );
02666 
02667                   CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
02668 
02669                   if ( fFreeupAttacker )
02670                   {
02671                         RemoveBullet( iBullet );
02672                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - bullet hit structure - explosive ammo") );
02673                         FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) ubAttackerID );
02674                   }
02675             }
02676 
02677             if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
02678             {
02679                   PlayJA2Sample( SMALL_EXPLODE_1 , RATE_11025, SoundVolume( (INT8)HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                                
02680             }
02681             else
02682             {
02683                   PlayJA2Sample( SMALL_EXPLODE_1 , RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLE );                                  
02684             }
02685 
02686             return( TRUE );
02687       }
02688       else if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].explosionSize == 2 )
02689       {
02690             if ( !fSoundOnly )
02691             {
02692                   AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
02693                   AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_TOPMOST_LEVEL;
02694                   AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 100 );
02695                   AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
02696                   AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_ALWAYS_TRANSLUCENT;
02697                   AniParams.sX                                                      = sXPos;
02698                   AniParams.sY                                                      = sYPos;
02699                   AniParams.sZ                                                      = sZPos;
02700 
02701                   strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\ZGRAV_D.STI" );
02702 
02703                   CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
02704 
02705                   if ( fFreeupAttacker )
02706                   {
02707                         RemoveBullet( iBullet );
02708                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - bullet hit structure - explosive ammo") );
02709                         FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) ubAttackerID );
02710                   }
02711             }
02712 
02713             if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
02714             {
02715                   PlayJA2Sample( EXPLOSION_1 , RATE_11025, SoundVolume( (INT8)HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                                    
02716             }
02717             else
02718             {
02719                   PlayJA2Sample( EXPLOSION_1 , RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLE );                                
02720             }
02721 
02722             return( TRUE );
02723       }
02724       else if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].explosionSize == 3 )
02725       {
02726             if ( !fSoundOnly )
02727             {
02728                   AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
02729                   AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_TOPMOST_LEVEL;
02730                   AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 100 );
02731                   AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
02732                   AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_ALWAYS_TRANSLUCENT;
02733                   AniParams.sX                                                      = sXPos;
02734                   AniParams.sY                                                      = sYPos;
02735                   AniParams.sZ                                                      = sZPos;
02736 
02737                   strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\ZGRAV_C.STI" );
02738 
02739                   CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
02740 
02741                   if ( fFreeupAttacker )
02742                   {
02743                         RemoveBullet( iBullet );
02744                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - bullet hit structure - explosive ammo") );
02745                         FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) ubAttackerID );
02746                   }
02747             }
02748 
02749             if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
02750             {
02751                   PlayJA2Sample( EXPLOSION_BLAST_2 , RATE_11025, SoundVolume( (INT8)HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                                    
02752             }
02753             else
02754             {
02755                   PlayJA2Sample( EXPLOSION_BLAST_2 , RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLE );                                
02756             }
02757 
02758             return( TRUE );
02759       }
02760       else if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].monsterSpit )
02761       {
02762     // Increment attack busy...
02763         // gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
02764         // DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Incrementing Attack: Explosion gone off, COunt now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount ) );
02765 
02766             PlayJA2Sample( CREATURE_GAS_NOISE, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                  
02767 
02768             NewSmokeEffect( sGridNo, usItem, 0, ubAttackerID );
02769   //  // Do Spread effect.......
02770   //  switch( usItem )
02771   //  {
02772   //        case CREATURE_YOUNG_MALE_SPIT:
02773             //case CREATURE_INFANT_SPIT:
02774 
02775   //        NewSmokeEffect( sGridNo, VERY_SMALL_CREATURE_GAS, 0, ubAttackerID );
02776   //      break;
02777   //    case CREATURE_OLD_MALE_SPIT:
02778   //        NewSmokeEffect( sGridNo, SMALL_CREATURE_GAS, 0, ubAttackerID );
02779   //      break;
02780 
02781   //    case CREATURE_QUEEN_SPIT:
02782   //        NewSmokeEffect( sGridNo, LARGE_CREATURE_GAS, 0, ubAttackerID );
02783   //      break;
02784   //  }
02785   }
02786 
02787       return( FALSE );
02788 }
02789 
02790 
02791 void WeaponHit( UINT16 usSoldierID, UINT16 usWeaponIndex, INT16 sDamage, INT16 sBreathLoss, UINT16 usDirection, INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, INT16 sZPos, INT16 sRange , UINT8 ubAttackerID, BOOLEAN fHit, UINT8 ubSpecial, UINT8 ubHitLocation )
02792 {
02793       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTargetSoldier, *pSoldier;
02794 
02795       // Get attacker
02796       pSoldier                      = MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ];
02797       
02798       // Get Target
02799       pTargetSoldier    = MercPtrs[ usSoldierID ];
02800 
02801       MakeNoise( ubAttackerID, pTargetSoldier->sGridNo, pTargetSoldier->bLevel, gpWorldLevelData[pTargetSoldier->sGridNo].ubTerrainID, Weapon[ usWeaponIndex ].ubHitVolume, NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT );
02802 
02803       if ( EXPLOSIVE_GUN( usWeaponIndex ) )
02804       {
02805             // Reduce attacker count!
02806             //TODO: Madd --- I don't think this code will ever get called for the HE ammo -- the EXPLOSIVE_GUN check filters out regular guns 
02807             // marke test mag ammo type: pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType
02808                 // 2cond 'or' added
02809             if ( Item[usWeaponIndex].rocketlauncher || AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].explosionSize > 1 )
02810             {
02811                   if ( Item[usWeaponIndex].singleshotrocketlauncher )
02812                   {
02813                         IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, sXPos, sYPos, 0, (INT16) (GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sYPos, sXPos )), C1, pTargetSoldier->bLevel );
02814                   }
02815                   // changed rpg type to work only with two flags matching
02816                   else if ( !Item[usWeaponIndex].singleshotrocketlauncher && Item[usWeaponIndex].rocketlauncher)
02817                   {
02818                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("WeaponHit: RPG7 item: %d, Ammo: %d",pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem , pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usGunAmmoItem ) );
02819                         
02820                         IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, sXPos, sYPos, 0, (INT16) (GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sYPos, sXPos )), pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].usGunAmmoItem, pTargetSoldier->bLevel );
02821                         pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
02822                   }
02823                 else if ( AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].explosionSize > 1)
02824                   {
02825                         // re-routed the Highexplosive value to define exposion type
02826                         IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, sXPos, sYPos, 0, (INT16) (GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sYPos, sXPos )), AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].highExplosive , pTargetSoldier->bLevel );
02827                         // pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
02828                   }
02829             }
02830             else // tank cannon
02831             {
02832                   IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, sXPos, sYPos, 0, (INT16) (GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sYPos, sXPos )), TANK_SHELL, pTargetSoldier->bLevel );
02833             }
02834 
02835             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - end of LAW fire") );
02836             FreeUpAttacker( ubAttackerID );
02837             return;
02838       }
02839 
02840       DoSpecialEffectAmmoMiss( ubAttackerID, pTargetSoldier->sGridNo, sXPos, sYPos, sZPos, FALSE, FALSE, 0 );
02841 
02842       // OK, SHOT HAS HIT, DO THINGS APPROPRIATELY
02843   // ATE: This is 'cause of that darn smoke effect that could potnetially kill
02844   // the poor bastard .. so check
02845   if ( !pTargetSoldier->fDoingExternalDeath )
02846   {
02847         EVENT_SoldierGotHit( pTargetSoldier,    usWeaponIndex, sDamage, sBreathLoss, usDirection, sRange, ubAttackerID, ubSpecial, ubHitLocation, 0, NOWHERE );
02848   }
02849   else
02850   {
02851     // Buddy had died from additional dammage - free up attacker here...
02852             ReduceAttackBusyCount( pTargetSoldier->ubAttackerID, FALSE );
02853             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Special effect killed before bullet impact, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
02854   }
02855 }
02856 
02857 
02858 void StructureHit( INT32 iBullet, UINT16 usWeaponIndex, INT8 bWeaponStatus, UINT8 ubAttackerID, UINT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, INT16 sZPos, UINT16 usStructureID, INT32 iImpact, BOOLEAN fStopped )
02859 {
02860       BOOLEAN                                   fDoMissForGun = FALSE;
02861       ANITILE                                   *pNode;
02862       INT16                                     sGridNo;
02863       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
02864       UINT16                              usMissTileIndex, usMissTileType;
02865       STRUCTURE                     *pStructure = NULL;
02866       UINT32                              uiMissVolume = MIDVOLUME;
02867       BOOLEAN                             fHitSameStructureAsBefore;
02868       BULLET *                      pBullet;
02869       SOLDIERTYPE *           pAttacker;
02870       
02871       pBullet = GetBulletPtr( iBullet );
02872 
02873       if ( fStopped && ubAttackerID != NOBODY )
02874       {
02875             pAttacker = MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ];
02876 
02877             if ( pAttacker->ubOppNum != NOBODY )
02878             {
02879                   // if it was another team shooting at someone under our control
02880                   if ( (pAttacker->bTeam != Menptr[ pAttacker->ubOppNum ].bTeam ) )
02881                   {
02882                         // if OPPONENT is under our control
02883                         if (Menptr[ pAttacker->ubOppNum ].bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02884                         {
02885                               // AGILITY GAIN: Opponent "dodged" a bullet shot at him (it missed)
02886                               StatChange( MercPtrs[ pAttacker->ubOppNum ], AGILAMT, 5, FROM_FAILURE );
02887                         }
02888                   }
02889             }
02890       }
02891       
02892       if ( pBullet )
02893       {
02894             fHitSameStructureAsBefore = ( usStructureID == pBullet->usLastStructureHit );
02895       }
02896       else
02897       {
02898             // WTF?
02899             fHitSameStructureAsBefore = FALSE;
02900       }
02901 
02902       sGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( (sYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE), (sXPos/CELL_X_SIZE) );
02903       if ( !fHitSameStructureAsBefore )
02904       {
02905 
02906 
02907             if (sZPos > WALL_HEIGHT)
02908             {
02909                   MakeNoise( ubAttackerID, sGridNo, 1, gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID, Weapon[ usWeaponIndex ].ubHitVolume, NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT );
02910             }
02911             else
02912             {
02913                   MakeNoise( ubAttackerID, sGridNo, 0, gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID, Weapon[ usWeaponIndex ].ubHitVolume, NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT );
02914             }
02915 
02916       }
02917 
02918       if (fStopped)
02919       {
02920             // marke need another attacker id assignment
02921             SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
02922 
02923           // Get attacker
02924           pSoldier                        = MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ];
02925                  // marke added one 'or' to get this working with HE ammo
02926             if ( Item[usWeaponIndex].rocketlauncher || AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].explosionSize > 1)
02927             {
02928                   RemoveBullet( iBullet );
02929 
02930                   // Reduce attacker count!
02931                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - end of LAW fire") );
02932                   FreeUpAttacker( ubAttackerID );
02933                   if ( Item[usWeaponIndex].singleshotrocketlauncher )
02934                   {
02935                         IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, (INT16)CenterX( sGridNo ), (INT16)CenterY( sGridNo ), 0, sGridNo, C1, (INT8)( sZPos >= WALL_HEIGHT ) );
02936                   }
02937                   // changed too to use 2 flag to determine
02938                   else if ( !Item[usWeaponIndex].singleshotrocketlauncher && Item[usWeaponIndex].rocketlauncher)
02939                   {
02940                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("StructureHit: RPG7 item: %d, Ammo: %d",pAttacker->inv[HANDPOS].usItem , pAttacker->inv[HANDPOS].usGunAmmoItem ) );
02941                         IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, (INT16)CenterX( sGridNo ), (INT16)CenterY( sGridNo ), 0, sGridNo, pAttacker->inv[pAttacker->ubAttackingHand ].usGunAmmoItem , (INT8)( sZPos >= WALL_HEIGHT ) );
02942                         pAttacker->inv[pAttacker->ubAttackingHand ].usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
02943                   }
02944                   else if ( AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].explosionSize > 1)
02945                   {
02946                         // re-routed the Highexplosive value to define exposion type
02947                         IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, (INT16)CenterX( sGridNo ), (INT16)CenterY( sGridNo ), 0, sGridNo, AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].highExplosive , (INT8)( sZPos >= WALL_HEIGHT ) );
02948                         // pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
02949                   }
02950                   
02951                   return;
02952             }
02953 
02954             if ( Item[usWeaponIndex].cannon )
02955             {
02956                   RemoveBullet( iBullet );
02957 
02958                   // Reduce attacker count!
02959                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - end of TANK fire") );
02960                   FreeUpAttacker( ubAttackerID );
02961 
02962                   IgniteExplosion( ubAttackerID, (INT16)CenterX( sGridNo ), (INT16)CenterY( sGridNo ), 0, sGridNo, TANK_SHELL, (INT8)( sZPos >= WALL_HEIGHT ) );
02963                   //FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) ubAttackerID );
02964 
02965                   return;
02966             }
02967       }
02968 
02969       // Get Structure pointer and damage it!
02970       if ( usStructureID != INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID )
02971       {
02972             pStructure = FindStructureByID( sGridNo, usStructureID );
02973 
02974             DamageStructure( pStructure, (UINT8)iImpact, STRUCTURE_DAMAGE_GUNFIRE, sGridNo, sXPos, sYPos, ubAttackerID );
02975       }
02976 
02977       switch(  Weapon[ usWeaponIndex ].ubWeaponClass )
02978       {
02979             case HANDGUNCLASS:
02980             case RIFLECLASS:
02981             case SHOTGUNCLASS:
02982             case SMGCLASS:
02983             case MGCLASS:
02984 
02985                   // Guy has missed, play random sound
02986                   if (  MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02987                   {
02988                         if ( !MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->bDoBurst )
02989                         {
02990                               if ( Random( 40 ) == 0 )
02991                               {
02992                                     DoMercBattleSound(  MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ], BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
02993                               }
02994                         }
02995                   }
02996                   //fDoMissForGun = TRUE;
02997                   //break;
02998                   fDoMissForGun = TRUE;
02999                   break;
03000 
03001             case MONSTERCLASS:
03002 
03003       DoSpecialEffectAmmoMiss( ubAttackerID, sGridNo, sXPos, sYPos, sZPos, FALSE, TRUE, iBullet );
03004 
03005                   RemoveBullet( iBullet );
03006                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - monster attack hit structure") );
03007                   FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) ubAttackerID );
03008 
03009                   //PlayJA2Sample( SPIT_RICOCHET , RATE_11025, uiMissVolume, 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                  
03010                   break;
03011 
03012             case KNIFECLASS:
03013 
03014                   // When it hits the ground, leave on map...
03015                   if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
03016                   {
03017                         OBJECTTYPE        Object;
03018 
03019                         // OK, have we hit ground?
03020                         if ( usStructureID == INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID )
03021                         {     
03022                               // Add item
03023                               CreateItem( usWeaponIndex, bWeaponStatus, &Object );
03024 
03025                               AddItemToPool( sGridNo, &Object, -1 , 0, 0, -1 );
03026 
03027                               // Make team look for items
03028                               NotifySoldiersToLookforItems( );
03029                         }
03030 
03031                         if ( !fHitSameStructureAsBefore )
03032                         {
03033                               PlayJA2Sample( MISS_KNIFE, RATE_11025, uiMissVolume, 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                  
03034                         }
03035 
03036                         RemoveBullet( iBullet );
03037                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - knife attack hit structure") );
03038                         FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) ubAttackerID );
03039                   }
03040       }
03041       
03042       if ( fDoMissForGun )
03043       {
03044             // OK, are we a shotgun, if so , make sounds lower...
03045             if ( Weapon[ usWeaponIndex ].ubWeaponClass == SHOTGUNCLASS )
03046             {
03047                   uiMissVolume = LOWVOLUME;
03048             }
03049 
03050             // Free guy!
03051             //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - bullet hit structure") );
03052             //FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) ubAttackerID );
03053 
03054 
03055             // PLAY SOUND AND FLING DEBRIS
03056             // RANDOMIZE SOUND SYSTEM
03057  
03058             // IF WE HIT THE GROUND
03059 
03060             if ( fHitSameStructureAsBefore )
03061             {
03062                   if ( fStopped )
03063                   {
03064                         RemoveBullet( iBullet );
03065                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - bullet hit same structure twice") );
03066                         FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) ubAttackerID );
03067                   }
03068             }
03069             else
03070             {
03071 
03072                   if ( !fStopped || !DoSpecialEffectAmmoMiss( ubAttackerID, sGridNo, sXPos, sYPos, sZPos, FALSE, TRUE, iBullet ) )
03073                   {
03074                         if ( sZPos == 0 )
03075                         {
03076                               PlayJA2Sample( MISS_G2 , RATE_11025, uiMissVolume, 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );              
03077                         }
03078                         else
03079                         {
03080                               PlayJA2Sample( MISS_1 + Random(8), RATE_11025, uiMissVolume, 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                
03081                         }
03082 
03083                         // Default hit is the ground
03084                         usMissTileIndex = FIRSTMISS1;
03085                         usMissTileType    = FIRSTMISS;
03086 
03087                         // Check if we are in water...
03088                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubTerrainID == LOW_WATER ||  gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubTerrainID == DEEP_WATER )
03089                         {
03090                               usMissTileIndex = SECONDMISS1;
03091                               usMissTileType    = SECONDMISS;
03092 
03093                               // Add ripple
03094                               memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
03095                               AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
03096                               AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
03097                               AniParams.usTileType                        = THIRDMISS;
03098                               AniParams.usTileIndex                           = THIRDMISS1;
03099                               AniParams.sDelay                                      = 50;
03100                               AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
03101                               AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_FORWARD;
03102 
03103                               pNode = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
03104 
03105                               // Adjust for absolute positioning
03106                               pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_USEABSOLUTEPOS;
03107                               pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeX = sXPos;
03108                               pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeY = sYPos;
03109                               pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ = sZPos;
03110 
03111                         }     
03112 
03113                         memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
03114                         AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
03115                         AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
03116                         AniParams.usTileType                        = usMissTileType;
03117                         AniParams.usTileIndex                           = usMissTileIndex;
03118                         AniParams.sDelay                                      = 80;
03119                         AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
03120                         if (fStopped)
03121                         {
03122                               AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_RELEASE_ATTACKER_WHEN_DONE;
03123                         }
03124                         else
03125                         {
03126                               AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_FORWARD;
03127                         }
03128                         // Save bullet ID!
03129                         AniParams.uiUserData3                           = iBullet;
03130 
03131                         pNode = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
03132 
03133                         // Set attacker ID
03134                         pNode->usMissAnimationPlayed = usMissTileType;
03135                         pNode->ubAttackerMissed              = ubAttackerID;
03136                         // Adjust for absolute positioning
03137                         pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_USEABSOLUTEPOS;
03138                         pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeX = sXPos;
03139                         pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeY = sYPos;
03140                         pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ = sZPos;
03141                   
03142                         // ATE: Show misses...( if our team )
03143                         if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_MISSES ] )
03144                         {
03145                               if ( ubAttackerID != NOBODY )
03146                               {
03147                                     if ( MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03148                                     {
03149                                           LocateGridNo( sGridNo );
03150                                     }
03151                               }
03152                         }
03153                   }
03154 
03155                   pBullet->usLastStructureHit = usStructureID;
03156 
03157             }
03158       }
03159 }
03160 
03161 void WindowHit( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usStructureID, BOOLEAN fBlowWindowSouth, BOOLEAN fLargeForce )
03162 {
03163       STRUCTURE *             pWallAndWindow;
03164       DB_STRUCTURE *    pWallAndWindowInDB;
03165       INT16                               sShatterGridNo;
03166       UINT16                              usTileIndex;
03167       ANITILE *               pNode;
03168       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
03169 
03170 
03171       // ATE: Make large force always for now ( feel thing )
03172       fLargeForce = TRUE;
03173 
03174       // we have to do two things here: swap the window structure 
03175       // (right now just using the partner stuff in a chain from
03176       // intact to cracked to shattered) and display the 
03177       // animation if we've reached shattered
03178 
03179       // find the wall structure, and go one length along the chain      
03180       pWallAndWindow = FindStructureByID( sGridNo, usStructureID );
03181       if (pWallAndWindow == NULL)
03182       {
03183             return;
03184       }
03185 
03186       pWallAndWindow = SwapStructureForPartner( sGridNo, pWallAndWindow);
03187       if (pWallAndWindow == NULL)
03188       {
03189             return;
03190       }
03191 
03192       // record window smash
03193       AddWindowHitToMapTempFile( sGridNo );
03194 
03195       pWallAndWindowInDB = pWallAndWindow->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure;
03196 
03197       if ( fLargeForce )
03198       {
03199             // Force to destruction animation!
03200             if (pWallAndWindowInDB->bPartnerDelta != NO_PARTNER_STRUCTURE  )
03201             {
03202                   pWallAndWindow = SwapStructureForPartner( sGridNo, pWallAndWindow);
03203                   if ( pWallAndWindow )
03204                   {
03205                         // record 2nd window smash
03206                         AddWindowHitToMapTempFile( sGridNo );
03207 
03208                         pWallAndWindowInDB = pWallAndWindow->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure;
03209                   }
03210             }
03211       }
03212 
03213       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
03214 
03215       if (pWallAndWindowInDB->ubArmour == MATERIAL_THICKER_METAL_WITH_SCREEN_WINDOWS)
03216       {
03217             // don't play any sort of animation or sound
03218             return;
03219       }
03220 
03221       if (pWallAndWindowInDB->bPartnerDelta != NO_PARTNER_STRUCTURE  )
03222       { // just cracked; don't display the animation
03223             MakeNoise( NOBODY, sGridNo, 0, gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID, WINDOW_CRACK_VOLUME, NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT );
03224             return;
03225       }
03226       MakeNoise( NOBODY, sGridNo, 0, gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID, WINDOW_SMASH_VOLUME, NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT );
03227       if (pWallAndWindowInDB->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pWallAndWindowInDB->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT)
03228       {
03229       /*
03230             sShatterGridNo = sGridNo + 1;
03231             // check for wrapping around edge of map
03232             if (sShatterGridNo % WORLD_COLS == 0)
03233             {
03234                   // in which case we don't play the animation!
03235                   return;
03236             }*/
03237             if (fBlowWindowSouth)
03238             {
03239                   usTileIndex = WINDOWSHATTER1;
03240                   sShatterGridNo = sGridNo + 1;
03241             }
03242             else
03243             {
03244                   usTileIndex = WINDOWSHATTER11;
03245                   sShatterGridNo = sGridNo;
03246             }
03247 
03248       }
03249       else
03250       {
03251       /*
03252             sShatterGridNo = sGridNo + WORLD_COLS;
03253             // check for wrapping around edge of map
03254             if (sShatterGridNo % WORLD_ROWS == 0)
03255             {
03256                   // in which case we don't play the animation!
03257                   return;
03258             }*/
03259             if (fBlowWindowSouth)
03260             {
03261                   usTileIndex = WINDOWSHATTER6;
03262                   sShatterGridNo = sGridNo + WORLD_COLS;
03263             }
03264             else
03265             {
03266                   usTileIndex = WINDOWSHATTER16;
03267                   sShatterGridNo = sGridNo;
03268             }
03269       }
03270 
03271       memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
03272       AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sShatterGridNo;
03273       AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
03274       AniParams.usTileType                        = WINDOWSHATTER;
03275       AniParams.usTileIndex                           = usTileIndex;
03276       AniParams.sDelay                                      = 50;
03277       AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
03278       AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_FORWARD;
03279 
03280       pNode = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
03281 
03282       PlayJA2Sample( GLASS_SHATTER1 + Random(2), RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                 
03283 
03284 }
03285 
03286 
03287 BOOLEAN InRange( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo )
03288 {
03289        INT16                                                sRange;     
03290        UINT16                                               usInHand;
03291 
03292        DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("InRange"));
03293        usInHand = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
03294 
03295        if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_GUN || Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE || (Item[usInHand].rocketlauncher && !Item[usInHand].singleshotrocketlauncher))
03296        {
03297              // Determine range
03298              sRange = (INT16)GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
03299 
03300              if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
03301              {
03302                    // NB CalcMaxTossRange returns range in tiles, not in world units
03303                    if ( sRange <= CalcMaxTossRange( pSoldier, usInHand, TRUE ) * CELL_X_SIZE )
03304                    {
03305                          return( TRUE );
03306                    }
03307              } 
03308              else
03309              {
03310                    // For given weapon, check range
03311                    if ( sRange <= GunRange( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) ) )
03312                    {
03313                               return( TRUE );
03314                    }
03315              }
03316        }
03317        return( FALSE );
03318 }
03319 
03320 UINT32 CalcChanceToHitGun(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAimTime, UINT8 ubAimPos )
03321 {
03322   //SOLDIERTYPE *vicpSoldier;
03323       SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget;
03324       INT32 iChance, iRange, iSightRange, iMaxRange, iBonus; //, minRange;
03325       //rain
03326       //INT32 iScopeBonus; 
03327       //end rain
03328 
03329   INT32 iGunCondition, iMarksmanship;
03330       INT32 iPenalty;
03331       UINT16      usInHand;
03332       OBJECTTYPE * pInHand;
03333 //    INT8 bAttachPos;
03334       INT8 bBandaged;
03335       INT16 sDistVis;
03336       UINT8 ubAdjAimPos;
03337       UINT8 ubTargetID;
03338 
03339        DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToHitGun"));
03340 
03341        if ( pSoldier->bMarksmanship == 0 )
03342       {
03343             // always min chance
03344             return( MINCHANCETOHIT );
03345       }
03346 
03347   // make sure the guy's actually got a weapon in his hand!
03348       pInHand = &(pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand]);
03349   usInHand = pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon;
03350 
03351       // DETERMINE BASE CHANCE OF HITTING
03352       iGunCondition = WEAPON_STATUS_MOD( pInHand->bGunStatus );
03353 
03354       if (Item[usInHand].rocketlauncher )
03355       {
03356             // use the same calculation as for mechanical thrown weapons
03357             iMarksmanship = ( EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) + EffectiveMarksmanship( pSoldier ) + EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) + (10 * EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) )) / 4;
03358             // heavy weapons trait helps out
03359             if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, HEAVY_WEAPS ))
03360             {
03361                   iMarksmanship += gbSkillTraitBonus[HEAVY_WEAPS] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, HEAVY_WEAPS );
03362             }
03363       }
03364       else
03365       {
03366             iMarksmanship = EffectiveMarksmanship( pSoldier );
03367 
03368             if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
03369             {
03370                   SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier2;
03371 
03372                   pSoldier2 = GetRobotController( pSoldier );
03373                   if ( pSoldier2 )
03374                   {
03375                         iMarksmanship = __max( iMarksmanship, EffectiveMarksmanship( pSoldier2 ) );
03376                   }
03377             }
03378       }
03379 
03380       // modify chance to hit by morale
03381       iMarksmanship += GetMoraleModifier( pSoldier );
03382 
03383       // penalize marksmanship for fatigue
03384       iMarksmanship -= GetSkillCheckPenaltyForFatigue( pSoldier, iMarksmanship );
03385 
03386       //if ( PTR_OURTEAM )
03387       //{
03388       //    iChance = ( iMarksmanship * iGunCondition ) / 100;
03389       //}
03390       //else
03391       {
03392             if (iGunCondition >= iMarksmanship)
03393                   // base chance is equal to the shooter's marksmanship skill
03394                   iChance = iMarksmanship;
03395             else
03396                   // base chance is equal to the average of marksmanship & gun's condition!
03397                   iChance = (iMarksmanship + iGunCondition) / 2;
03398       }
03399       // if shooting same target as the last shot
03400       if (sGridNo == pSoldier->sLastTarget )
03401             iChance += AIM_BONUS_SAME_TARGET;         // give a bonus to hit
03402 
03403       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait == PSYCHO )
03404       {
03405             iChance += AIM_BONUS_PSYCHO;
03406       }
03407 
03408       // calculate actual range (in units, 10 units = 1 tile)
03409       iRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
03410 
03411       // if shooter is crouched, he aims slightly better (to max of AIM_BONUS_CROUCHING)
03412       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
03413       {
03414             iBonus = iRange / 10;
03415             if (iBonus > AIM_BONUS_CROUCHING)
03416             {
03417                   iBonus = AIM_BONUS_CROUCHING;
03418             }
03419             iChance += iBonus;
03420       }
03421       // if shooter is prone, he aims even better, except at really close range
03422       else if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
03423       {
03424             if (iRange > MIN_PRONE_RANGE)
03425             {
03426                   iBonus = iRange / 10;
03427                   if (iBonus > AIM_BONUS_PRONE)
03428                   {
03429                         iBonus = AIM_BONUS_PRONE;
03430                   }
03431                   // Snap: bipod bonus is now calculated in GetToHitBonus
03432                   //bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pInHand, BIPOD );
03433                   //if (bAttachPos != ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
03434                   //{   // extra bonus to hit for a bipod, up to half the prone bonus itself
03435                   //    iBonus += (iBonus * WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(GetBipodStatus(pInHand)) / 100) / 2;
03436                   //}
03437                   iChance += iBonus;
03438             }
03439       }
03440 
03441       //Madd: inherent weapon accuracy bonus
03442       iChance += Weapon[usInHand].bAccuracy;
03443 
03444 //    if ( !(Item[ usInHand ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) )
03445       if ( !(Item[ usInHand ].twohanded ) )
03446       {
03447             if (pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem == NOTHING)
03448             {
03449                   // firing with gun in right hand, and second hand empty (ie: no grenade, med kit or anything there)               
03450                   // Madd: easier to fire pistol/smg w/one hand free, essentially this will make pistols a little bit more accurate, and hopefully still useful later in the game
03451                   if (Weapon[usInHand].ubWeaponClass == HANDGUNCLASS)
03452                         iChance += AIM_BONUS_TWO_HANDED_PISTOL;
03453             }
03454             else 
03455             {
03456                   // Madd: harder to fire smgs w/something in other hand
03457                   // SMGs are treated as pistols for these purpose except there is a -5 penalty;
03458                   if (Weapon[usInHand].ubWeaponClass == SMGCLASS)
03459                   {
03460                         iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_SMG;
03461                   }
03462 
03463                   if ( !HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, AMBIDEXT ) )
03464                   {
03465                         if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03466                         {
03467                               // penalty to aim when firing two pistols
03468                               iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_DUAL_PISTOLS;
03469                         }
03470                         /*
03471                         else
03472                         {
03473                               // penalty to aim with pistol being fired one-handed
03474                               iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_ONE_HANDED_PISTOL;
03475                         }
03476                         */
03477                   }
03478             }
03479       }
03480 
03481       // If in burst mode, deduct points for change to hit for each shot after the first
03482       if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
03483       {
03484             // Snap: bipod may reduce burst penalty
03485             iPenalty = GetBurstPenalty(pInHand, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE)
03486                   * (pSoldier->bDoBurst - 1);
03487 
03488             // halve the penalty for people with the autofire trait
03489             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, AUTO_WEAPS ) )
03490             {
03491                   iPenalty /= 2 * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, AUTO_WEAPS );
03492             }
03493             iChance -= iPenalty;
03494       }
03495       else if ( pSoldier->bDoAutofire > 0 )
03496       {
03497             // Snap: bipod may reduce auto penalty
03498             iPenalty = GetAutoPenalty(pInHand, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE)
03499                   * (pSoldier->bDoBurst - 1);
03500 
03501             // halve the penalty for people with the autofire trait
03502             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, AUTO_WEAPS ) )
03503             {
03504                   iPenalty /= 2 * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, AUTO_WEAPS );
03505             }
03506             iChance -= iPenalty;
03507       }
03508 
03509       sDistVis = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sGridNo, 0, pSoldier );
03510 
03511       // give some leeway to allow people to spot for each other... 
03512       // use distance limitation for LOS routine of 2 x maximum distance EVER visible, so that we get accurate
03513       // calculations out to around 50 tiles.  Because we multiply max distance by 2, we must divide by 2 later
03514
