03515       // CJC August 13 2002:  Wow, this has been wrong the whole time.  bTargetCubeLevel seems to be generally set to 2 -
03516       // but if a character is shooting at an enemy in a particular spot, then we should be using the target position on the body.
03517 
03518       // CJC August 13, 2002
03519       // If the start soldier has a body part they are aiming at, and know about the person in the tile, then use that height instead
03520       iSightRange = -1;
03521 
03522       ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
03523       // best to use team knowledge as well, in case of spotting for someone else
03524       if (ubTargetID != NOBODY && pSoldier->bOppList[ubTargetID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY || gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam][ubTargetID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
03525       {
03526             iSightRange = SoldierToBodyPartLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel, pSoldier->bAimShotLocation, (UINT8) (MaxDistanceVisible() * 2), TRUE );      
03527       }
03528       
03529       if (iSightRange == -1) // didn't do a bodypart-based test
03530       {
03531             iSightRange = SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel, pSoldier->bTargetCubeLevel, (UINT8) (MaxDistanceVisible() * 2), TRUE );
03532       }
03533       
03534       iSightRange *= 2;
03535 
03536       if ( iSightRange > (sDistVis * CELL_X_SIZE) )
03537       {
03538             // shooting beyond max normal vision... penalize such distance at double (also later we halve the remaining chance)
03539             iSightRange += (iSightRange - sDistVis * CELL_X_SIZE);
03540       }
03541 
03542       // if shooter spent some extra time aiming and can see the target
03543       if (iSightRange > 0 && ubAimTime && !pSoldier->bDoBurst )
03544             iChance += (AIM_BONUS_PER_AP * ubAimTime); // bonus for every pt of aiming
03545 
03546       if ( !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC ) ) // if this is a computer AI controlled enemy
03547       {
03548             if ( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel == DIF_LEVEL_EASY )
03549             {
03550                   // On easy, penalize all enemies by 5%
03551                   iChance -= 5;
03552             }
03553             else
03554             {
03555                   // max with 0 to prevent this being a bonus, for JA2 it's just a penalty to make early enemies easy
03556                   // CJC note: IDIOT!  This should have been a min.  It's kind of too late now...
03557                   // CJC 2002-05-17: changed the max to a min to make this work.
03558                   iChance += __min( 0, gbDiff[ DIFF_ENEMY_TO_HIT_MOD ][ SoldierDifficultyLevel( pSoldier ) ] );
03559             }
03560       }
03561 
03562       // if shooter is being affected by gas
03563       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED )
03564       {
03565         iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_GASSED;
03566       }
03567 
03568       // if shooter is being bandaged at the same time, his concentration is off
03569       if (pSoldier->ubServiceCount > 0)
03570         iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_GETTINGAID;
03571 
03572       // if shooter is still in shock
03573       if (pSoldier->bShock)
03574             iChance -= (pSoldier->bShock * AIM_PENALTY_PER_SHOCK);
03575 
03576       if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
03577       {
03578             iMaxRange = GunRange( pInHand );
03579       }
03580       else
03581       {
03582             iMaxRange = CELL_X_SIZE; // one tile
03583       }
03584 
03585       if ( iSightRange > 0 )
03586       {
03587 
03588             // Madd: Spacific item bonuses are no longer hard-coded
03589 
03590             // Snap: use tohitbonus or aimbonus instead
03591             /*if (pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem == SUNGOGGLES || pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem == SUNGOGGLES)
03592             {
03593                   // decrease effective range by 10% when using sungoggles (w or w/o scope)
03594                   iSightRange -= iRange / 10;   //basically, +1% to hit per every 2 squares
03595             }*/
03596 
03597             //bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pInHand, SNIPERSCOPE );
03598 
03599             //// does gun have scope, long range recommends its use, and shooter's aiming?
03600             //if (bAttachPos != NO_SLOT && (iRange > MIN_SCOPE_RANGE) && (ubAimTime > 0))
03601             //{
03602             //    // reduce effective sight range by 20% per extra aiming time AP of the distance
03603             //    // beyond MIN_SCOPE_RANGE.  Max reduction is 80% of the range beyond.
03604             //    iScopeBonus = ((SNIPERSCOPE_AIM_BONUS * ubAimTime) * (iRange - MIN_SCOPE_RANGE)) / 100;
03605 
03606             //    // adjust for scope condition, only has full affect at 100%
03607             //    iScopeBonus = (iScopeBonus * WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pInHand->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos])) / 100;
03608 
03609             //rain
03610             // reduce scope effectiveness when it's raining 
03611             // iScopeBonus /= 1 + gbCurrentRainIntensity; //madd: commented out -- didn't do anything but cause a warning :S
03612             //end rain
03613 
03614             //    // reduce effective range by the bonus obtained from the scope
03615             //    iSightRange -= iScopeBonus;
03616             //    if (iSightRange < 1)
03617             //    {
03618             //          iSightRange = 1;
03619             //    }
03620             //}
03621 
03622             //bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pInHand, LASERSCOPE );
03623             //if (usInHand == ROCKET_RIFLE || usInHand == AUTO_ROCKET_RIFLE || bAttachPos != NO_SLOT) // rocket rifle has one built in
03624             //{
03625             //    INT8 bLaserStatus;
03626 
03627             //    if ( usInHand == ROCKET_RIFLE || usInHand == AUTO_ROCKET_RIFLE )
03628             //    {
03629             //          bLaserStatus = WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pInHand->bGunStatus);
03630             //    }
03631             //    else
03632             //    {
03633             //          bLaserStatus = WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pInHand->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ]);
03634             //    }
03635             //     
03636             //    // laser scope isn't of much use in high light levels; add something for that
03637             //    if (bLaserStatus > 50)
03638             //    {
03639             //          iScopeBonus = LASERSCOPE_BONUS * (bLaserStatus - 50) / 50;
03640             //    }
03641             //    else
03642             //    {
03643             //          // laser scope in bad condition creates aim penalty!
03644             //          iScopeBonus = - LASERSCOPE_BONUS * (50 - bLaserStatus) / 50;
03645             //    }
03646             //    
03647             //    iChance += iScopeBonus;
03648 
03649             //}
03650 
03651             //Madd: Some gear can affect the to-hit bonus and the bonus from aiming
03652             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToHitGun: before bonus - ubAimTime = %d, iSightRange = %d, iChance = %d ", ubAimTime, iSightRange, iChance));
03653             iSightRange -= GetGearAimBonus ( pSoldier, iRange, ubAimTime );
03654             iChance += GetGearToHitBonus ( pSoldier );
03655             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToHitGun: after gear bonus - ubAimTime = %d, iSightRange = %d, iChance = %d ", ubAimTime, iSightRange, iChance));
03656 
03657             // Reduce effective range by the aiming bonus (e.g. from sniper scope)
03658             iSightRange -= GetAimBonus( pInHand, iRange, ubAimTime );
03659             if (iSightRange < 1)
03660             {
03661                   iSightRange = 1;
03662             }
03663             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToHitGun: after scope bonus - ubAimTime = %d, iSightRange = %d, iChance = %d ", ubAimTime, iSightRange, iChance));
03664 
03665             UINT8 bLightLevel = LightTrueLevel(sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel);
03666             // Apply flat to-hit bonus (e.g. from laser scope)
03667             // Snap: If prone and range is good, apply bipod bonus here as well
03668             iChance += GetToHitBonus( pInHand, iSightRange, bLightLevel,
03669                   gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE && iRange > MIN_PRONE_RANGE );
03670             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToHitGun: after to hit bonus - ubAimTime = %d, iSightRange = %d, iChance = %d ", ubAimTime, iSightRange, iChance));
03671       }
03672 
03673       // if aiming at the head, reduce chance to hit
03674       if (ubAimPos == AIM_SHOT_HEAD)      
03675       {
03676             // penalty of 3% per tile
03677             iPenalty = 3 * iSightRange / 10;
03678             iChance -= iPenalty;
03679       }
03680       else if (ubAimPos == AIM_SHOT_LEGS)
03681       {
03682             // penalty of 1% per tile
03683             iPenalty = iSightRange / 10;
03684             iChance -= iPenalty;
03685       }
03686 
03687       //NumMessage("EFFECTIVE RANGE = ",range);
03688 
03689       // ADJUST FOR RANGE
03690       // bonus if range is less than normal range, penalty if it's more
03691       //iChance += (NORMAL_RANGE - iRange) / (CELL_X_SIZE / 5);   // 5% per tile
03692 
03693       // Effects of actual gun max range... the numbers are based on wanting -40%
03694       // at range 26for a pistol with range 13, and -0 for a sniper rifle with range 80
03695       iPenalty = ((iMaxRange - iRange * 3) * 10) / (17 * CELL_X_SIZE);
03696       if ( iPenalty < 0 )
03697       {
03698             iChance += iPenalty;
03699       }
03700       //iChance -= 20 * iRange / iMaxRange;
03701 
03702       if ( TANK( pSoldier ) && ( iRange / CELL_X_SIZE < MaxDistanceVisible() ) )
03703       {
03704             // tank; penalize at close range!
03705             // 2 percent per tile closer than max visible distance
03706             iChance -= 2 * ( MaxDistanceVisible() - (iRange / CELL_X_SIZE) );
03707       }
03708 
03709       if (iSightRange == 0)
03710       {
03711             // firing blind!
03712             iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_BLIND;
03713       }
03714       else
03715       {
03716             // Effects based on aiming & sight
03717             // From for JA2.5:  3% bonus/penalty for each tile different from range NORMAL_RANGE.
03718             // This doesn't provide a bigger bonus at close range, but stretches it out, making medium 
03719             // range less penalized, and longer range more penalized
03720             iChance += 3 * ( NORMAL_RANGE - iSightRange ) / CELL_X_SIZE;
03721             /*
03722             if (iSightRange < NORMAL_RANGE)
03723             {
03724                   // bonus to hit of 20% at point blank (would be 25% at range 0);
03725                   //at NORMAL_RANGE, bonus is 0
03726                   iChance += 25 * (NORMAL_RANGE - iSightRange) / NORMAL_RANGE;
03727             }
03728             else
03729             {
03730                   // penalty of 2% / tile
03731                   iChance -= (iSightRange - NORMAL_RANGE) / 5;
03732             }
03733             */
03734       }
03735 
03736       // adjust for roof/not on roof
03737       if ( pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
03738       {
03739             if ( pSoldier->bTargetLevel > 0 )
03740             {
03741                   // penalty for firing up
03742                   iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_FIRING_UP;
03743             }
03744       }
03745       else // pSoldier->bLevel > 0 )
03746       {
03747             if ( pSoldier->bTargetLevel == 0 )
03748             {
03749                   iChance += AIM_BONUS_FIRING_DOWN;
03750             }
03751             // if have roof trait, give bonus
03752             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, ONROOF ) )
03753             {
03754                   iChance += gbSkillTraitBonus[ ONROOF ] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, ONROOF );
03755             }
03756       }
03757 
03758 
03759       pTarget = SimpleFindSoldier( sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
03760       if (pTarget != NULL)
03761       {
03762             // targeting a merc           
03763             // adjust for crouched/prone target
03764             switch( gAnimControl[ pTarget->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
03765             {
03766                   case ANIM_CROUCH:
03767                         if ( TANK( pSoldier ) && iRange < MIN_TANK_RANGE )
03768                         {
03769                               // 13% penalty per tile closer than min range
03770                               iChance -= 13 * ( ( MIN_TANK_RANGE - iRange ) / CELL_X_SIZE );
03771                         }
03772                         else
03773                         {
03774                               // at anything other than point-blank range
03775                               if (iRange > POINT_BLANK_RANGE + 10 * (AIM_PENALTY_TARGET_CROUCHED / 3) )
03776                               {
03777                                     iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_TARGET_CROUCHED;
03778                               }
03779                               else if (iRange > POINT_BLANK_RANGE)
03780                               {
03781                                     // at close range give same bonus as prone, up to maximum of AIM_PENALTY_TARGET_CROUCHED
03782                                     iChance -= 3 * ((iRange - POINT_BLANK_RANGE) / CELL_X_SIZE); // penalty -3%/tile
03783                               }
03784                         }
03785                         break;
03786                   case ANIM_PRONE:
03787                         if ( TANK( pSoldier ) && iRange < MIN_TANK_RANGE )
03788                         {
03789                               // 25% penalty per tile closer than min range
03790                               iChance -= 25 * ( ( MIN_TANK_RANGE - iRange ) / CELL_X_SIZE );
03791                         }
03792                         else
03793                         {
03794                               // at anything other than point-blank range
03795                               if (iRange > POINT_BLANK_RANGE)
03796                               {
03797                                     // reduce chance to hit with distance to the prone/immersed target
03798                                     iPenalty = 3 * ((iRange - POINT_BLANK_RANGE) / CELL_X_SIZE); // penalty -3%/tile
03799                                     iPenalty = __min( iPenalty, AIM_PENALTY_TARGET_PRONE );
03800 
03801                                     iChance -= iPenalty;
03802                               }
03803                         }
03804                         break;
03805                   case ANIM_STAND:
03806                         // if we are prone and at close range, then penalize shots to the torso or head!
03807                         if ( iRange <= MIN_PRONE_RANGE && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
03808                         {
03809                               if ( ubAimPos == AIM_SHOT_RANDOM || ubAimPos == AIM_SHOT_GLAND )
03810                               {
03811                                     ubAdjAimPos = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
03812                               }
03813                               else
03814                               {
03815                                     ubAdjAimPos = ubAimPos;
03816                               }
03817                               // lose 10% per height difference, lessened by distance
03818                               // e.g. 30% to aim at head at range 1, only 10% at range 3
03819                               // or 20% to aim at torso at range 1, no penalty at range 3
03820                               // NB torso aim position is 2, so (5-aimpos) is 3, for legs it's 2, for head 4
03821                               iChance -= (5 - ubAdjAimPos - iRange / CELL_X_SIZE) * 10;
03822                         }
03823                         break;
03824                   default:
03825                         break;
03826             }
03827 
03828             // penalty for amount that enemy has moved
03829             iPenalty = __min( ((pTarget->bTilesMoved * 3) / 2), 30 );
03830             iChance -= iPenalty;
03831 
03832             // if target sees us, he may have a chance to dodge before the gun goes off
03833             // but ability to dodge is reduced if crouched or prone!
03834             if (pTarget->bOppList[pSoldier->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY && !TANK( pTarget ) && !(pSoldier->ubBodyType != QUEENMONSTER) )
03835             {
03836                   iPenalty = ( EffectiveAgility( pTarget ) / 5 + EffectiveExpLevel( pTarget ) * 2);
03837                   switch( gAnimControl[ pTarget->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
03838                   {
03839                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
03840                               iPenalty = iPenalty * 2 / 3;
03841                               break;
03842                         case ANIM_PRONE:
03843                               iPenalty /= 3;
03844                               break;
03845                   }                                               
03846 
03847                   // reduce dodge ability by the attacker's stats
03848                   iBonus = ( EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) / 5 + EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) * 2);
03849                   if ( TANK( pTarget ) || (pSoldier->ubBodyType != QUEENMONSTER) )
03850                   {
03851                         // reduce ability to track shots
03852                         iBonus = iBonus / 2;
03853                   }
03854 
03855                   if ( iPenalty > iBonus )
03856                   {
03857                         iChance -= (iPenalty - iBonus);
03858                   }
03859             }
03860       }
03861       else if ( TANK( pSoldier ) && iRange < MIN_TANK_RANGE )
03862       {
03863             // 25% penalty per tile closer than min range
03864             iChance -= 25 * ( ( MIN_TANK_RANGE - iRange ) / CELL_X_SIZE );
03865       }
03866 
03867 
03868       // add camo effects
03869 
03870 #if 0
03871       if ((victim = WhoIsThere(sGridNo)) < NOBODY)
03872        {
03873 
03874             // if victim is 5 or more tiles away and camouflaged, reduce
03875             // chance to hit by 5%  (ALREADY HAVE THIS INFO)
03876             if (range > 75 && vicpSoldier->camouflage)
03877              {
03878                   switch(vicpSoldier->terrtype)
03879                   {
03880                    case GROUNDTYPE:
03881                    case SANDTYPE  :
03882                    case GRASSTYPE :
03883                    case TGRASSTYPE:
03884                    case DGRASSTYPE:
03885                    case ROUGHTYPE : iChance += CAMOUFLAGE_TO_HIT_PENALTY;
03886                                     break;
03887 
03888                    case FLOORTYPE :
03889                    case LAKETYPE  :
03890                    case OCEANTYPE : break;
03891 
03892 #ifdef BETAVERSION
03893                    default        : NumMessage("CHANCE TO HIT ERROR: Unknown camo terrtype ",vicpSoldier->terrtype);
03894 #endif
03895                   }
03896              }
03897        }
03898 #endif
03899 
03900       // IF CHANCE EXISTS, BUT SHOOTER IS INJURED
03901       if ((iChance > 0) && (pSoldier->bLife < pSoldier->bLifeMax))
03902       {
03903             // if bandaged, give 1/2 of the bandaged life points back into equation
03904             bBandaged = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bBleeding;
03905 
03906             // injury penalty is based on % damage taken (max 2/3rds chance)
03907             iPenalty = (iChance * 2 * (pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife + (bBandaged / 2))) /
03908                                     (3 * pSoldier->bLifeMax);
03909 
03910             // reduce injury penalty due to merc's experience level (he can take it!)
03911             iChance -= (iPenalty * (100 - (10 * ( EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) - 1)))) / 100;
03912       }
03913 
03914       // IF CHANCE EXISTS, BUT SHOOTER IS LOW ON BREATH
03915       if ((iChance > 0) && (pSoldier->bBreath < 100))
03916       {
03917             // breath penalty is based on % breath missing (max 1/2 chance)
03918             iPenalty = (iChance * (100 - pSoldier->bBreath)) / 200;
03919             // reduce breath penalty due to merc's dexterity (he can compensate!)
03920             iChance -= (iPenalty * (100 - ( EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) - 10))) / 100;
03921       }
03922 
03923 
03924       // CHECK IF TARGET IS WITHIN GUN'S EFFECTIVE MAXIMUM RANGE
03925       if ( iRange > iMaxRange )
03926       {
03927             // a bullet WILL travel that far if not blocked, but it's NOT accurate,
03928             // because beyond maximum range, the bullet drops rapidly
03929 
03930             // This won't cause the bullet to be off to the left or right, only make it
03931             // drop in flight.
03932             iChance /= 2;
03933       }
03934       if ( iSightRange > (sDistVis * CELL_X_SIZE) )
03935       {
03936             // penalize out of sight shots, cumulative to effective range penalty
03937             iChance /= 2;
03938       }
03939 
03940   // MAKE SURE CHANCE TO HIT IS WITHIN DEFINED LIMITS
03941   if (iChance < MINCHANCETOHIT)
03942       {
03943             if ( TANK( pSoldier ) )
03944             {
03945                   // allow absolute minimums
03946                   iChance = 0;
03947             }
03948             else
03949             {
03950                   iChance = MINCHANCETOHIT;
03951             }
03952       }
03953   else
03954    {
03955     if (iChance > MAXCHANCETOHIT)
03956       iChance = MAXCHANCETOHIT;
03957    }
03958 
03959 //  NumMessage("ChanceToHit = ",chance);
03960    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToHitGun: ichance = %d",iChance));
03961   return (iChance);
03962 }
03963 
03964 UINT32 AICalcChanceToHitGun(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAimTime, UINT8 ubAimPos )
03965 {
03966       UINT16      usTrueState;
03967       UINT32      uiChance;
03968 
03969       // same as CCTHG but fakes the attacker always standing
03970       usTrueState = pSoldier->usAnimState;
03971       pSoldier->usAnimState = STANDING;
03972       uiChance = CalcChanceToHitGun( pSoldier, sGridNo, ubAimTime, ubAimPos );
03973       pSoldier->usAnimState = usTrueState;
03974       return( uiChance );
03975 }
03976 
03977 INT32 CalcBodyImpactReduction( UINT8 ubAmmoType, UINT8 ubHitLocation )
03978 {
03979       // calculate how much bullets are slowed by passing through someone
03980       INT32 iReduction = BodyImpactReduction[ubHitLocation];
03981       
03982       iReduction = (INT32)(iReduction * AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].armourImpactReductionMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].armourImpactReductionDivisor));
03983       //switch (ubAmmoType)
03984       //{
03985       //    case AMMO_HP:
03986       //          iReduction = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_HP( iReduction );
03987       //          break;
03988       //    case AMMO_AP:
03989       //    case AMMO_HEAT:
03990       //          iReduction = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_AP( iReduction );
03991       //          break;
03992       //    case AMMO_SUPER_AP:
03993       //          iReduction = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_SAP( iReduction );
03994       //          break;
03995       //    default:
03996       //          break;
03997       //}
03998       return( iReduction );
03999 }
04000 
04001 INT32 ArmourProtection( SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget, UINT16 ubArmourType, INT8 * pbStatus, INT32 iImpact, UINT8 ubAmmoType )
04002 {
04003       INT32       iProtection, iAppliedProtection, iFailure;
04004 
04005       iProtection = Armour[ ubArmourType ].ubProtection;
04006 
04007       if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( pTarget ) )
04008       {
04009             // check for the bullet hitting a weak spot in the armour
04010             iFailure = PreRandom( 100 ) + 1 - *pbStatus;
04011             if (iFailure > 0)
04012             {
04013                   iProtection -= iFailure;
04014                   if (iProtection < 0)
04015                   {
04016                         return( 0 );
04017                   }
04018             }
04019       }
04020 
04021       // adjust protection of armour due to different ammo types
04022       iProtection = (INT32)(iProtection * AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].armourImpactReductionMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].armourImpactReductionDivisor) );
04023 
04024       //switch (ubAmmoType)
04025       //{
04026       //    case AMMO_HP:
04027       //          iProtection = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_HP( iProtection );
04028       //          break;
04029       //    case AMMO_AP:
04030       //    case AMMO_HEAT:
04031       //          iProtection = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_AP( iProtection );
04032       //          break;
04033       //    case AMMO_SUPER_AP:
04034       //          iProtection = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_SAP( iProtection );
04035       //          break;
04036       //    default:
04037       //          break;
04038       //}
04039 
04040       // figure out how much of the armour's protection value is necessary 
04041       // in defending against this bullet
04042       if (iProtection > iImpact )
04043       {
04044             iAppliedProtection = iImpact;
04045       }
04046       else
04047       {
04048             // applied protection is the full strength of the armour, before AP/HP changes
04049             iAppliedProtection = Armour[ ubArmourType ].ubProtection;
04050       }
04051 
04052       // reduce armour condition
04053 
04054       if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].acidic )
04055       {
04056             // creature spit damages armour a lot! an extra 3x for a total of 4x normal
04057             *pbStatus -= 3 * (iAppliedProtection * Armour[ubArmourType].ubDegradePercent) / 100;
04058 
04059             // reduce amount of protection from armour            
04060             iProtection /= 2;
04061       }
04062       else if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].ignoreArmour )
04063       {
04064             // knives and darts damage armour but are not stopped by kevlar
04065             if (Armour[ ubArmourType ].ubArmourClass == ARMOURCLASS_VEST || Armour[ ubArmourType ].ubArmourClass == ARMOURCLASS_LEGGINGS)
04066             {
04067                   iProtection = 0;
04068             }
04069       }
04070 
04071       if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( pTarget ) )
04072       {
04073             *pbStatus -= (iAppliedProtection * Armour[ubArmourType].ubDegradePercent) / 100;
04074       }
04075 
04076       // return armour protection
04077       return( iProtection );
04078 }
04079 
04080 
04081 INT32 TotalArmourProtection( SOLDIERTYPE *pFirer, SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget, UINT8 ubHitLocation, INT32 iImpact, UINT8 ubAmmoType )
04082 {
04083       INT32                         iTotalProtection = 0, iSlot;
04084       OBJECTTYPE *      pArmour;
04085       INT8                          bPlatePos = -1;
04086 
04087       if (pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE)
04088       {
04089             INT8 bDummyStatus = 100;
04090 
04091             //bDummyStatus = (INT8) pVehicleList[ pTarget->bVehicleID ].sExternalArmorLocationsStatus[ ubHitLocation ];
04092 
04093             iTotalProtection += ArmourProtection( pTarget, (UINT8) pVehicleList[ pTarget->bVehicleID ].sArmourType, &bDummyStatus, iImpact, ubAmmoType );
04094 
04095             //pVehicleList[ pTarget->bVehicleID ].sExternalArmorLocationsStatus[ ubHitLocation ] = bDummyStatus; 
04096 
04097       }
04098       else
04099       {
04100             switch( ubHitLocation )
04101             {
04102                   case AIM_SHOT_GLAND:
04103                         // creature hit in the glands!!! no armour there!
04104                         return( 0 );
04105                   case AIM_SHOT_HEAD:
04106                         iSlot = HELMETPOS;
04107                         break;
04108                   case AIM_SHOT_LEGS:
04109                         iSlot = LEGPOS;
04110                         break;
04111                   case AIM_SHOT_TORSO:
04112                   default:
04113                         iSlot = VESTPOS;
04114                         break;
04115 
04116             }
04117 
04118             pArmour = &(pTarget->inv[ iSlot ]);
04119             if (pArmour->usItem != NOTHING)
04120             {
04121                   // check plates first
04122                   //if ( iSlot == VESTPOS )
04123                   //{
04124 //                      bPlatePos = FindAttachment( pArmour, CERAMIC_PLATES );
04125                         bPlatePos = FindFirstArmourAttachment( pArmour);
04126                         if (bPlatePos != -1)
04127                         {
04128                               // bullet got through jacket; apply ceramic plate armour
04129                               iTotalProtection += ArmourProtection( pTarget, Item[pArmour->usAttachItem[bPlatePos]].ubClassIndex, &(pArmour->bAttachStatus[bPlatePos]), iImpact, ubAmmoType );
04130                               if ( pArmour->bAttachStatus[bPlatePos] < USABLE )
04131                               {
04132                                     // destroy plates!
04133                                     pArmour->usAttachItem[ bPlatePos ] = NOTHING;
04134                                     pArmour->bAttachStatus[ bPlatePos ] = 0;
04135                                     DirtyMercPanelInterface( pTarget, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
04136 #ifdef ENGLISH
04137                                     if ( pTarget->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04138                                     {
04139                                           // report plates destroyed!
04140                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, gzLateLocalizedString[61], pTarget->name );
04141                                     }
04142 #endif
04143                               }
04144                         }
04145                   //}
04146 
04147 
04148                   // if the plate didn't stop the bullet...
04149                   if ( iImpact > iTotalProtection )
04150                   {
04151                         iTotalProtection += ArmourProtection( pTarget, Item[pArmour->usItem].ubClassIndex, &(pArmour->bStatus[0]), iImpact, ubAmmoType );
04152                         if ( pArmour->bStatus[ 0 ] < USABLE )
04153                         {
04154                               //Madd: put any attachments that someone might have added to the armour in the merc's inventory
04155                               for (int bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
04156                               {
04157                                     OBJECTTYPE newObj;
04158                                     CreateItem(pArmour->usAttachItem[bLoop], pArmour->bAttachStatus[bLoop], &newObj);
04159                                     if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pTarget, &newObj, FALSE ) )
04160                                     {   // put it on the ground
04161                                           AddItemToPool( pTarget->sGridNo, &newObj, 1, pTarget->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
04162                                     }
04163                               }
04164 
04165                               DeleteObj( pArmour );
04166                               DirtyMercPanelInterface( pTarget, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
04167                         }
04168                   }
04169             }
04170       }
04171       return( iTotalProtection );
04172 }
04173 
04174 INT32 BulletImpact( SOLDIERTYPE *pFirer, SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget, UINT8 ubHitLocation, INT32 iOrigImpact, INT16 sHitBy, UINT8 * pubSpecial )
04175 {
04176       INT32                         iImpact, iFluke, iBonus, iImpactForCrits = 0;
04177       INT8                          bStatLoss;
04178       UINT8                         ubAmmoType;
04179 
04180       // NOTE: reduction of bullet impact due to range and obstacles is handled
04181       // in MoveBullet.
04182 
04183       // Set a few things up:
04184       if ( Item[ pFirer->usAttackingWeapon ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
04185       {
04186             ubAmmoType = AMMO_KNIFE;
04187       }
04188       else
04189       {
04190             ubAmmoType = pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand].ubGunAmmoType;
04191       }
04192 
04193       if ( TANK( pTarget ) ) 
04194       {
04195             if ( !AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].antiTank )
04196             {
04197                   // ping!
04198                   return( 0 );
04199             }
04200       }
04201 
04202       // plus/minus up to 25% due to "random" factors (major organs hit or missed,
04203       // lucky lighter in breast pocket, divine intervention on behalf of "Rev"...)
04204       iFluke = PreRandom(51) - 25;        // gives (0 to 50 -25) -> -25% to +25%
04205       //NumMessage("Fluke = ",fluke);
04206 
04207       // up to 50% extra impact for making particularly accurate successful shots
04208       iBonus = sHitBy / 2;
04209       //NumMessage("Bonus = ",bonus);
04210 
04211       iOrigImpact = iOrigImpact * (100 + iFluke + iBonus) / 100;
04212 
04213       // at very long ranges (1.5x maxRange and beyond) impact could go negative
04214       if (iOrigImpact < 1)
04215       {
04216             iOrigImpact = 1;        // raise impact to a minimum of 1 for any hit
04217       }
04218 
04219       // adjust for HE rounds
04220       if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].highExplosive )
04221       {
04222 //          iOrigImpact = AMMO_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT_HE( iOrigImpact );
04223             iOrigImpact = (INT32)(iOrigImpact * AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].beforeArmourDamageMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].beforeArmourDamageDivisor) );
04224 
04225             if ( TANK( pTarget ) ) 
04226             {
04227                   // HEAT round on tank, divide by 3 for damage
04228                   iOrigImpact /= 2;
04229             }
04230       }
04231 
04232       if (pubSpecial && *pubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED_BY_SPIT_SPECIAL)
04233       {
04234             iImpact = iOrigImpact;
04235       }
04236       else
04237       {
04238             iImpact = iOrigImpact - TotalArmourProtection( pFirer, pTarget, ubHitLocation, iOrigImpact, ubAmmoType );
04239       }
04240 
04241       // calc minimum damage
04242       if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].zeroMinimumDamage )
04243       {
04244             if (iImpact < 0)
04245             {
04246                   iImpact = 0;
04247             }
04248       }
04249       else
04250       {
04251             if (iImpact < ((iOrigImpact + 5) / 10) )
04252             {
04253                   iImpact = (iOrigImpact + 5) / 10;
04254             }
04255 
04256             if ( (AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].numberOfBullets > 1 ) && (pTarget->bNumPelletsHitBy > 0) )
04257             {
04258                   iImpact += (pTarget->bNumPelletsHitBy - 1)  / 2;
04259             }
04260 
04261       }
04262 
04263       if (gfNextShotKills)
04264       {
04265             // big time cheat key effect!
04266             iImpact = 100;
04267             gfNextShotKills = FALSE;
04268       }
04269 
04270       if ( iImpact > 0 && !TANK( pTarget ) )
04271       {
04272 
04273             if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].dart && sHitBy > 20 )
04274             {     
04275                   if (pubSpecial)
04276                   {
04277                         *pubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_SLEEP_DART_SPECIAL;
04278                   }
04279                   return( iImpact );
04280             }
04281             
04282             iImpact = (INT32)(iImpact * AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].afterArmourDamageMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].afterArmourDamageDivisor) ) ;
04283             //if (ubAmmoType == AMMO_HP)
04284             //{ // good solid hit with a hollow-point bullet, which got through armour!
04285             //    iImpact = AMMO_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT_HP( iImpact );
04286             //}
04287 
04288             AdjustImpactByHitLocation( iImpact, ubHitLocation, &iImpact, &iImpactForCrits );
04289 
04290             switch( ubHitLocation )
04291             {
04292                   case AIM_SHOT_HEAD:
04293                         // is the blow deadly enough for an instant kill?
04294                         if ( PythSpacesAway( pFirer->sGridNo, pTarget->sGridNo ) <= MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH || (PythSpacesAway( pFirer->sGridNo, pTarget->sGridNo ) <= MAX_BARRETT_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH && pFirer->usAttackingWeapon  == BARRETT ))
04295                         {
04296                               if (iImpactForCrits > MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_INSTANT_KILL && iImpactForCrits < pTarget->bLife)
04297                               {
04298                                     // blow to the head is so deadly that it causes instant death;
04299                                     // the target has more life than iImpact so we increase it
04300                                     iImpact = pTarget->bLife + Random( 10 );
04301                                     iImpactForCrits = iImpact;
04302                               }
04303 
04304                               if (pubSpecial)
04305                               {
04306                                     // is the blow deadly enough to cause a head explosion?
04307                                     if ( iImpactForCrits >= pTarget->bLife )
04308                                     {
04309                                           if (iImpactForCrits > MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_HEAD_EXPLOSION )
04310                                           {
04311                                                 *pubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_HEAD_EXPLODE_SPECIAL;
04312                                           }
04313                                           else if ( iImpactForCrits > (MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_HEAD_EXPLOSION / 2) && ( PreRandom( MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_HEAD_EXPLOSION / 2 ) < (UINT32)(iImpactForCrits - MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_HEAD_EXPLOSION / 2) ) )
04314                                           {
04315                                                 *pubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_HEAD_EXPLODE_SPECIAL;
04316                                           }
04317                                     }
04318 
04319                               }
04320                         }
04321                         break;
04322                   case AIM_SHOT_LEGS:
04323                         // is the damage enough to make us fall over?
04324                         if ( pubSpecial && IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pTarget ) && gAnimControl[ pTarget->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND && pTarget->bOverTerrainType != LOW_WATER && pTarget->bOverTerrainType != MED_WATER && pTarget->bOverTerrainType != DEEP_WATER  )
04325                         {
04326                               if (iImpactForCrits > MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_AUTO_FALL_OVER )                         
04327                               {
04328                                     *pubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_LEG_FALLDOWN_SPECIAL;
04329                               }
04330                               // else ramping up chance from 1/2 the automatic value onwards
04331                               else if ( iImpactForCrits > (MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_AUTO_FALL_OVER / 2) && ( PreRandom( MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_AUTO_FALL_OVER / 2 ) < (UINT32)(iImpactForCrits - MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_AUTO_FALL_OVER / 2) ) )
04332                               {
04333                                     *pubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_LEG_FALLDOWN_SPECIAL;
04334                               }
04335                         }
04336                         break;            
04337                   case AIM_SHOT_TORSO:
04338                         // normal damage to torso
04339                         // is the blow deadly enough for an instant kill?
04340                         // since this value is much lower than the others, it only applies at short range...
04341                         if ( PythSpacesAway( pFirer->sGridNo, pTarget->sGridNo ) <= MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH || (PythSpacesAway( pFirer->sGridNo, pTarget->sGridNo ) <= MAX_BARRETT_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH && pFirer->usAttackingWeapon  == BARRETT ))
04342                         {
04343                               if (iImpact > MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_INSTANT_KILL && iImpact < pTarget->bLife)
04344                               {
04345                                     // blow to the chest is so deadly that it causes instant death;
04346                                     // the target has more life than iImpact so we increase it
04347                                     iImpact = pTarget->bLife + Random( 10 );
04348                                     iImpactForCrits = iImpact;
04349                               }
04350                               // special thing for hitting chest - allow cumulative damage to count
04351                               else if ( (iImpact + pTarget->sDamage) > (MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_BLOWN_AWAY + MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_INSTANT_KILL) )
04352                               {
04353                                     iImpact = pTarget->bLife + Random( 10 );
04354                                     iImpactForCrits = iImpact;
04355                               }
04356 
04357                               // is the blow deadly enough to cause a chest explosion?
04358                               if (pubSpecial)
04359                               {
04360                                     if (iImpact > MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_BLOWN_AWAY && iImpact >= pTarget->bLife)
04361                                     {
04362                                           *pubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_CHEST_EXPLODE_SPECIAL;
04363                                     }
04364                               }
04365                         }
04366                         break;
04367             }
04368       }
04369 
04370       if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pTarget ) )
04371       {
04372             iImpactForCrits = 0;
04373       }
04374       
04375       // don't do critical hits against people who are gonna die!
04376       if( !IsAutoResolveActive() )
04377       {
04378 
04379             if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].knife && pFirer->bOppList[ pTarget->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
04380             {
04381                   // is this a stealth attack?
04382                   if ( pTarget->bOppList[ pFirer->ubID ] == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN && !CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pTarget ) && (ubHitLocation == AIM_SHOT_HEAD || ubHitLocation == AIM_SHOT_TORSO ) )
04383                   {
04384                         if ( PreRandom( 100 ) < (UINT32)(sHitBy + 10 * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pFirer, THROWING )) )
04385                         {
04386                               // instant death!                         
04387                               iImpact = pTarget->bLife + Random( 10 );
04388                               iImpactForCrits = iImpact;
04389                         }
04390                   }
04391             }
04392 
04393             if (iImpactForCrits > 0 && iImpactForCrits < pTarget->bLife )
04394             {
04395                   if (PreRandom( iImpactForCrits / 2 + pFirer->bAimTime * 5) + 1 > CRITICAL_HIT_THRESHOLD)
04396                   {
04397                         bStatLoss = (INT8) PreRandom( iImpactForCrits / 2 ) + 1;
04398                         switch( ubHitLocation )
04399                         {
04400                               case AIM_SHOT_HEAD:
04401                                     if (bStatLoss >= pTarget->bWisdom)
04402                                     {
04403                                           bStatLoss = pTarget->bWisdom - 1;
04404                                     }
04405                                     if ( bStatLoss > 0 )
04406                                     {
04407                                           pTarget->bWisdom -= bStatLoss;
04408 
04409                                           if (pTarget->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE)
04410                                           {
04411                                                 gMercProfiles[ pTarget->ubProfile ].bWisdom = pTarget->bWisdom;
04412                                           }
04413 
04414 
04415                                           if (pTarget->name[0] && pTarget->bVisible == TRUE)
04416                                           {
04417                                                 // make stat RED for a while...
04418                                                 pTarget->uiChangeWisdomTime = GetJA2Clock();
04419                                                 pTarget->usValueGoneUp &= ~( WIS_INCREASE );
04420 
04421                                                 if (bStatLoss == 1)
04422                                                 {
04423                                                       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_LOSES_1_WISDOM], pTarget->name );
04424                                                 }
04425                                                 else
04426                                                 {
04427                                                       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_LOSES_WISDOM], pTarget->name, bStatLoss );
04428                                                 }
04429                                           }
04430                                     }
04431                                     else if ( pTarget->bNumPelletsHitBy == 0 )
04432                                     {
04433                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_HEAD_HIT], pTarget->name );
04434                                     }
04435                                     break;
04436                               case AIM_SHOT_TORSO:
04437                                     if (PreRandom( 1 ) == 0 && !(pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER) )
04438                                     {
04439                                           if (bStatLoss >= pTarget->bDexterity)
04440                                           {
04441                                                 bStatLoss = pTarget->bDexterity - 1;
04442                                           }
04443                                           if ( bStatLoss > 0 )
04444                                           {
04445                                                 pTarget->bDexterity -= bStatLoss;
04446 
04447                                                 if (pTarget->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE)
04448                                                 {
04449                                                       gMercProfiles[ pTarget->ubProfile ].bDexterity = pTarget->bDexterity;
04450                                                 }
04451 
04452                                                 if (pTarget->name[0] && pTarget->bVisible == TRUE)
04453                                                 {
04454                                                       // make stat RED for a while...
04455                                                       pTarget->uiChangeDexterityTime = GetJA2Clock();
04456                                                       pTarget->usValueGoneUp &= ~( DEX_INCREASE );
04457 
04458                                                       if (bStatLoss == 1)
04459                                                       {
04460                                                             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_LOSES_1_DEX], pTarget->name );
04461                                                       }
04462                                                       else
04463                                                       {
04464                                                             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_LOSES_DEX], pTarget->name, bStatLoss );
04465                                                       }
04466                                                 }
04467                                           }
04468                                     }
04469                                     else
04470                                     {
04471                                           if (bStatLoss >= pTarget->bStrength)
04472                                           {
04473                                                 bStatLoss = pTarget->bStrength - 1;
04474                                           }
04475                                           if ( bStatLoss > 0 )
04476                                           {
04477                                                 pTarget->bStrength -= bStatLoss;
04478 
04479                                                 if (pTarget->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE)
04480                                                 {
04481                                                       gMercProfiles[ pTarget->ubProfile ].bStrength = pTarget->bStrength;
04482                                                 }
04483 
04484                                                 if (pTarget->name[0] && pTarget->bVisible == TRUE)
04485                                                 {
04486                                                       // make stat RED for a while...
04487                                                       pTarget->uiChangeStrengthTime = GetJA2Clock();
04488                                                       pTarget->usValueGoneUp &= ~( STRENGTH_INCREASE );
04489 
04490                                                       if (bStatLoss == 1)
04491                                                       {
04492                                                             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_LOSES_1_STRENGTH], pTarget->name );
04493                                                       }
04494                                                       else
04495                                                       {
04496                                                             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_LOSES_STRENGTH], pTarget->name, bStatLoss );
04497                                                       }
04498                                                 }
04499                                           }
04500                                     }
04501                                     break;
04502                               case AIM_SHOT_LEGS:
04503                                     if (bStatLoss >= pTarget->bAgility)
04504                                     {
04505                                           bStatLoss = pTarget->bAgility - 1;
04506                                     }     
04507                                     if ( bStatLoss > 0 )
04508                                     {                       
04509                                           pTarget->bAgility -= bStatLoss;
04510 
04511                                           if (pTarget->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE)
04512                                           {
04513                                                 gMercProfiles[ pTarget->ubProfile ].bAgility = pTarget->bAgility;
04514                                           }
04515 
04516                                           if (pTarget->name[0] && pTarget->bVisible == TRUE)
04517                                           {
04518                                                 // make stat RED for a while...
04519                                                 pTarget->uiChangeAgilityTime = GetJA2Clock();
04520                                                 pTarget->usValueGoneUp &= ~( AGIL_INCREASE );
04521 
04522                                                 if (bStatLoss == 1)
04523                                                 {
04524                                                       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_LOSES_1_AGIL], pTarget->name );
04525                                                 }
04526                                                 else
04527                                                 {
04528                                                       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_LOSES_AGIL], pTarget->name, bStatLoss );
04529                                                 }
04530                                           }
04531                                     }
04532                                     break;
04533                         }
04534                   }
04535                   else if ( ubHitLocation == AIM_SHOT_HEAD && pTarget->bNumPelletsHitBy == 0 )
04536                   {
04537                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_HEAD_HIT], pTarget->name );               
04538                   }
04539             }
04540       }
04541 
04542       return( iImpact );
04543 }
04544 
04545 INT32 HTHImpact( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget, INT32 iHitBy, BOOLEAN fBladeAttack )
04546 {
04547       INT32 iImpact, iFluke, iBonus;
04548 
04549       if (fBladeAttack)
04550       {
04551             iImpact = ( EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) / 2); // 0 to 4 for level
04552             iImpact += GetDamage(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);
04553             iImpact += EffectiveStrength( pSoldier ) / 20; // 0 to 5 for strength, adjusted by damage taken
04554 
04555             if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pTarget ) )
04556             {
04557                   iImpact /= 4;
04558             }
04559       }
04560       else
04561       {
04562             iImpact = ( EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) / 2); // 0 to 4 for level
04563             iImpact += EffectiveStrength( pSoldier ) / 5; // 0 to 20 for strength, adjusted by damage taken
04564 
04565             // NB martial artists don't get a bonus for using brass knuckles!
04566             if (pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon && !( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, MARTIALARTS ) ) )
04567             {
04568                   iImpact += GetDamage(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);
04569 
04570                   if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pTarget ) )
04571                   {
04572                         iImpact /= 2;
04573                   }
04574             }
04575             else
04576             {
04577                   // base HTH damage
04578                   iImpact += 5;
04579                   if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pTarget ) )
04580                   {
04581                         iImpact = 0;
04582                   }
04583             }
04584 
04585       }
04586       
04587 
04588       iFluke = PreRandom( 51 ) - 25; // +/-25% bonus due to random factors
04589       iBonus = iHitBy / 2;                      // up to 50% extra impact for accurate attacks
04590       
04591       iImpact = iImpact * (100 + iFluke + iBonus) / 100;
04592 
04593       if (!fBladeAttack)
04594       {
04595             // add bonuses for hand-to-hand and martial arts
04596             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, MARTIALARTS ) )
04597             {
04598                   iImpact = iImpact * ( 100 + gbSkillTraitBonus[MARTIALARTS] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, MARTIALARTS ) ) / 100;
04599                   if (pSoldier->usAnimState == NINJA_SPINKICK)
04600                   {
04601                         iImpact *= 2;
04602                   }
04603             }
04604             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, HANDTOHAND ) )              
04605             {
04606                   // SPECIAL  - give TRIPLE bonus for damage for hand-to-hand trait
04607                   // because the HTH bonus is half that of martial arts, and gets only 1x for to-hit bonus
04608                   iImpact = iImpact * ( 100 + 3 * gbSkillTraitBonus[HANDTOHAND] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, HANDTOHAND ) ) / 100;
04609             }           
04610       }
04611 
04612       return( iImpact );
04613 }
04614 
04615 void ShotMiss( UINT8 ubAttackerID, INT32 iBullet )
04616 {
04617       BOOLEAN                                   fDoMissForGun = FALSE;
04618       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pAttacker;
04619       BULLET                                    *pBullet;
04620 
04621       pAttacker = MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ];
04622 
04623       if ( pAttacker->ubOppNum != NOBODY )
04624       {
04625             // if it was another team shooting at someone under our control
04626             if ( (pAttacker->bTeam != Menptr[ pAttacker->ubOppNum ].bTeam ) )
04627             {
04628                   // if OPPONENT is under our control
04629       if (Menptr[ pAttacker->ubOppNum ].bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04630                   {
04631                         // AGILITY GAIN: Opponent "dodged" a bullet shot at him (it missed)
04632                         StatChange( MercPtrs[ pAttacker->ubOppNum ], AGILAMT, 5, FROM_FAILURE );
04633                   }
04634             }
04635       }
04636 
04637       switch(  Weapon[ MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->usAttackingWeapon ].ubWeaponClass )
04638       {
04639             case HANDGUNCLASS:
04640             case RIFLECLASS:
04641             case SHOTGUNCLASS:
04642             case SMGCLASS:
04643             case MGCLASS:
04644 
04645                   // Guy has missed, play random sound
04646                   if (  MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04647                   {
04648                         if ( Random(40) == 0 )
04649                         {
04650                               DoMercBattleSound(  MercPtrs[ ubAttackerID ], BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
04651                         }
04652                   }
04653                   fDoMissForGun = TRUE;
04654                   break;
04655 
04656             case MONSTERCLASS:
04657                   PlayJA2Sample( SPIT_RICOCHET, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
04658                   break;
04659       }
04660       
04661       if ( fDoMissForGun )
04662       {
04663             // PLAY SOUND AND FLING DEBRIS
04664             // RANDOMIZE SOUND SYSTEM
04665 
04666             if ( !DoSpecialEffectAmmoMiss( ubAttackerID, NOWHERE, 0, 0, 0, TRUE, TRUE, 0 ) )
04667             {
04668                   PlayJA2Sample( MISS_1 + Random(8), RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                
04669             }
04670 
04671             // ATE: Show misses...( if our team )
04672             if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_MISSES ] )
04673             {
04674                   pBullet = GetBulletPtr( iBullet );
04675 
04676                   if ( pAttacker->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04677                   {
04678                         LocateGridNo( (INT16)pBullet->sGridNo );
04679                   }
04680             }
04681 
04682       }
04683 
04684       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - bullet missed") );
04685       FreeUpAttacker( ubAttackerID );
04686 }
04687 
04688 UINT32 CalcChanceHTH( SOLDIERTYPE * pAttacker,SOLDIERTYPE *pDefender, UINT8 ubAimTime, UINT8 ubMode )
04689 {
04690   UINT16 usInHand;
04691       UINT8 ubBandaged;
04692   INT32 iAttRating, iDefRating;
04693       INT32 iChance;
04694 
04695   usInHand = pAttacker->usAttackingWeapon;
04696 
04697       if ( (usInHand != CREATURE_QUEEN_TENTACLES ) && (pDefender->bLife < OKLIFE || pDefender->bBreath < OKBREATH) )
04698       {
04699             // there is NO way to miss
04700             return( 100 ); 
04701       }
04702 
04703       if (ubMode == HTH_MODE_STAB)
04704       {
04705             // safety check
04706             if (Weapon[usInHand].ubWeaponClass != KNIFECLASS)
04707              {
04708                   #ifdef BETAVERSION
04709                   NumMessage("CalcChanceToStab: ERROR - Attacker isn't holding a knife, usInHand = ",usInHand);
04710                   #endif
04711                   return(0);
04712              }
04713       }
04714       else
04715       {
04716             if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass != IC_PUNCH )
04717             {
04718                   return(0);
04719             }
04720       }
04721 
04722   // CALCULATE ATTACKER'S CLOSE COMBAT RATING (1-100)
04723       if (ubMode == HTH_MODE_STEAL)
04724       {
04725             // this is more of a brute force strength-vs-strength check
04726             iAttRating = ( EffectiveDexterity( pAttacker ) + // coordination, accuracy
04727                          EffectiveAgility( pAttacker ) +    // speed & reflexes
04728                          3 * pAttacker->bStrength +    // physical strength (TRIPLED!)
04729                          (10 * EffectiveExpLevel( pAttacker ) ) );  // experience, knowledge
04730       }
04731       else
04732       {
04733             iAttRating = (3 * EffectiveDexterity( pAttacker ) + // coordination, accuracy (TRIPLED!)
04734                          EffectiveAgility( pAttacker ) +    // speed & reflexes
04735                          pAttacker->bStrength +    // physical strength
04736                          (10 * EffectiveExpLevel( pAttacker ) ) );  // experience, knowledge
04737       }
04738 
04739   iAttRating /= 6;  // convert from 6-600 to 1-100
04740 
04741       // psycho bonus
04742       if ( pAttacker->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && gMercProfiles[ pAttacker->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait == PSYCHO )
04743       {
04744             iAttRating += AIM_BONUS_PSYCHO;
04745       }
04746 
04747       // modify chance to hit by morale
04748       iAttRating += GetMoraleModifier( pAttacker );
04749 
04750       // modify for fatigue
04751       iAttRating -= GetSkillCheckPenaltyForFatigue( pAttacker, iAttRating );
04752 
04753   // if attacker spent some extra time aiming
04754   if (ubAimTime)
04755    {
04756     // use only HALF of the normal aiming bonus for knife aiming.
04757     // since there's no range penalty, the bonus is otherwise too generous
04758     iAttRating += ((AIM_BONUS_PER_AP * ubAimTime) / 2);    //bonus for aiming
04759    }
04760 
04761   if (! (pAttacker->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC) )   // if attacker is a computer AI controlled enemy
04762       {
04763     iAttRating += gbDiff[ DIFF_ENEMY_TO_HIT_MOD ][ SoldierDifficultyLevel( pAttacker ) ];
04764       }
04765 
04766   // if attacker is being affected by gas
04767   if ( pAttacker->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED )
04768     iAttRating -= AIM_PENALTY_GASSED;
04769 
04770   // if attacker is being bandaged at the same time, his concentration is off
04771       if (pAttacker->ubServiceCount > 0)
04772         iAttRating -= AIM_PENALTY_GETTINGAID;
04773 
04774   // if attacker is still in shock
04775   if (pAttacker->bShock)
04776     iAttRating -= (pAttacker->bShock * AIM_PENALTY_PER_SHOCK);
04777 
04778 /*
04779   // if the attacker is an A.I.M. mercenary
04780   if (pAttacker->characternum < MAX_AIM_MERCS)  // exclude Gus
04781     iAttRating += AdjustChanceForProfile(pAttacker,pDefender);
04782 */
04783 
04784   // If attacker injured, reduce chance accordingly (by up to 2/3rds)
04785   if ((iAttRating > 0) && (pAttacker->bLife < pAttacker->bLifeMax))
04786    {
04787     // if bandaged, give 1/2 of the bandaged life points back into equation
04788     ubBandaged = pAttacker->bLifeMax - pAttacker->bLife - pAttacker->bBleeding;
04789 
04790     iAttRating -= (2 * iAttRating * (pAttacker->bLifeMax - pAttacker->bLife + (ubBandaged / 2))) /
04791              (3 * pAttacker->bLifeMax);
04792    }
04793 
04794   // If attacker tired, reduce chance accordingly (by up to 1/2)
04795   if ((iAttRating > 0) && (pAttacker->bBreath < 100))
04796     iAttRating -= (iAttRating * (100 - pAttacker->bBreath)) / 200;
04797 
04798       if (pAttacker->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE)
04799       {
04800             if (ubMode == HTH_MODE_STAB)
04801             {
04802                   if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pAttacker, KNIFING ))                  
04803                   {
04804                         iAttRating += gbSkillTraitBonus[KNIFING] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pAttacker, KNIFING );
04805                   }
04806             }
04807             else
04808             {
04809                   // add bonuses for hand-to-hand and martial arts
04810                   if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pAttacker, MARTIALARTS ))
04811                   {
04812                         iAttRating += gbSkillTraitBonus[MARTIALARTS] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pAttacker, MARTIALARTS );
04813                   }
04814                   if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pAttacker, HANDTOHAND ) )
04815                   {
04816                         iAttRating += gbSkillTraitBonus[HANDTOHAND] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pAttacker, HANDTOHAND );
04817                   }
04818             }
04819       }
04820 
04821 
04822   if (iAttRating < 1)
04823     iAttRating = 1;
04824 
04825 
04826   // CALCULATE DEFENDER'S CLOSE COMBAT RATING (0-100)
04827       if (ubMode == HTH_MODE_STEAL)
04828       {
04829             iDefRating = (EffectiveAgility( pDefender )) +   // speed & reflexes
04830                EffectiveDexterity( pDefender ) +  // coordination, accuracy
04831                3 * pDefender->bStrength +    // physical strength (TRIPLED!)
04832            (10 * EffectiveExpLevel( pDefender ) );  // experience, knowledge
04833       }
04834       else
04835       {
04836             iDefRating = (3 * EffectiveAgility( pDefender ) ) +   // speed & reflexes (TRIPLED!)
04837                EffectiveDexterity( pDefender ) +  // coordination, accuracy
04838                pDefender->bStrength +    // physical strength
04839            (10 * EffectiveExpLevel( pDefender ) );  // experience, knowledge
04840       }
04841   
04842   iDefRating /= 6;  // convert from 6-600 to 1-100
04843 
04844       // modify chance to dodge by morale
04845       iDefRating += GetMoraleModifier( pDefender );
04846 
04847       // modify for fatigue
04848       iDefRating -= GetSkillCheckPenaltyForFatigue( pDefender, iDefRating );
04849 
04850   // if attacker is being affected by gas
04851   if ( pDefender->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED )
04852     iDefRating -= AIM_PENALTY_GASSED;
04853 
04854   // if defender is being bandaged at the same time, his concentration is off
04855       if (pDefender->ubServiceCount > 0)
04856         iDefRating -= AIM_PENALTY_GETTINGAID;
04857 
04858   // if defender is still in shock
04859   if (pDefender->bShock)
04860     iDefRating -= (pDefender->bShock * AIM_PENALTY_PER_SHOCK);
04861 
04862 /*
04863   // if the defender is an A.I.M. mercenary
04864   if (pDefender->characternum < MAX_AIM_MERCS)  // exclude Gus
04865     iDefRating += AdjustChanceForProfile(pDefender,pAttacker);
04866 */
04867 
04868   // If defender injured, reduce chance accordingly (by up to 2/3rds)
04869   if ((iDefRating > 0) && (pDefender->bLife < pDefender->bLifeMax))
04870    {
04871     // if bandaged, give 1/2 of the bandaged life points back into equation
04872     ubBandaged = pDefender->bLifeMax - pDefender->bLife - pDefender->bBleeding;
04873 
04874     iDefRating -= (2 * iDefRating * (pDefender->bLifeMax - pDefender->bLife + (ubBandaged / 2))) /
04875              (3 * pDefender->bLifeMax);
04876 
04877    }
04878 
04879   // If defender tired, reduce chance accordingly (by up to 1/2)
04880   if ((iDefRating > 0) && (pDefender->bBreath < 100))
04881     iDefRating -= (iDefRating * (100 - pDefender->bBreath)) / 200;
04882 
04883       if ( usInHand == CREATURE_QUEEN_TENTACLES && pDefender->ubBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER || pDefender->ubBodyType == INFANT_MONSTER )
04884       {
04885             // try to prevent queen from killing the kids, ever!
04886             iDefRating += 10000;
04887       }
04888 
04889       if (gAnimControl[ pDefender->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight < ANIM_STAND)
04890       {
04891             if (usInHand == CREATURE_QUEEN_TENTACLES)
04892             {
04893                   if ( gAnimControl[ pDefender->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
04894                   {
04895                         // make it well-nigh impossible to hit someone who is prone! 
04896                         iDefRating += 1000;
04897                   }
04898                   else
04899                   {
04900                         iDefRating += BAD_DODGE_POSITION_PENALTY * 2;
04901                   }
04902             }
04903             else
04904             {
04905                   // if defender crouched, reduce chance accordingly (harder to dodge)
04906                   iDefRating -= BAD_DODGE_POSITION_PENALTY;
04907                   // If our target is prone, double the penalty!
04908                   if ( gAnimControl[ pDefender->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
04909                   {
04910                         iDefRating -= BAD_DODGE_POSITION_PENALTY;
04911                   }
04912             }
04913       }
04914 
04915 
04916       if (pDefender->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE)
04917       {
04918             if (ubMode == HTH_MODE_STAB)
04919             {
04920                   if (Item[pDefender->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].usItemClass == IC_BLADE)
04921                   {
04922                         if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pDefender, KNIFING ) )
04923                         {
04924                               // good with knives, got one, so we're good at parrying
04925                               iDefRating += gbSkillTraitBonus[KNIFING] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pDefender, KNIFING );
04926                         }
04927                         if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pDefender, MARTIALARTS ))
04928                         {
04929                               // the knife gets in the way but we're still better than nobody
04930                               iDefRating += ( gbSkillTraitBonus[MARTIALARTS] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pDefender, MARTIALARTS ) ) / 3;
04931                         }                       
04932                   }
04933                   else
04934                   {
04935                         if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pDefender, KNIFING ) )
04936                         {
04937                               // good with knives, don't have one, but we know a bit about dodging
04938                               iDefRating += ( gbSkillTraitBonus[KNIFING] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pDefender, KNIFING ) ) / 3;
04939                         }
04940                         if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pDefender, MARTIALARTS ))
04941                         {
04942                               // bonus for dodging knives
04943                               iDefRating += ( gbSkillTraitBonus[MARTIALARTS] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pDefender, MARTIALARTS ) )/ 2;
04944                         }
04945                   }
04946             }
04947             else
04948             {     // punch/hand-to-hand/martial arts attack/steal
04949                   if (Item[pDefender->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].usItemClass == IC_BLADE && ubMode != HTH_MODE_STEAL)
04950                   {           
04951                         if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pDefender, KNIFING ))
04952                         {
04953                               // with our knife, we get some bonus at defending from HTH attacks
04954                               iDefRating += ( gbSkillTraitBonus[KNIFING] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pDefender, KNIFING ) ) / 2;
04955                         }
04956                   }
04957                   else
04958                   {
04959                         if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pDefender, MARTIALARTS ))
04960                         {
04961                               iDefRating += gbSkillTraitBonus[MARTIALARTS] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pDefender, MARTIALARTS );
04962                         }
04963                         if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pDefender, HANDTOHAND ))
04964                         {
04965                               iDefRating += gbSkillTraitBonus[HANDTOHAND] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pDefender, HANDTOHAND );
04966                         }
04967                   }
04968             }
04969       }
04970 
04971   if (iDefRating < 1)
04972     iDefRating = 1;
04973 
04974 
04975   //NumMessage("CalcChanceToStab - Attacker's Rating = ",iAttRating);
04976   //NumMessage("CalcChanceToStab - Defender's Rating = ",iDefRating);
04977 
04978   // calculate chance to hit by comparing the 2 opponent's ratings
04979 //  iChance = (100 * iAttRating) / (iAttRating + iDefRating);
04980       
04981 
04982       if (ubMode == HTH_MODE_STEAL)
04983       {
04984             // make this more extreme so that weak people have a harder time stealing from 
04985             // the stronger
04986             iChance = 50 * iAttRating / iDefRating;
04987       }
04988       else
04989       {
04990             // Changed from DG by CJC to give higher chances of hitting with a stab or punch
04991             iChance = 67 + (iAttRating - iDefRating) / 3;
04992 
04993             if ( pAttacker->bAimShotLocation == AIM_SHOT_HEAD )
04994             {
04995                   // make this harder!
04996                   iChance -= 20;
04997             }
04998 
04999       }
05000 
05001 
05002   // MAKE SURE CHANCE TO HIT IS WITHIN DEFINED LIMITS
05003   if (iChance < MINCHANCETOHIT)
05004       {
05005     iChance = MINCHANCETOHIT;
05006       }
05007   else
05008       {
05009             if (iChance > MAXCHANCETOHIT)
05010                   iChance = MAXCHANCETOHIT;
05011       }
05012 
05013   //NumMessage("ChanceToStab = ",chance);
05014 
05015   return (iChance);
05016 }
05017 
05018 UINT32 CalcChanceToStab(SOLDIERTYPE * pAttacker,SOLDIERTYPE *pDefender, UINT8 ubAimTime)
05019 {
05020       return( CalcChanceHTH( pAttacker, pDefender, ubAimTime, HTH_MODE_STAB ) );
05021 }
05022 
05023 UINT32 CalcChanceToPunch(SOLDIERTYPE *pAttacker, SOLDIERTYPE * pDefender, UINT8 ubAimTime)
05024 {
05025       return( CalcChanceHTH( pAttacker, pDefender, ubAimTime, HTH_MODE_PUNCH ) );
05026 }
05027 
05028 UINT32 CalcChanceToSteal(SOLDIERTYPE *pAttacker, SOLDIERTYPE * pDefender, UINT8 ubAimTime)
05029 {
05030       return( CalcChanceHTH( pAttacker, pDefender, ubAimTime, HTH_MODE_STEAL ) );
05031 }
