05033 
05034 void ReloadWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubHandPos )
05035 {
05036       // NB this is a cheat function, don't award experience
05037 
05038       if ( pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem != NOTHING )
05039       {
05040             pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].ubGunShotsLeft = GetMagSize(&pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ]);
05041             // Dirty Bars
05042             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL1 );
05043       }
05044 }
05045 
05046 
05047 
05048 BOOLEAN IsGunWeaponModeCapable( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubHandPos , UINT8 bWpnMode)
05049 {
05050       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("IsGunWeaponModeCapable: weapon mode=%d",bWpnMode));
05051 
05052       switch(bWpnMode)
05053       {
05054             case WM_NORMAL:
05055             return (pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem != NOTHING && Item[ pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON && !Weapon[ pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem ].NoSemiAuto );  // Check for being a weapon....
05056 
05057             case WM_BURST:
05058             return IsGunBurstCapable(pSoldier, ubHandPos, FALSE);
05059 
05060             case WM_AUTOFIRE:
05061             return ((IsGunAutofireCapable(pSoldier, ubHandPos) || Weapon[ pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem ].NoSemiAuto )&& !Item[pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos].usItem].grenadelauncher );
05062 
05063             case WM_ATTACHED_GL:
05064 //          return (FindAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]), UNDER_GLAUNCHER ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND && FindLaunchableAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]), UNDER_GLAUNCHER ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
05065             
05066             return (!Item[pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos].usItem].grenadelauncher &&  IsGrenadeLauncherAttached( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]) ) && FindLaunchableAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]), GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]) )) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
05067       
05068             case WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST:
05069                   return (!Item[pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos].usItem].grenadelauncher && IsGrenadeLauncherAttached( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]) ) && Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(&pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos])].ubShotsPerBurst > 0 && FindLaunchableAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]), GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]))) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
05070 
05071             case WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO:
05072                   return FALSE;
05073 //                return (!Item[pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos].usItem].grenadelauncher && Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(&pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos])].bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP > 0 && FindLaunchableAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]), GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]) ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
05074 
05075             default:
05076             return FALSE;
05077       }
05078 }
05079 
05080 BOOLEAN IsGunAutofireCapable( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubHandPos )
05081 {
05082       BOOLEAN fCapable = FALSE;
05083 
05084       if ( pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem != NOTHING )
05085       {
05086             // ATE: Check for being a weapon....
05087             if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
05088             {
05089                   if ( GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(&pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ]) > 0 )
05090                   {
05091                         fCapable = TRUE;
05092                   }
05093             }
05094       }
05095 
05096       return( fCapable );
05097 }
05098 
05099 BOOLEAN IsGunBurstCapable( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubHandPos , BOOLEAN fNotify )
05100 {
05101       BOOLEAN fCapable = FALSE;
05102 
05103       if ( pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem != NOTHING )
05104       {
05105             // ATE: Check for being a weapon....
05106             if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
05107             {
05108                   if ( GetShotsPerBurst(&pSoldier->inv[ ubHandPos ]) > 0 )
05109                   {
05110                         fCapable = TRUE;
05111                   }
05112             }
05113       }
05114 
05115       if ( fNotify && !fCapable )
05116       {
05117                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, Message[ STR_NOT_BURST_CAPABLE ], pSoldier->name );
05118       }
05119 
05120       return( fCapable );
05121 }
05122 
05123 
05124 INT32 CalcMaxTossRange( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usItem, BOOLEAN fArmed )
05125 {
05126       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"calcmaxtossrange");
05127       INT32 iRange;
05128       UINT16      usSubItem;
05129 
05130       if ( EXPLOSIVE_GUN( usItem ) )
05131       {
05132             // oops! return value in weapons table
05133             return( Weapon[ usItem ].usRange / CELL_X_SIZE );
05134       }
05135 
05136       // if item's fired mechanically
05137       // ATE: If we are sent in a LAUNCHABLE, get the LAUCNHER, and sub ONLY if we are armed...
05138       usSubItem = GetLauncherFromLaunchable( usItem );
05139 
05140       if ( fArmed && usSubItem != NOTHING )
05141       {
05142             usItem = usSubItem;
05143       }
05144 
05145       if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER && fArmed )
05146       {
05147             // this function returns range in tiles so, stupidly, we have to divide by 10 here
05148             iRange = Weapon[usItem].usRange / CELL_X_SIZE;
05149       }
05150       else
05151       {
05152 //          if ( Item[ usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_UNAERODYNAMIC )
05153             if ( Item[ usItem ].unaerodynamic )
05154             {
05155                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"calcmaxtossrange: not aerodynamic");
05156                   iRange = 1;
05157             }
05158             else if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GRENADE )
05159             {
05160                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"calcmaxtossrange: grenade");
05161                   // start with the range based on the soldier's strength and the item's weight
05162                   // Altered by Digicrab on 14 March, 2004
05163                   // Reversed a Ja2Gold change that made grenades of weight 3 or more have the same throw distance as those of weight 3.
05164                   INT32 iThrowingStrength = ( EffectiveStrength( pSoldier ) * 2 + 100 ) / 3;
05165                   iRange = 2 + ( iThrowingStrength / (3 + (Item[usItem].ubWeight) / 3 ));
05166             }
05167             else
05168             {     // not as aerodynamic!
05169                   // start with the range based on the soldier's strength and the item's weight
05170                   iRange = 2 + ( ( EffectiveStrength( pSoldier ) / ( 5 + Item[usItem].ubWeight) ) );
05171             }
05172       
05173             // adjust for thrower's remaining breath (lose up to 1/2 of range)
05174             iRange -= (iRange * (100 - pSoldier->bBreath)) / 200;
05175 
05176             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, THROWING ) )
05177             {
05178                   // better max range due to expertise
05179                   iRange = iRange * (100 + gbSkillTraitBonus[THROWING] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, THROWING ) ) / 100;      
05180             }
05181       }
05182 
05183       if (iRange < 1)
05184       {
05185             iRange = 1;
05186       }
05187 
05188       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"calcmaxtossrange done");
05189       return( iRange );
05190 }
05191 
05192 
05193 UINT32 CalcThrownChanceToHit(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubAimTime, UINT8 ubAimPos )
05194 {
05195       INT32 iChance, iMaxRange, iRange;
05196       UINT16      usHandItem;
05197       INT8 bPenalty, bBandaged;
05198 
05199       if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
05200       {
05201             usHandItem = GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher (&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);// UNDER_GLAUNCHER;
05202       }
05203       else
05204       {
05205             usHandItem = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
05206       }
05207 
05208 /*
05209       // CJC: Grenade Launchers don't fire in a straight line!
05210       #ifdef BETAVERSION
05211       if (usHandItem == GLAUNCHER)
05212       {
05213             PopMessage("CalcThrownChanceToHit: DOESN'T WORK ON GLAUNCHERs!");
05214             return(0);
05215       }
05216       #endif
05217 */
05218 
05219       if ( Item[ usHandItem ].usItemClass != IC_LAUNCHER && pSoldier->bWeaponMode != WM_ATTACHED_GL && pSoldier->bWeaponMode != WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST && pSoldier->bWeaponMode != WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
05220       {
05221             // PHYSICALLY THROWN arced projectile (ie. grenade)
05222             // for lack of anything better, base throwing accuracy on dex & marskmanship
05223             iChance = ( EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) + EffectiveMarksmanship( pSoldier ) ) / 2;
05224             // throwing trait helps out
05225             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, THROWING ) )
05226             {
05227                   iChance += gbSkillTraitBonus[THROWING] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, THROWING );
05228             }
05229       }
05230       else
05231       {
05232 
05233             // MECHANICALLY FIRED arced projectile (ie. mortar), need brains & know-how
05234             iChance = ( EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) + EffectiveMarksmanship( pSoldier ) + EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) + pSoldier->bExpLevel ) / 4;
05235 
05236             // heavy weapons trait helps out
05237             if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, HEAVY_WEAPS ))
05238             {
05239                   iChance += gbSkillTraitBonus[HEAVY_WEAPS] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, HEAVY_WEAPS );
05240             }
05241       }
05242 
05243       if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
05244       {
05245             int iPenalty = ( Weapon[usHandItem].ubBurstPenalty
05246                   - GetBurstToHitBonus(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS], gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE) )
05247                   * (pSoldier->bDoBurst - 1);
05248 
05249             // halve the penalty for people with the autofire trait
05250             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, AUTO_WEAPS ) )
05251             {
05252                   iPenalty /= 2 * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, AUTO_WEAPS );
05253             }
05254             iChance -= iPenalty;
05255       }
05256 
05257       // modify based on morale
05258       iChance += GetMoraleModifier( pSoldier );
05259 
05260       // modify by fatigue
05261       iChance -= GetSkillCheckPenaltyForFatigue( pSoldier, iChance );
05262 
05263       // if shooting same target from same position as the last shot
05264       if (sGridNo == pSoldier->sLastTarget)
05265       {
05266             iChance += AIM_BONUS_SAME_TARGET;         // give a bonus to hit
05267       }
05268 
05269       // ADJUST FOR EXTRA AIMING TIME
05270       if (ubAimTime)
05271       {
05272             iChance += (AIM_BONUS_PER_AP * ubAimTime); // bonus for every pt of aiming
05273       }
05274 
05275 /*
05276       if (!pSoldier->human)   // if this is a computer AI controlled enemy
05277       {
05278             iChance += Diff[DIFF_ENEMY_TO_HIT_MOD][GameOption[ENEMYDIFFICULTY]];
05279       }
05280 */
05281 
05282       // if shooter is being affected by gas
05283       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED )
05284       {
05285             iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_GASSED;
05286       }
05287 
05288       // if shooter is being bandaged at the same time, his concentration is off
05289       if (pSoldier->ubServiceCount > 0)
05290       {
05291         iChance -= AIM_PENALTY_GETTINGAID;
05292       }
05293 
05294       // if shooter is still in shock
05295       if (pSoldier->bShock)
05296       {
05297             iChance -= (pSoldier->bShock * AIM_PENALTY_PER_SHOCK);
05298       }
05299 
05300       // calculate actual range (in world units)
05301       iRange = (INT16)GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
05302 
05303       //NumMessage("ACTUAL RANGE = ",range);
05304 
05305       // Snap: Use tohitbonus or aimbonus instead
05306       /*if ( GetDayVisionRangeBonus (pSoldier) >0) // pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem == SUNGOGGLES || pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem == SUNGOGGLES)
05307       {
05308             // decrease effective range by 10% when using sungoggles (w or w/o scope)
05309             iRange -= iRange / 10;  //basically, +1% to hit per every 2 squares
05310       }*/
05311 
05312       //NumMessage("EFFECTIVE RANGE = ",range);
05313 
05314       // ADJUST FOR RANGE
05315 
05316       if ( Item[usHandItem].mortar && iRange < MIN_MORTAR_RANGE)
05317       {
05318             return(0);
05319       }
05320       else
05321       {
05322             iMaxRange = CalcMaxTossRange( pSoldier, usHandItem , TRUE ) * CELL_X_SIZE;
05323 
05324             //NumMessage("MAX RANGE = ",maxRange);
05325 
05326             // bonus if range is less than 1/2 maximum range, penalty if it's more
05327 
05328             // bonus is 50% at range 0, -50% at maximum range
05329 
05330             iChance += 50 * 2 * ( (iMaxRange / 2) - iRange ) / iMaxRange;
05331             //iChance += ((iMaxRange / 2) - iRange);        // increments of 1% per pixel
05332 
05333             // IF TARGET IS BEYOND MAXIMUM THROWING RANGE
05334             if (iRange > iMaxRange)
05335             {
05336                   // the object CAN travel that far if not blocked, but it's NOT accurate!
05337                   iChance /= 2;
05338             }
05339       }
05340 
05341       // IF CHANCE EXISTS, BUT ATTACKER IS INJURED
05342       if ((iChance > 0) && (pSoldier->bLife < pSoldier->bLifeMax))
05343       {
05344             // if bandaged, give 1/2 of the bandaged life points back into equation
05345             bBandaged = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bBleeding;
05346 
05347             // injury penalty is based on % damage taken (max 2/3rds iChance)
05348             bPenalty = (2 * iChance * (pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife + (bBandaged / 2))) /
05349                    (3 * pSoldier->bLifeMax);
05350 
05351             // for mechanically-fired projectiles, reduce penalty in half
05352             if ( Item[ usHandItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER )
05353             {
05354                   bPenalty /= 2;
05355             }
05356 
05357             // reduce injury penalty due to merc's experience level (he can take it!)
05358             iChance -= (bPenalty * (100 - (10 * ( EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) - 1)))) / 100;
05359       }
05360 
05361       // IF CHANCE EXISTS, BUT ATTACKER IS LOW ON BREATH
05362       if ((iChance > 0) && (pSoldier->bBreath < 100))
05363       {
05364             // breath penalty is based on % breath missing (max 1/2 iChance)
05365             bPenalty = (iChance * (100 - pSoldier->bBreath)) / 200;
05366 
05367             // for mechanically-fired projectiles, reduce penalty in half
05368             if ( Item[ usHandItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER )
05369                   bPenalty /= 2;
05370 
05371             // reduce breath penalty due to merc's dexterity (he can compensate!)
05372             iChance -= (bPenalty * (100 - ( EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) - 10))) / 100;
05373       }
05374 
05375       // if iChance exists, but it's a mechanical item being used
05376       if ((iChance > 0) && (Item[ usHandItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER ))
05377             // reduce iChance to hit DIRECTLY by the item's working condition
05378             iChance = (iChance * WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bStatus[0])) / 100;
05379 
05380       // MAKE SURE CHANCE TO HIT IS WITHIN DEFINED LIMITS
05381       if (iChance < MINCHANCETOHIT)
05382             iChance = MINCHANCETOHIT;
05383       else
05384       {
05385             if (iChance > MAXCHANCETOHIT)
05386                   iChance = MAXCHANCETOHIT;
05387       }
05388 
05389 
05390       //NumMessage("ThrownChanceToHit = ",iChance);
05391       return (iChance);
05392 }
05393 
05394 
05395 void ChangeWeaponMode( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
05396 {
05397       // ATE: Don't do this if in a fire amimation.....
05398       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FIRE )
05399       {
05400             return;
05401       }
05402 
05403       do
05404       {
05405             pSoldier->bWeaponMode++;
05406             if(pSoldier->bWeaponMode == NUM_WEAPON_MODES)
05407             {
05408                   if ( Weapon[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].NoSemiAuto )
05409                         pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_AUTOFIRE;
05410                   else
05411                         pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_NORMAL;
05412             }
05413       }
05414       while(IsGunWeaponModeCapable( pSoldier, HANDPOS, pSoldier->bWeaponMode ) == FALSE && pSoldier->bWeaponMode != WM_NORMAL);
05415       
05416       if (pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_AUTOFIRE || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
05417       {
05418             pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;
05419             pSoldier->bDoBurst = 1;
05420       }
05421       else if(pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST )
05422       {
05423             pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 0;
05424             pSoldier->bDoBurst = 1;
05425       }
05426       else
05427       {
05428             pSoldier->bDoBurst = 0;
05429             pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 0;    
05430       }
05431 
05432       pSoldier->fDoSpread = 0;
05433       
05434       DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05435       gfUIForceReExamineCursorData = TRUE;
05436 }
05437 
05438 void DishoutQueenSwipeDamage( SOLDIERTYPE *pQueenSoldier )
05439 {
05440       INT8 bValidDishoutDirs[3][3] = { NORTH, NORTHEAST, -1,
05441                                                                                                       EAST, SOUTHEAST, -1,
05442                                                                                                       SOUTH, -1, -1 };
05443 
05444       UINT32                  cnt, cnt2;
05445       SOLDIERTYPE                                     *pSoldier;
05446       INT8                                                        bDir;
05447       INT32                                                       iChance;
05448       INT32                                                       iImpact;
05449       INT32                                                       iHitBy;
05450 
05451       // Loop through all mercs and make go
05452       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
05453       {
05454             pSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
05455 
05456             if (pSoldier != NULL )
05457             {
05458                   if ( pSoldier->ubID != pQueenSoldier->ubID )
05459                   {
05460                         // ATE: Ok, lets check for some basic things here!
05461                         if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05462                         {
05463                               // Get Pyth spaces away....
05464                               if ( GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pQueenSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) <= Weapon[ CREATURE_QUEEN_TENTACLES].usRange )
05465                               {
05466                                     // get direction
05467                                     bDir = (INT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, pQueenSoldier );
05468 
05469                                     // 
05470                                     for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < 2; cnt2++ )
05471                                     {
05472                                           if ( bValidDishoutDirs[ pQueenSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 ][ cnt2 ] == bDir )
05473                                           {
05474                                                 iChance = CalcChanceToStab( pQueenSoldier, pSoldier, 0 );
05475 
05476                                                 // CC: Look here for chance to hit, damage, etc...
05477                                                 // May want to not hit if target is prone, etc....
05478                                                 iHitBy = iChance - (INT32) PreRandom( 100 );
05479                                                 if ( iHitBy > 0 )
05480                                                 {
05481                                                       // Hit!
05482                                                       iImpact = HTHImpact( pQueenSoldier, pSoldier, iHitBy, TRUE );
05483                                                       EVENT_SoldierGotHit( pSoldier, CREATURE_QUEEN_TENTACLES, (INT16) iImpact, (INT16) iImpact, gOppositeDirection[ bDir ], 50, pQueenSoldier->ubID, 0, ANIM_CROUCH, 0, 0 );
05484                                                 }
05485                                           }
05486                                     }
05487                               }
05488                         }
05489                   }
05490             }
05491       }
05492 
05493       pQueenSoldier->uiPendingActionData1++;
05494 }
05495 
05496 
05497 BOOLEAN WillExplosiveWeaponFail( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pObj )
05498 {
05499   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || pSoldier->bVisible == 1 )
05500   {
05501     if ( (INT8)(PreRandom( 40 ) + PreRandom( 40 ) ) > pObj->bStatus[0] )
05502     {
05503       // Do second dice roll
05504       if ( PreRandom( 2 ) == 1 )
05505       {
05506         // Fail
05507         return( TRUE );               
05508       }
05509     }
05510   }
05511   return( FALSE );
05512 }

05514 
05515 BOOLEAN IsWeapon ( UINT16 itemIndex )
05516 {
05517       if ( Item[itemIndex].usItemClass == IC_GUN || Item[itemIndex].usItemClass == IC_PUNCH  || Item[itemIndex].usItemClass == IC_BLADE   || 
05518             Item[itemIndex].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER  || Item[itemIndex].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE  || Item[itemIndex].usItemClass == IC_THROWN  ||
05519             Item[itemIndex].usItemClass == IC_GRENADE  || Item[itemIndex].usItemClass == IC_TENTACLES )
05520             return true;
05521 
05522       return false;
05523 }
05524 
05525 UINT8 GetDamage ( OBJECTTYPE *pObj )
05526 {
05527 //     DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GetDamage"));
05528 
05529       if ( Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_BLADE || Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_PUNCH || Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_TENTACLES )
05530       {
05531             UINT8 ubDamage = Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].ubImpact + GetMeleeDamageBonus(pObj);
05532             return min(255, (UINT8)( (ubDamage) + ( (double)ubDamage / 100) * gGameExternalOptions.ubMeleeDamageMultiplier ) );
05533       }
05534       else
05535       {
05536             UINT8 ubDamage = Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].ubImpact + GetDamageBonus(pObj);
05537             return min(255, (UINT8)( (ubDamage) + ( (double)ubDamage / 100) * gGameExternalOptions.ubGunDamageMultiplier ) );
05538       }
05539 }
05540 
05541 
05542 
05543 UINT8 GetShotsPerBurst( OBJECTTYPE *pObj )
05544 {
05545 //     DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GetShotsPerBurst"));
05546 
05547       return Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].ubShotsPerBurst  + GetBurstSizeBonus(pObj);
05548 
05549 }
05550 UINT8 GetBurstPenalty( OBJECTTYPE *pObj, BOOLEAN fProneStance )
05551 {
05552       // Snap: Make sure burst bonus does not exceed burst penalty!
05553       INT16 bns = GetBurstToHitBonus(pObj, fProneStance);
05554       
05555       if ( bns > Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].ubBurstPenalty ) {
05556             return 0;
05557       }
05558 
05559       return Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].ubBurstPenalty - bns;
05560 }
05561 UINT8 GetAutoPenalty( OBJECTTYPE *pObj, BOOLEAN fProneStance )
05562 {
05563       // Snap: Make sure burst bonus does not exceed burst penalty!
05564       INT16 bns = GetAutoToHitBonus(pObj, fProneStance);
05565       
05566       if ( bns > Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].AutoPenalty ) {
05567             return 0;
05568       }
05569 
05570       return Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].AutoPenalty - bns;
05571 }
05572 UINT8 GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs( OBJECTTYPE *pObj )
05573 {
05574 //     DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs"));
05575 
05576       return Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP;
05577 
05578 }
05579 UINT8 GetMagSize( OBJECTTYPE *pObj )
05580 {
05581 //     DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GetMagSize"));
05582 
05583       return Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].ubMagSize + GetMagSizeBonus(pObj);
05584 
05585 }
05586 BOOLEAN WeaponReady(SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier)
05587 {
05588       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FIREREADY )
05589             return TRUE;
05590       else
05591             return FALSE;
05592 
05593 }
05594 INT8 GetAPsToReload( OBJECTTYPE *pObj )
05595 {
05596 //     DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GetAPsToReload"));
05597 
05598       return ( Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].APsToReload *
05599             ( 100 - GetPercentReloadTimeAPReduction(pObj) ) ) / 100;
05600 
05601 }
